During the darkest days of the Phyrexian Invasion, when such strange alliances were a necessity, the disciples of the enemy-color schools of wizardry saw these creatures as an affirmation of their stu...

Warthog.name: Warthog
Warthog.description: '''Warthog''' is an obsolete creature type that represents a type of pig that lives in open or semi-open habitats, often in quite arid regions, and have prominent tusks on their face.

Windmill.name: Windmill
Windmill.description: as of ''2024 Amsterdam Unknown Event'' '''Windmill''' is a test card-only and token-only artifact creature type used to represent windmills.

Worm.name: Worm
Worm.description: as of ''Magic: The Gathering Foundations'' '''Worm''' is a blue, green, and black creature type used for cards depicting long, slender, soft-bodied, legless, bilaterally symmetrical, creeping animals. Leeches are excepted since they have their subtype.

Wraith.name: Wraith
Wraith.description: as of ''The Lord of the Rings: Tales of Middle-earth''

Wyvern.name: Wyvern
Wyvern.description: '''Wyvern''' is an obsolete creature subtype that depicted flying reptiles with a bird-like gait and two legs, smaller than the four-legged Dragons but larger than Drakes.

Yeti.name: Yeti
Yeti.description: as of ''Final Fantasy'' '''Yeti''' is a predominant red and green creature type used for ape-like humanoids living in cold mountainous regions.

Zonian.name: Zonian
Zonian.description: as of ''2024 Las Vegas Unknown Event'' '''Zonian''' is a test card-only creature type and race used to represent a race of powerful warrior women.

Zubera.name: Zubera
Zubera.description: as of ''Saviors of Kamigawa'' '''Zubera''' (ZOO-beh-rah) is creature type unique to the ''Kamigawa block''. A Zubera is the faceless kami of a human who has been pulled into the spirit world. Zubera are said to attack solitary travelers in order to steal their faces. In fact, Zubera is essentially a species of Spirits. No Zubera is printed without the Spirit type.

Abomination of Llanowar.name: Abomination of Llanowar
Abomination of Llanowar.description: The '''Abomination of Llanowar''' is an elf horror formed by living and dead bodies of elves, who terrorizes the forest of Llanowar in Dominaria.

Aboshan.name: Aboshan
Aboshan.description: '''Aboshan''' was the ruler of the cephalid Mer Empire that controlled a large portion of Dominaria's oceans after the Phyrexian Invasion.

Adam Carthalion.name: Adam Carthalion
Adam Carthalion.description: '''Adam Carthalion''' was of the influential Carthalion lineage; once a young shipping magnate and consultant to the leaders of Arathoxia, he later held the houses of Arathoxia together as Lord of Castle Melmereth of House Scarlet in Ephren on Corondor.

Ad'Amra.name: Ad'Amra
Ad'Amra.description: '''Ad'Amra''' was a daughter of Red Donald who fought with her father's army across the Domains.

Adira Strongheart.name: Adira Strongheart
Adira Strongheart.description: '''Adira Strongheart''' was the leader of the Robaran Mercenaries on Dominaria, at the time of Johan's attempt to conquer central Jamuraa.

Adun Oakenshield.name: Adun Oakenshield
Adun Oakenshield.description: '''Adun Oakenshield''' was a famous warrior whose coming on Dominaria is foreseen in the Anvilonian Grimoire. It is told that, with his passage, the bodies of the greatest warriors of Dominaria shall rise once again from their graves to follow Adun in battle.

biographical_info.lifetime: War with Phyrexia, 4074 AR or before

Aevar Borg.name: Aevar Borg
Aevar Borg.description: '''Aevar Borg''' was a Terisian guide during the Thaw of Dominaria.

Aiman.name: Aiman
Aiman.description: '''Aiman''' was a Fallaji soldier during the time of the Brothers' War.

Akroma.name: Akroma
Akroma.description: '''Akroma''' was a sentient illusion, created in a dream by Ixidor on Dominaria in the image of his lost wife, Nivea, who was killed by Phage in her premier pit fight.

Albrecht.name: Albrecht
Albrecht.description: '''Albrecht''' was a vampire and friend of Thatu Reiniger, victim of ''the Bloodletter'' on the plane of Innistrad.

Alesha.name: Alesha
Alesha.description: '''Alesha''' (A-lesh-a) '''Who Smiles at Death''' was a khan in the past of Tarkir. She ruled over the Mardu Horde with an iron fist and a steel blade. Seeing her charge into battle is enough to make warriors who were out of the fight rise and enter the fray once more.

Alexandrite.name: Alexandrite
Alexandrite.description: '''Alexandrite''' was the daughter of the Kjeldoran king Darien the Great. She was born in the first period of the Thaw of Dominaria.

Alexi.name: Alexi
Alexi.description: '''Alexi''' was a female Zephyr spellshaper on Jamuraa. She was known for her impressive wielding of rhystic magic.

Alexio.name: Alexio
Alexio.description: '''Alexio''' was a skyguard from Meletis on the plane of Theros, who gave his life to protect the Oracle of Ephara, Iris.

Algenus Kenrith.name: Algenus Kenrith
Algenus Kenrith.description: '''Algenus Kenrith''', known as the '''Good King''', was the High King of the Realm on Eldraine. He was the husband of Queen Linden Kenrith, and the father of Erec, Hazel, Rowan and Will Kenrith. He was killed in the Phyrexian Invasion of Eldraine.

Alhammarret.name: Alhammarret
Alhammarret.description: '''Alhammarret''' was a sphinx mind mage from Vryn, who tutored and was later killed by Jace Beleren.

Al-Hayat.name: Al-Hayat
Al-Hayat.description: '''Al-Hayat''' was a rare ancient talking wolf from the forests of Mirrodin. He had seen the creation of the blue, black, and red moons of Mirrodin.

Aliban.name: Aliban
Aliban.description: '''Aliban''' was a goblin wizard and personal attendant to Koskun Keep's first goblin king, Crank.

Alsadim K'mer.name: Alsadim K'mer
Alsadim K'mer.description: '''Alsadim K'mer, the Sainted One''' was a cleric on Shandalar, who took command of the White Guild until its downfall.

Amenakhte.name: Amenakhte
Amenakhte.description: '''Amenakhte''' was an Amonkheti human who fell during the Hour of Devasation.

Ana.name: Ana
Ana.description: Lady '''Ana''' was a minor noble, and a member of the Forward Order in the Caligo Forest on Dominaria. She was the mentor of Liliana Vess, widely renowned for her healing abilities.

Anax.name: Anax
Anax.description: '''Anax''' was the legendary king of Akros on Theros, a brilliant tactician and warrior. He was the husband of Cymede.

Angus.name: Angus
Angus.description: '''Angus''' was a holy man who witnessed a jealous, unnamed planeswalker attack Serra on the Plains of Sursi.

Angus MacKenzie.name: Angus MacKenzie
Angus MacKenzie.description: '''Angus MacKenzie''' was the greatest defender of Karakas. He followed a policy of "peace through perseverance", which inspired the people of this realm to unite and drive out the malign elements that were tearing them apart from within.

Anhelo.name: Anhelo
Anhelo.description: '''Anhelo''' was a vampire and the former crime-lord and boss of the Maestros family in New Capenna. He was the best assassin in the city but also an artist. He was compleated during New Phyrexia's Invasion of the Multiverse and killed by his daughter, Errant.
planes: New Phyrexia's Invasion of the Multiverse|invaded the plane with her New Phyrexian forces

Anikthea.name: Anikthea
Anikthea.description: '''Anikthea''', ''Hand of Erebos'', is a demigod of Erebos on Theros.

Apatzec Intli III.name: Apatzec Intli III
Apatzec Intli III.description: Emperor '''Apatzec Intli III''' was the emperor of the Sun Empire on Ixalan. He was the father of Caztaca Huicintli and Apatzec Intli IV, and the half-brother of Atlacan Huicintli.

Apepei.name: Apepei
Apepei.description: '''Apepei''' was an advisor to Lord Peemel in the city-state of Iwset in the Dark Age of Terisiare, on the plane of Dominaria.

Arah.name: Arah
Arah.description: '''Arah''' was a Yotian knight during the Brothers' War and a leading member of the Church of Tal in the the Dark Age of Dominaria.

Arcades Sabboth.name: Arcades Sabboth
Arcades Sabboth.description: '''Arcades Sabboth''' was a massive, brightly colored, wise Elder Dragon with pale wings, spawned by the Ur-Dragon. He was the first of the elders to name himself.
planes: Ice Age on the World of Magic: The Gathering

Archie Dixon.name: Archie Dixon
Archie Dixon.description: '''Archie Dixon''' was a human courier who relocated to Thunder Junction between 4562 and 4563 AR after the opening of the Omenpaths.

Arcum Dagsson.name: Arcum Dagsson
Arcum Dagsson.description: '''Arcum Dagsson''' was a researcher in the Kjeldoran city of Soldev during the Ice Age.

Arimaya.name: Arimaya
Arimaya.description: '''Arimaya''' was the leader of Clan Onyx of Storgard during the Ice Age. Arimaya opposed leaving Storgard.

Arine.name: Arine
Arine.description: '''Arine''' was a friend of Liliana Vess in her youth. She lived at Vess Manor along with Lady Ana and Liliana's parents and her brother Josu Vess.

Arinos.name: Arinos
Arinos.description: '''Arinos''' was a farmer from Lambholt on the plane of Innistrad, who was involved in the summoning of Old Stickfingers. Although his village assumes him to have died, it may rather be that his body is possessed by Old Stickfingers, who is supposedly able to "wear skins".

Arlen.name: Arlen
Arlen.description: '''Arlen''' was a sorcerer of the Institute of Arcane Study on Dominaria.

Arn.name: Arn
Arn.description: '''Arn''' was a boy of the Second Far Clan who was abducted by raiders from Inys Nohr as a child.

Arnjlot Olasson.name: Arnjlot Olasson
Arnjlot Olasson.description: '''Arnjlot Olasson''' was a legendary sky mage. Arnjlot is famous for his power of flight and for manipulating air and wind currents. He took on Pharon as his apprentice, and taught him animal spells that allowed Pharon to tame wolves. Pharon would later go on to become the court mage in Kjeldor for 400 years.

Aron Capashen.name: Aron Capashen
Aron Capashen.description: '''Aron Capashen''' was the head of Clan Capashen and leader of Benalia on Dominaria.

Asenue.name: Asenue
Asenue.description: '''Asenue''' was an Amonkheti warrior who fought until the very last during the Hours.

Asha.name: Asha
Asha.description: '''Asha "the Blessed"''' is a mythical figure from Alara, an archangel who was said to have battled Malfegor before the Sundering. She ultimately sacrificed herself to banish the demon, but contrary to the written record she was unable to slay him.

Ashnod.name: Ashnod
Ashnod.description: '''Ashnod''', sometimes referred to as the '''Red Woman''', was Mishra's apprentice, and lover, at the time of the Brothers' War on Dominaria. She was also a gifted artificer in her own right. She developed a romantic partnership with Tawnos, despite supporting the opposing side of the war, and joined with him to form a school of mages after the war ended.

biographical_info.lifetime: The Time of Legends-The Dark Age

Asmira.name: Asmira
Asmira.description: '''Asmira''' (az-my-rah), the '''Holy Avenger''', was a prophet from Femeref and the leader of that nation during the Mirage Wars of Dominaria.

Assad.name: Assad
Assad.description: '''Assad''' was a Fallaji soldier who fought on the side of Mishra in the Brothers' War.

Atalya.name: Atalya
Atalya.description: '''Atalya''' was a legendary Human Cleric from Dominaria.

Atraxa.name: Atraxa
Atraxa.description: '''Atraxa''' was a legendary phyrexian angel horror from New Phyrexia. She was called '''The Grand Unifier''' by other Phyrexians.

Augustin IV.name: Augustin IV
Augustin IV.description: '''Augustin IV''' held what is perhaps the most powerful position in Ravnica on paper. As the Grand Arbiter of the Azorius Senate, he was the leader of Ravnica's "technical" ruling body, which has the most legal authority in the entire plane by far, if not the most actual authority. He remained in this position until he was killed by Szadek. Following his death, Leonos II took over his position.

Autumn-Tail.name: Autumn-Tail
Autumn-Tail.description: '''Autumn-Tail''', ''Kitsune Sage'', is a kitsune wizard of Kamigawa during the time of the Kami War.

Avacyn.name: Avacyn
Avacyn.description: '''Avacyn''' was an archangel who inhabited Innistrad. She was the central figure of the Church of Avacyn, who gave the humanity of that plane the faith to fight for survival.

Averru.name: Averru
Averru.description: '''Averru''' was one of the Numena, ancient beings on the plane of Dominaria.

Avram Garrisson.name: Avram Garrisson
Avram Garrisson.description: '''Avram Garrisson''' was a former knight of Kjeldor and the leader of the Order of Stromgald during the last years of the Ice Age of Dominarian Terisiare.

Ayara.name: Ayara
Ayara.description: Queen '''Ayara''' was an ancient elf from the days of the Elven Kingdom on Eldraine, who, until recently, reigned over the court of Locthwain. She was ''compleated'' during New Phyrexia's Invasion of the Multiverse and slain shortly afterward.

Ayesha Tanaka.name: Ayesha Tanaka
Ayesha Tanaka.description: '''Ayesha Tanaka''' was the armorer of Tetsuo Umezawa and the teacher of Kei Takahashi.

Aylith.name: Aylith
Aylith.description: '''Aylith''' was the daughter and only child of Logan, the Keeper of Inys Haen. As such, she was a descendant of Haen the First.

Azami Ozu.name: Azami Ozu
Azami Ozu.description: '''Azami Ozu''' (ah-ZAH-mee) was the head archivist at the Minamo School on Kamigawa.

Azar.name: Azar
Azar.description: '''Azar''' was a wizard from Shandalar. Along with the Guardian, Azar was an apprentice of Kenan Sahrmal. During Lim-Dûl's War, Azar fought Lim-Dûl, destroying the necromancer's body. However, Lim-Dûl was prepared for this and managed to take control of Azar's body. The two souls were trapped together in Azar's body, each one vying for control. The body went rigid and did not respond, so Sahrmal quietly buried it in a necropolis.

Azusa.name: Azusa
Azusa.description: '''Azusa''' (ah-ZOO-sah; Azusa belonged to the sacred order of Jukai Forest and was the pupil of Dosan, but lesser known than her master.

Baankis.name: Baankis
Baankis.description: '''Officer Baankis''' was a soldier in the Otarian Order on Dominaria, who stood under the command of Major Teroh. He was killed by Chainer (who often referred to him as "Bunkus") and was the first person to be absorbed into Chainer's dementia space.

Babolax.name: Babolax
Babolax.description: '''Babolax''' was one of the goblin foremans working at the Cauldron project in the service of the Izzet guild on Ravnica.

Baishya.name: Baishya
Baishya.description: '''Baishya''' (or '''Bai''' for short) was a human Atarka-clan girl with developing shamanistic powers in the past of Tarkir. She was the granddaughter of Yasova Dragonclaw, and twin sister of Naiva.

Balgot.name: Balgot
Balgot.description: '''Balgot''' was an orcish general in the Eastern Domains of Dominaria during the Time of Legends.

Balthor Rockfist.name: Balthor Rockfist
Balthor Rockfist.description: '''Balthor Rockfist''' was a dwarf of the Rock Clan driven off by his people, and who became an important barbarian chieftain on Otaria.

Baris.name: Baris
Baris.description: '''Baris''' was a Serra Inquisitor on Ulgrotha around the time of the Homelands (ca. 3800 AR).

Barktooth Warbeard.name: Barktooth Warbeard
Barktooth Warbeard.description: '''Barktooth Warbeard''' was an old soldier serving as a Marshal of the kentsu of Madara.

Barrin.name: Barrin
Barrin.description: '''Barrin''' was a legendary Master Wizard, husband of Rayne and the father of Hanna, who possessed an extremely high ability to learn and utilize magic. He aided Urza in the defense of Dominaria from its Phyrexian invaders.

Bartolomé del Presidio.name: Bartolomé del Presidio
Bartolomé del Presidio.description: '''Bartolomé del Presidio''' was a Legion of Dusk vampire knight and director of the Queen's Bay Company.

Batar Throatslasher.name: Batar Throatslasher
Batar Throatslasher.description: '''Batar Throatslasher''' was a Mardu warrior in Tarkir's original timeline, one of three wing leaders of Zurgo's warband. It is unknown if he exists in Tarkir's current timeline.

Bayul.name: Bayul
Bayul.description: Saint '''Bayul''' was a loxodon and a member of the Selesnya Conclave before the Decamillennial of Ravnica. He was the only member who traveled the world to spread the word of Conclave.

Bazzle.name: Bazzle
Bazzle.description: '''Bazzle''' was an elderly village clockworker from Innistrad, who was responsible for the creation of the Chronomaton.

Belaxis.name: Belaxis
Belaxis.description: '''Belaxis''' was a half-compleated Phyrexian from the Hunter Maze of New Phyrexia. He was impaled on Drivnod and used to form Vishgraz.

Belbe.name: Belbe
Belbe.description: '''Belbe''' (pronounced 'bell, bee') was a Skyshroud Elf and later Zombie Phyrexian who lived on Rath. She was the protagonist of the ''Nemesis'' novel.

Belenda Danisdotter.name: Belenda Danisdotter
Belenda Danisdotter.description: '''Belenda Danisdotter''' was a human soldier from the Ice Age, and friend of Jaya Ballard.

Bell Borca.name: Bell Borca
Bell Borca.description: Sergeant '''Bell Borca''' of the Tenth Leaguehall was a human rookie officer of the Wojek League from Ravnica, placed under the command of Agrus Kos. Borca was killed during a terrorist attack by a Rakdos goblin.

Belzenlok.name: Belzenlok
Belzenlok.description: The elder demon '''Belzenlok''' was one of the four demons who dealt with Liliana Vess following the Mending.

Ben-Ben.name: Ben-Ben
Ben-Ben.description: '''Ben-Ben''' (BEHN-behn; ) was a foul-smelling outcast akki hermit on Kamigawa. An eccentric goblin, he was smarter than the average akki and known to wear an octopus on his head and carry lotus flowers. He possessed the ability to manipulate stones with his mind through a ritual he performed by wheezing and coughing.

Bernatheen.name: Bernatheen
Bernatheen.description: '''Bernatheen''' was a Wizard Savant before Reveka's time, who infamously made Eron the Relentless immortal and was turned into a werewolf by Baron Sengir.

Bikov.name: Bikov
Bikov.description: Marshal '''Bikov''' was a merfolk lord of House Bikov in Arathoxia on Corondor, and the lord of the docks of Arathoxia and the Western Isles.

Biracazir.name: Biracazir
Biracazir.description: '''Biracazir''' was the wolf mount of the ledev wolfrider Fonn Zunich on Ravnica. He was sired by Voja.

Black-Nose.name: Black-Nose
Black-Nose.description: '''Black-Nose''' was a nezumi ninja. Black-Nose was one of the group of wanderers trapped by the kami in a castle with Keimi the Minamo mage, Hojo the samurai, Saite the orochi archer, and Niseno the yamabushi shaman, who was in fact Sakashima. His ninjutsu skills helped the whole group survive the kami's siege.

Bly.name: Bly
Bly.description: '''Bly''' was a caravan merchant and a former soldier, trading between Penregon in Argive and Tocasia's Digsite in the Great Desert of Terisiare, on the plane of Dominaria.

Bo Levar.name: Bo Levar
Bo Levar.description: '''Bo Levar''', formerly '''Crucias''', was an interplanar smuggler who transported goods across the boundaries of the planes. He was recruited by Urza as one of the Nine Titans and placed one of the soul bombs on Phyrexia.
planes: File:Crucias Titan of the Waves.jpg|left|thumb|201x201px|Before becoming a planeswalker
Gutting of Phyrexia|plant the bombs and destroy the plane

biographical_info.lifetime: The Time of Legends-War with Phyrexia

Bontu.name: Bontu
Bontu.description: Crocodile-headed '''Bontu''' was the Amonkhet god of ambition.

Boris.name: Boris
Boris.description: '''Boris''' was an Umbris cultist from Traublassen, Innistrad, and the son of Lord Vytas.

Boris Devilboon.name: Boris Devilboon
Boris Devilboon.description: '''Boris Devilboon''', later known as '''Dead Boris''', was a wizard and a minion of the imperial assassin Ramses Overdark.

Bosh.name: Bosh
Bosh.description: '''Bosh''' was a golem that lived on Mirrodin. Just like his companion Glissa Sunseeker, he sought the truth. His truth was his lost memory, and an understanding of his place in a world he no longer recognized.

Brago.name: Brago
Brago.description: '''Brago''' a.k.a. '''The King Eternal''' was a spirit that ruled the High City of Paliano on the plane of Fiora.

Brandt.name: Brandt
Brandt.description: '''Brandt''' was a vampire hunter on Innistrad who had Strefan Maurer as his prime target for years.

Branko.name: Branko
Branko.description: '''Branko''', known in later life as '''Branko One-Ear''', was a guard at the Azorius Detention Compound on the plane of Ravnica. He stood over seven feet tall, with broad and muscular shoulders. He wielded a stun baton.

Brion Stoutarm.name: Brion Stoutarm
Brion Stoutarm.description: '''Brion Stoutarm''' was a giant of Lorwyn. Brion was at least forty feet tall, but he was built broad and round like some great shambling hillock. His head was as bald as an egg, and his crown sloped down to a huge, curved brow that cast shadows over his deep-set eyes. Brion’s nose was wide and bulbous. His thick, lantern jaw was twisted by an underbite that forced a row of tusklike fangs over his upper lip like a poorly laid fence. Brion’s earlobes were long and drooping, and they wagged every...

Brisela.name: Brisela
Brisela.description: '''Brisela''' was created from the broken bodies and minds of Bruna and Gisela. Once two of the most powerful angels on Innistrad, they were conscripted by Emrakul and are now melded together to serve as the Eldrazi titan's messenger.

Bruna.name: Bruna
Bruna.description: '''Bruna''', the ''Light of Alabaster'', was an Angel from Innistrad. She was the leader of the Flight of Alabaster. She was eldrazified by Emrakul.

Burke.name: Burke
Burke.description: '''Burke,''' Laquatus's Champion, was a nightmare-horror created by Chainer with the Mirari for Ambassador Laquatus to serve as a replacement servant for the merman following Turg's death.

Busjaw.name: Busjaw
Busjaw.description: '''Busjaw''' was a goblin from the Red Mountains of Oneah, part of the Domains of Dominaria.

biographical_info.birthplace: Red Mountains, Oneah, the Domains, Dominaria

Callaphe.name: Callaphe
Callaphe.description: '''Callaphe the Mariner''' was a human trickster from Meletis who sailed a ship called ''The Monsoon''. Now she is Thassa's chosen demigod.

biographical_info.lifetime: Born centuries ago, reborn as a demigod in the Mending Era

Calmont.name: Calmont
Calmont.description: '''Calmont''' was an influential bureaucrat in Aysen on Ulgrotha around the time of the Homelands (ca. 3800 AR).

Carlo.name: Carlo
Carlo.description: '''Carlo''' was a human avenger pilot from Kroog during the time of the Brothers' War.

Carth.name: Carth
Carth.description: The '''Son of Carth''', sometimes called simply "'''Carth'''" or the '''Lion of Carth''' was a native of Corondor on Dominaria with the crescent moon Mark of the Elder Druid on his cheek. His true name was never revealed.

Cassie An-Havva.name: Cassie An-Havva
Cassie An-Havva.description: '''Cassie An-Havva''' was a villager of An-Havva who had a close encounter with Sengir's Black Carriage and was saved by Feroz.

Cecilee.name: Cecilee
Cecilee.description: '''Cecilee''' was a blonde elven druid who tried to make a Selesnyan enclave in the Rubblebelt of Ravnica. She had a connection with the Worldsoul of Ravnica, and followed its voice through her work, but during an attack by Rakdos cultists, Cecilee was killed by Massacre Girl.

Chaeska.name: Chaeska
Chaeska.description: '''Chaeska''', Keeper of Tresserhorn, was the strongest of Lim-Dûl's undead minions during the Ice Age of Dominaria.

Chainer.name: Chainer
Chainer.description: '''Chainer''' was a Dominarian pit-fighter and a dementia caster for the Cabal. As a cabalist, the name "Chainer" was a nickname, while his secret name was '''Mazeura'''. Chainer was the first person known to have found the Mirari on Dominaria. Initially, he was able to resist its lure, but ultimately, he became obsessed with it and was consumed by its power.

Chandler.name: Chandler
Chandler.description: '''Chandler''' was a human on Ulgrotha. Chandler was one of the best-known rogues in the Homelands. He was a con man who had visited every city and village of the Homelands ever since he was old enough to travel the roads. Born with a knack for scams, Chandler was obsessed with liberating magical toys and mechanical devices from their owners. His preferred target was the Wizards' School on the Floating Island. The Wizard Savant of the Wizards School had placed a good-sized bounty on Chandler's h...

Chanto Umezawa.name: Chanto Umezawa
Chanto Umezawa.description: '''Chanto Umezawa''' (oo-meh-ZAH-wah) was the father of Haki Umezawa and the grandfather of Tetsuo Umezawa. He was a distant descendant of Toshiro Umezawa.

Chayum-Icha.name: Chayum-Icha
Chayum-Icha.description: '''Chayum-Icha''' was one of the founders of the Third Path, the representative of the Yumok who came with knowledge of their forest home.

Cheyne.name: Cheyne
Cheyne.description: '''Cheyne''' was an archaeologist in Almaaz. Cheyne was the foster son of Javin. He had piercing blue eyes a thatch of dark blond hair and wore a broad-rimmed hat when digging in the desert, and a kaffiyeh when wandering the streets of New Sumifa. Through some magic he did know the source of, he was unable to see his reflection, seeing only a blurred image when looking into any mirror or reflective surface. Cheyne was "more than twenty" at the time of the rediscovery of old Sumifa (3050 AR or 15...

Chiyo.name: Chiyo
Chiyo.description: '''Chiyo''' was a soratami prophet, tactician and warrior from Kamigawa. She was the most advanced disciple of Uyo, the silent prophet, and a devoted follower and a right hand of Mochi, the Smiling Kami of Crescent Moon, the patron spirit of soratami.

Cho-Manno.name: Cho-Manno
Cho-Manno.description: '''Cho-Manno''' was the spiritual and political leader of the Cho-Arrim on Mercadia and a devout follower of the Ramos mythology.

Chondeah.name: Chondeah
Chondeah.description: '''Chondeah''' (sometimes spelled '''Chondaeh'''), was a young woman from the Kingdom of Shikar who was determined to be the most powerful wizard in the kingdom.

Chorus of the Conclave.name: Chorus of the Conclave
Chorus of the Conclave.description: The '''Chorus of the Conclave''' was a collective mind of Dryads on Ravnica that at one point led the Selesnya Conclave.

Choryu.name: Choryu
Choryu.description: '''Choryu''' was a talented water wizard of the Minamo Academy on Kamigawa. He was a friend of princess Michiko Konda. Unbeknownst to her, he was also an agent of Minamo and its soratami masters, placed in Michiko's vicinity to ensure that the princess's activities were monitored. He was of medium height, with a white mane of hair.

Chromium Rhuell.name: Chromium Rhuell
Chromium Rhuell.description: '''Chromium Rhuell''' was a famous Elder Dragon with shapeshifting powers. He was long and sleek, his scales had a metallic sheen, and he had confident and curious nature. Chromium was killed by Tevesh Szat at the end of the Ice Age.
planes: Ice Age on the World of Magic: The Gathering

Chunth.name: Chunth
Chunth.description: Elder '''Chunth''', ''The First One'', was a troll on Mirrodin. He had no metal attached to his body and detested the metallic world. He was the leader of the trolls who recorded the history on the Tree of Tales within the Tangle.

Cisarzim.name: Cisarzim
Cisarzim.description: '''Cisarzim, the Lord of Chaos''' was the parun of the Gruul Clans, and participated in the Signing of the Guildpact.

Claria.name: Claria
Claria.description: '''Claria''' was a lady and cartographer in Sumifa.

Clavileño.name: Clavileño
Clavileño.description: '''Clavileño''' was a Legion of Dusk vampire cleric from Ixalan. He was granted demonic power by Aclazotz before his death.

Coernn.name: Coernn
Coernn.description: '''Coernn''' was a sorcerer in the Dark Age of Terisiare, on the plane of Dominaria.

Colfenor.name: Colfenor
Colfenor.description: '''Colfenor''' was one of the most ancient and wisest treefolk sages on the plane of Lorwyn. He was the only and last living red yew treefolk. The yew treefolk were powerful shamans, and their poison magic, one of the strongest types of magic overall, was unequalled on Lorwyn.

Crank (character).name: Crank (character)
Crank (character).description: '''Crank''' was the first goblin king of Ulgrotha at Koskun Keep.

Croag.name: Croag
Croag.description: '''Croag''' was a Phyrexian member of Yawgmoth's Inner Circle, and worked as the lord over the Evincar of Rath.

Cullinarn.name: Cullinarn
Cullinarn.description: '''Cullinarn''' was the master of the House of Oor-tael in Estark, on Dominaria, and the father of Garth One-eye.

Cymede.name: Cymede
Cymede.description: '''Cymede''' was the queen of Akros on Theros, a devoted follower of Keranos and wife of Anax.

Daghatar.name: Daghatar
Daghatar.description: '''Daghatar''' was the khan of the Abzan tribe on Tarkir at the point in time when Sarkhan returned to the past to save Ugin from Nicol Bolas.

biographical_info.lifetime: Before and after the Khanfall (the Thaw)

Dalto.name: Dalto
Dalto.description: '''Dalto''' was a mercenary on Shandalar who was hired to bring back a chest containing the key to the Onakke Catacombs.

Damon.name: Damon
Damon.description: '''Damon''' was a wizard who lived during the early part of the Thaw of Terisiare, on the plane of Dominaria.

Daria.name: Daria
Daria.description: '''Daria''' was a young human girl from Ulgrotha whose planeswalker's spark triggered early in life. She was recruited by Urza as one of the Nine Titans.

Darien.name: Darien
Darien.description: right|thumb|300px|Excerpt from ''The Eternal Ice'' '''Darien the Great''' was one of many kings to go by the name of "Darien". Darien the Great was among the most important ones, as he ruled over Kjeldor at the end of the Ice Age of Dominaria, and fused his land with Balduvia into [[New Argive]...

Darka.name: Darka
Darka.description: '''Darka''' was an ainok Atarka-clan tracker and experienced hunter in the past of Tarkir.

Davvol.name: Davvol
Davvol.description: '''Davvol''' was the first evincar to rule the artificial plane, Rath.

Daxos.name: Daxos
Daxos.description: '''Daxos''' is a demigod from Theros. He used to be a human soldier and an oracle of Heliod living at the temple compound in Meletis. Later he had become the friend, mentor, and lover of the planeswalker Elspeth Tirel.

Deguhe.name: Deguhe
Deguhe.description: '''Deguhe''' was a graverobber in the Dark Age of Terisiare, on the plane of Dominaria.

Dein Salvasi.name: Dein Salvasi
Dein Salvasi.description: '''Dein Salvasi''' was a wealthy man in the small village of Lambholt on the plane of Innistrad, known for being pious and influential. He became a central figure in a tragic series of events involving mysterious deaths and disappearances, which were linked to a creature known as Old Stickfingers.

Delphine.name: Delphine
Delphine.description: Primata '''Delphine''' was a priestess and inquisitor of the Church of Tal during The Dark Age of Dominaria. She formed part of the Order of St. Zil.

Digody.name: Digody
Digody.description: '''Digody''' was an advisor to Lord Peemel in the city-state of Iwset in the Dark Age of Terisiare, on the plane of Dominaria.

Disa.name: Disa
Disa.description: '''Disa''' ''the Restless'' was a human Kjeldoran explorer, scout and writer on Dominaria during the Ice Age. She was married to the Elder Druid Kolbjörn and was the adoptive mother of Kaysa.
planes: Ice Age on the World of Magic: The Gathering

Dokai.name: Dokai
Dokai.description: '''Dokai''' (DOH-keye), ''Weaver of Life'', is a human monk of Kamigawa from the time of the Kami War.

Donal Alloway.name: Donal Alloway
Donal Alloway.description: '''Donal Alloway''' was a kithkin from the Shadowmoor plane. Alloway was the warrior-cenn of the doun of Kinscaer.

Donal (Mirrodin).name: Donal (Mirrodin)
Donal (Mirrodin).description: '''Donal''' was a Neurok human on the plane of Mirrodin, and Bruenna's father.

Donner Rus.name: Donner Rus
Donner Rus.description: '''Donner Rus''' was a potion-master and master poisoner from Dominaria.

Dosan.name: Dosan
Dosan.description: Master '''Dosan''' (DOH-sahn; |Dōsan|Road Three Each time wanderers entered the forest seeking enlightenment, Dosan was there. waiting for them to arrive. In this way, he met Azusa, the plane's most famous wanderer, and became her teacher.

Drafna.name: Drafna
Drafna.description: The sage '''Drafna''' was the co-founder and leader of the College of Lat-Nam on Terisiare during the Brothers' War of Dominaria. He and his wife also participated in the Union of the Third Path and afterward counted as two of its founders. The Third Path would overtake Lat-Nam as Drafna's main focus afterward.

Dralnu.name: Dralnu
Dralnu.description: '''Dralnu''' was an undead necromancer from Urborg who aided the Coalition forces before betraying them.

Drasus.name: Drasus
Drasus.description: '''Drasus''' was one of Kytheon Iora's irregulars from Akros on the plane of Theros.

Dreygar.name: Dreygar
Dreygar.description: '''Dreygar''' was a wizard of the Western Domains who, according to a Dominarian fable, overtook Aldon's Castle and ruled there as a tyrant.

Dwynen.name: Dwynen
Dwynen.description: '''Dwynen''' was a daen of the Gilt Leaf on Lorwyn.

Ebi.name: Ebi
Ebi.description: '''Ebi''' was a kor sentry at the reclaimed Sea Gate on the plane Zendikar. While on guard, he ran afoul of Ob Nixilis.

Edara.name: Edara
Edara.description: '''Edara''' was the lady of Jehesic in the Dark Age of Terisiare, on the plane of Dominaria.

Eesha.name: Eesha
Eesha.description: Commander '''Eesha''' was an aven leader of the northern branch of the Order on Otaria, Dominaria.

Ehsan.name: Ehsan
Ehsan.description: '''Ehsan''' was a Fallaji soldier who fought on the side of Mishra in the Brothers' War.

Eidren.name: Eidren
Eidren.description: '''Eidren''' was a Lorwyn elf of the Gilt Leaf tribe.

Eight-and-a-Half-Tails.name: Eight-and-a-Half-Tails
Eight-and-a-Half-Tails.description: '''Eight-and-a-Half-Tails''' (ツ|Yatsu-O-Han An extremely skilled cleric and healer, his nine tails were a product of a long journey marked by several spiritual, practical, and emotional achievements, each of which brought him a new tail. He was an unusual kitsune since his birth - instead of being born with a pure white-tail, he had a black streak in it. This was seen as an omen of great destiny, of changing the world.

Eitoku.name: Eitoku
Eitoku.description: '''Eitoku''' was a soratami bushi from Kamigawa, who was set on a task in Numai together with his shinobi partner by Chiyo.

Eladamri.name: Eladamri
Eladamri.description: '''Eladamri''' was the leader of the Skyshroud elves of Rath during the reigns of Volrath and Crovax. Though he was a skilled warrior, his greatest talent was his leadership, which he used first to unite the people of Rath in resistance against the evincars and later to tie together the various peoples of the Coalition on Dominaria.

Elamon.name: Elamon
Elamon.description: '''Elamon''' was a human hero from Hanweir, Innistrad.

Élan d'Avenant.name: Élan d'Avenant
Élan d'Avenant.description: '''Élan d'Avenant''' was an archer squire of the Order of the D'Avenant on Dominaria.

Elazar.name: Elazar
Elazar.description: '''Elazar''' was the Sixth Baron of Boite in Golthonor of ancient Corondor.

Elesh Norn.name: Elesh Norn
Elesh Norn.description: '''Elesh Norn''' (Phyrexian: Ducg,norn, IPA: [ʔelʃ norn]) was the Praetor of the white-aligned Machine Orthodoxy, which led New Phyrexia.
planes: New Phyrexia (plane)#The Seven Steel Thanes|Black Thanes
File:Cut A Deal.jpg|thumb|259x259px|Elesh Norn uniting most of [[New New Phyrexia

Elkan.name: Elkan
Elkan.description: '''Elkan''' was a mage from Balduvia who lived during the transition from the Ice Age to the Thaw of Terisiare, on the plane of Dominaria.

Elsi Rimheit.name: Elsi Rimheit
Elsi Rimheit.description: '''Elsi Rimehit''' was an 8-year old girl who was bitten by a werewolf and possibly executed by cathars of the Church of Avacyn on the plane of Innistrad.

Emil.name: Emil
Emil.description: '''Emil''' was a Wojek officer who investigated the scene of a Cult of Rakdos massacre in Merrytown.

Endrek Sahr.name: Endrek Sahr
Endrek Sahr.description: '''Endrek Sahr''' (EHN-drek SAHR) was a wizard affiliated with the Order of the Ebon Hand in Dominarian Sarpadia. Styling himself "Creator of Life and Race Architect", Sahr was responsible for creating the first thrulls as servants and objects of sacrifice for the Order.

Enkindi.name: Enkindi
Enkindi.description: '''Enkindi''' was the leader of a band of Kor kitesailers from Zendikar, who recruited Drana and her vampires to fight for Gideon's forces during the Battle for Zendikar.

Epikos.name: Epikos
Epikos.description: '''Epikos''' was one of Kytheon Iora's Akroan irregulars on the plane of Theros.

Erayo.name: Erayo
Erayo.description: '''Erayo''' (eh-RYE-oh), ''Soratami Ascendent'', was a moonfolk monk of kamigawa.

Ervos Trax.name: Ervos Trax
Ervos Trax.description: '''Ervos Trax''' was Marchesa's smuggler and business partner on the plane of Fiora. Ervos's criminal empire stretched from the lowlands to the city of Talon and the docks beyond.

Eska.name: Eska
Eska.description: '''Eska''' was a woman from Thetia who became Archmage Xarl Angel-Keeper 27th wife instead of being sacrificed to the fallen angel Trine. She was the great-great-grandmother of Eskil.

Etali.name: Etali
Etali.description: '''Etali''', "the hurricane," was an elder dinosaur from Ixalan.

biographical_info.race: Phyrexian Elder Dinosaur Previously Elder Dinosaur

Evangela.name: Evangela
Evangela.description: '''Lady Evangela''' was a legendary human cleric who lived in ancient times on Dominaria, before the Brothers' War.

Extus Narr.name: Extus Narr
Extus Narr.description: '''Extus Narr''' was a shadowy figure on Arcavios. He lurked in the shadows of Strixhaven and was the head of the Oriq.

Ezer.name: Ezer
Ezer.description: '''Ezer''' (EE-zur) was Adam Carthalion’s spellsquire, who was entrusted with the care of Adam’s infant son, Jared, at the Battle of Aster Fall.

Farid.name: Farid
Farid.description: '''Farid''' was a Tomakul soldier who fought on the side of Mishra in the Brothers' War. Born after the war's start, he served as a Fallaji brasscap on the Mardun and Argivian fronts during the Tomakul Campaign.

Fask.name: Fask
Fask.description: '''Fask''' was a warlord of Kroog on the plane Dominaria.

Fec.name: Fec
Fec.description: '''Fec''' was an orc member of Yasova Dragonclaw's hunting party, two generations after the Khanfall on Tarkir.

Feldon.name: Feldon
Feldon.description: '''Feldon''' was an important archeologist, linguist, glaciologist, and mage during the Brothers' War on Dominaria.

biographical_info.birthplace: Northern Uplands, near Ronom Glacier, Terisiare, Dominaria

Ferantia.name: Ferantia
Ferantia.description: '''Ferantia''' was a Jehesic woman during the Dark Age of Dominaria.

Ferrous Rokiric.name: Ferrous Rokiric
Ferrous Rokiric.description: '''Ferrous Rokiric''' was a legendary Wojek Commander-General from Ravnica. He was responsible for bringing the stone Titans of Ravnica to the City of Ravnica in the fourth century of the first millennium. The Rokiric Pavilion is named after him.

Feryar.name: Feryar
Feryar.description: '''Feryar''' was an elf of Loch Prith, and husband of the Prophetess Thrissa.

Fiero Vespin.name: Fiero Vespin
Fiero Vespin.description: '''Fiero Vespin''' was an art dealer in New Capenna, whose own schemes led to his demise.

Fire Eye.name: Fire Eye
Fire Eye.description: '''Fire Eye''' was the Viashino Bey of Shiv in 3346 AR, when Urza came to take control of the Mana Rig.

Flann.name: Flann
Flann.description: '''Flann''' was an ash treefolk of Lorwyn, known to most as the Wanderer, a giver of great knowledge.

Forenzad.name: Forenzad
Forenzad.description: '''Forenzad''' was a wojek Section Commander of the Third Section in 9999 Z.C., present during Kos' promotion hearing on Ravnica.

biographical_info.title: Section Commander of the Third District

Fost.name: Fost
Fost.description: Trooper '''Fost''' was a member of Captain Hask's group of soldiers on Dominaria.

Freyalise.name: Freyalise
Freyalise.description: '''Freyalise''' (fray-uh-LEEZ) was a half-elven planeswalker from Dominaria.
planes: Ice Age on the World of Magic: The Gathering

Fumiko.name: Fumiko
Fumiko.description: '''Fumiko''' (FOO-mee-ko), ''the Lowblood'', was a human samurai of kamigawa during the time of the Kami War.

Gaddock Teeg.name: Gaddock Teeg
Gaddock Teeg.description: '''Gaddock Teeg''' was a cenn of the largest Lorwyn kithkin clachan, Kinsbaile. He was an eloquent speaker and politician, believing that almost any disagreement could be resolved by proper talking, offers, denials, and compromises. His right hand was Kinsbaile's heroine, archer Brigid Baeli.

Gæller No-Breath.name: Gæller No-Breath
Gæller No-Breath.description: '''Gæller No-Breath''' is a deceased Omenseeker from Kaldheim, who is enjoying his afterlife in the great hall of Starnheim.

Galina.name: Galina
Galina.description: Empress '''Galina''' III ("Her Serene Highness") was the ruler of the Vodalian merfolk empire in the Voda Sea near Sarpadia (Dominaria).

Galo Aher.name: Galo Aher
Galo Aher.description: '''Galo Aher''' was a Knight of Bant and a member of the Order of the White Orchid. He was considered a paragon of honor but was killed by a blast of fire while battling invaders from the shard of Jund. A sigil was created in his image which protected the bearer from pyromancy and similar forms of hostile magic.

biographical_info.lifetime: Birth unknown, died during the Conflux

Gatha.name: Gatha
Gatha.description: '''Gatha''' was a researcher on Urza's Bloodline Project on Dominaria, who went rogue and continued his research in Keld.

Genub.name: Genub
Genub.description: '''Genub''' was an Amonkheti human who fell during the Hour of Devasation.

Geth.name: Geth
Geth.description: '''Geth''' was a Moriok lich-head who was instrumental in the fall of Memnarch. He was one of the Seven Steel Thanes of New Phyrexia, known as the '''Thane of Contracts''', before being Compleated fully into the Phyrexian Insect '''Vishgraz''' by Ixhel.

biographical_info.race: Geth: Phyrexian Zombie, former Moriok LichVishgraz: Insect Phyrexian

Gisela.name: Gisela
Gisela.description: '''Gisela''' was an Angel from Innistrad. She was the leader of the Flight of Goldnight. She was eldrazified by Emrakul and slain by her own sister.

Gix.name: Gix
Gix.description: '''Gix''' was a Phyrexian demon and praetor who served as one of the highest-ranking lieutenants to the Dark God Yawgmoth. Originally a human Thran from the continent of Terisiare on the plane of'' Dominaria'', Gix was converted into a Phyrexian Demon by Yawgmoth himself during the events of the Thran-Phyrexian War. His demon body was built of bone, machine parts, and soft meat.

biographical_info.lifetime: The Time of the Thran - The Thaw

Glacian.name: Glacian
Glacian.description: '''Glacian''' was an ancient Thran artificer who designed many of the Thran Empire's most powerful artifacts, including the powerstones on which Thran technology was based.

biographical_info.lifetime: The Time of the Thran, ~-5000 AR

Godo.name: Godo
Godo.description: '''Godo''' (GOH-doh; |Godō Godo was a huge man, broad and powerful, but he seemed even larger and more formidable mounted atop his burly mountain yak. His huge bald head steamed in the cold, and his thin top-knot twisted in the breeze behind him. Three long spears sprouted from the back of his saddle, and a huge, spiked log on a chain thudded against the yak's thick fur. Some said that Godo didn't fight with the log but instead hurled it at his enemies as a weapon for them to use. Those that wer...

Goka.name: Goka
Goka.description: '''Goka''' (GOH-kah), ''the Unjust'', is a ogre shaman of Kamigawa.

Golden-Tail.name: Golden-Tail
Golden-Tail.description: '''Golden-Tail''' (|Kin-no-O Even the best kitsune samurai were honored to call him their sensei. He taught martial arts in the traditional kitsune style: a katana in the favored hand, with a jitte or sai in the offhand for parrying and blade-tangling. He never spoke during a lesson, teaching with his body alone.

Go-Shintai of Boundless Vigor.name: Go-Shintai of Boundless Vigor
Go-Shintai of Boundless Vigor.description: The '''Go-Shintai of Boundless Vigor''' was a legendary shrine housing a Kami of Boundless Vigor.

Gosta Dirk.name: Gosta Dirk
Gosta Dirk.description: '''Gosta Dirk''' was a warrior born on Kusho, on the plane of Dominaria.

Grakmaw.name: Grakmaw
Grakmaw.description: '''Grakmaw''' was a massive hydra horror that lurked for centuries in the shadows of a fallen Skyclave on Jwar Isle in Ondu, Zendikar.

Greel.name: Greel
Greel.description: '''Greel''' was a humanoid horror in league with the Keldons during the Keldon Invasion of Jamuraa on Dominaria.

Gregor (Dominaria).name: Gregor (Dominaria)
Gregor (Dominaria).description: Sir '''Gregor''' was a Knight of Kjeldor at the time of the Ice Age of Dominaria.

Greven il-Vec.name: Greven il-Vec
Greven il-Vec.description: '''Greven ''il''-Vec''' was the man in command of the skyship ''Predator'' and the armies of Rath.

Grim Captain.name: Grim Captain
Grim Captain.description: The '''Grim Captain''' is an undead pirate captain from Ixalan.

Griselbrand.name: Griselbrand
Griselbrand.description: '''Griselbrand''' was one of the demonic masters of Liliana Vess. He granted her the power over death.

Groth Jonar.name: Groth Jonar
Groth Jonar.description: '''Groth Jonar''' was an orc from Balduvia who lived during the transition from the Ice Age to the Thaw of Terisiare, on the plane of Dominaria.

Gryffid.name: Gryffid
Gryffid.description: '''Gryffid''' was an elvish hunter of the Gilt Leaf tribe. He used to be a second-in-command of daen Rhys of the Hemlock pack. After Rhys used non-standard sources as a backup plan in the elvish campaign (two giants), he was punished and Gryffid was elevated to Rhys's rank.

Guff.name: Guff
Guff.description: Commodore '''Guff''' was a very old planeswalker that lived in a hidden library on Dominaria. This library contained every book ever written, including the books that held the destiny of the multiverse.

Gull.name: Gull
Gull.description: '''Gull''' was a human woodcutter from North Aerona on Dominaria. Traveling with his planeswalker sister Greensleeves, he became an experienced fighter against evil wizards.

Gulsen.name: Gulsen
Gulsen.description: '''Gulsen''' was an abbey matron on Ulgrotha around the time of the Homelands (ca. 3800 AR). She was a figure of unwavering faith and dedicated service in the city of Onella in the country of Aysen.

Gunamo.name: Gunamo
Gunamo.description: Commander '''Gunamo''' was an Aerathi commander in the Kentsu on Dominaria.

Gurgel Brothers.name: Gurgel Brothers
Gurgel Brothers.description: '''The Gurgel Brothers''' were a fraternal goblin team who hired themselves out as a guide across the Teeth of Akoum.

Gurias.name: Gurias
Gurias.description: '''Gurias''' of Tolaria was a young wizard from the Smoke Mountains of Aerona, on Dominaria.

biographical_info.birthplace: Smoke Mountains, Aerona, the Domains, Dominaria

Gustha Ebbasdotter.name: Gustha Ebbasdotter
Gustha Ebbasdotter.description: '''Gustha Ebbasdotter''' was the royal mage of Kjeldor at the time of the Ice Age of Dominaria.

Gwendlyn Di Corci.name: Gwendlyn Di Corci
Gwendlyn Di Corci.description: '''Gwendlyn Di Corci''' was a legendary figure known as one of the greatest temptresses of Dominarian lore.

biographical_info.birthplace: Urborg, Burning Isles, the Domains, Dominiaria

Gwendolyn Carthalion.name: Gwendolyn Carthalion
Gwendolyn Carthalion.description: '''Gwendolyn Carthalion''' (née Gwendolyn Mor) was a blue mage, the daughter of Grenfell Mor, and the wife of Adam Carthalion, as well as Jared Carthalion’s mother.

Gwenna.name: Gwenna
Gwenna.description: '''Gwenna''', the ''Eyes of Gaea'', was an elven druid and scout from Dominaria during the time of the Sylex Blast.

Gydolien Mor.name: Gydolien Mor
Gydolien Mor.description: '''Gydolien Mor''', sometimes referred to as '''Gydolien M'r''' was a young woman from the Kingdom of Khone on Dominaria.

Haakon.name: Haakon
Haakon.description: '''Haakon''' was the undead leader of the Order of Stromgald in Terisiare and lord of Tresserhorn.

Haen.name: Haen
Haen.description: '''Haen''' was the Keeper of the Clan Tree of Cridhe during the Parting.

Hajar.name: Hajar
Hajar.description: '''Hajar''' was a Fallaji nomad on Dominaria, son of his tribe's chieftain.

Haki Umezawa.name: Haki Umezawa
Haki Umezawa.description: '''Haki Umezawa''' (oo-meh-ZAH-wah) was the father of Tetsuo Umezawa and the son of Chanto Umezawa.

Halfdane.name: Halfdane
Halfdane.description: '''Halfdane''' (also ''''Dane''') was a shapeshifter from Tolaria on the plane of Dominaria that was obsessed with his reflection. Halfdane was a mentally unstable killer, responsible for the deaths of Kei Takahashi, Barktooth Warbeard, Ragnar, and Ramirez DePietro (according to both Halfdane and Ramirez himself).

biographical_info.born: Likely before 3300 AR, possibly as early as the Time of Legends

Hamu.name: Hamu
Hamu.description: '''Hamu''' was a minotaur from Hurloon. Distraught at an injury, Hamu ventured out of his village in Hurloon to let himself die. On the way, he found a wounded, pregnant human named Ikenet in the snow of the Hurloon mountains. He took her in and cared for her, and they became friends. She was an acrobat from a wandering troupe who was expelled when she became pregnant with their ringleader's child. She taught him how to dance, tended to his home, and brewed tea. He provided her with food and she...

Hans Eriksson.name: Hans Eriksson
Hans Eriksson.description: '''Hans Eriksson''' was a human scout from the Ice Age. He was the brother of Saffi Eriksdotter. One day, when he and Saffi were on guard duty, the pair was attacked by a Lhurgoyf. His sister was killed in the attack, whereas Hans ran to the town to warn others. The lhurgoyf later attacked the town mead hall where the warriors gathered, but once again Hans managed to stay unharmed.

Haqikah.name: Haqikah
Haqikah.description: '''Haqikah''', nicknamed '''Haq''', was a human from Naktamun on the plane of Amonkhet.

Harbin.name: Harbin
Harbin.description: '''Harbin''' was the son of Kayla bin-Kroog, and either Urza or his brother Mishra. He was raised as Urza's son, though he did not meet Urza until he was more than two years old, and Urza privately questioned whether the boy was, in fact, his child.

Harcu.name: Harcu
Harcu.description: '''Harcu''' was a mercenary on Shandalar who was hired to bring back a chest containing the key to the Onakke Catacombs.

Hazduhr.name: Hazduhr
Hazduhr.description: '''Hazduhr''', the Abbot of Onella also called the "Venerable Abbot", was chosen by Serra from the people of Onella, on Ulgrotha, after the previous Abbot died, and was chosen for his potential and his open-mindedness. The Abbot was responsible for the spiritual and moral well-being of all Aysen. The last Abbot Serra chose before she left Ulgrotha was Hazduhr the Abbot.

Hazezon Tamar.name: Hazezon Tamar
Hazezon Tamar.description: '''Hazezon Tamar''' was the governor of Bryce on Dominaria, during the time the city-state experienced Johan's War, a conflict with Tirras orchestrated by Johan.

Heidar.name: Heidar
Heidar.description: '''Heidar''' was a Dominarian cryomaster who lived at the time of the Thaw. As the leader of the Cult of Rimewind, he styled himself Master of Rimewind Keep, Chosen of the Blessed Cold, and Savior of the Boreal lands.

Heliod.name: Heliod
Heliod.description: '''Heliod''' (''HEE-lee-ahd'') was the God of the Sun on Theros. After his followers were converted, he was ''compleated'' during New Phyrexia's Invasion of the Multiverse and killed by Kaya Cassir at its conclusion.

Helligan.name: Helligan
Helligan.description: '''Helligan''' was a member of the Wojek League on Ravnica, He was a labmage and a chief of the Tenth Leaguehall mortuary. He was extremely skilled in postmortem analysis.

Heptane.name: Heptane
Heptane.description: '''Heptane''' was a red dragon, one of the five dragon chiefs and a slave lord, who shared the rule of the Obsidian Well with Varuna, Macumba, Pizoondertanx, and Siliq.

Higure.name: Higure
Higure.description: '''Higure''' (HEE-goo-reh), ''the Still Wind'', was a human ninja of Kamigawa during the time of the Kami War.

Holger Burk.name: Holger Burk
Holger Burk.description: '''Holger Burk''' was a silversmith who became a werewolf, on the plane of Innistrad.

Homura.name: Homura
Homura.description: '''Homura''' (HOH-moo-rah), ''Human Ascendant'', was a human monk of Kamigawa from the time of the Kami War.

Hope of Ghirapur.name: Hope of Ghirapur
Hope of Ghirapur.description: The '''Hope of Ghirapur''' is a thopter created by Rashmi and Saheeli Rai that would be used to destroy the Planar Bridge.

Hormgart.name: Hormgart
Hormgart.description: '''Hormgart''' is a dwarven skald, who is living his afterlife in the great hall of Starnheim.

Hunding Gjornersen.name: Hunding Gjornersen
Hunding Gjornersen.description: '''Hunding Gjornersen''' was the first leader of the Dominarian band of thieves known as Robaran Mercenaries, scouting the Jamuraan seas around the 3300s AR.

Hurkyl.name: Hurkyl
Hurkyl.description: '''Hurkyl''' was a Master Wizard as well as one of the founders of the College of Lat-Nam and the Union of the Third Path during the Brothers' War on Dominaria. She was the wife of Drafna and played a major part in rediscovering magic on Terisiare.

Hurn.name: Hurn
Hurn.description: '''Hurn of Clan Pearl''' was the leader of Clan Pearl of Storgard, at the onset of the Ice Age of Dominaria.

Ib Halfheart.name: Ib Halfheart
Ib Halfheart.description: '''Ib Halfheart''' was a cowardly goblin leader in the ''Ice Age'' of Dominaria, notorious for his equally cowardly and uninspired tactical plans. He was timeshifted to the post-apocalyptic era.

Ihesia.name: Ihesia
Ihesia.description: '''Ihesia''' was the general-in-chief of Iwset in the Dark Age of Terisiare, on the plane of Dominaria.

Iizuka.name: Iizuka
Iizuka.description: ''' Iizuka''' (ee-EE-zoo-kah), ''the Ruthless'', was a Human Samurai of Kamigawa during the time of the Kami War.

Ikenet.name: Ikenet
Ikenet.description: '''Ikenet''' was a human from the village of Morningbrook in northern Aerona, who became a friend of the minotaurs of Hurloon.

biographical_info.birthplace: Morningbrook, Northern Aerona, the Domains, Dominaria

Iki Hisoka.name: Iki Hisoka
Iki Hisoka.description: Sensei '''Iki Hisoka''' (hee-SOH-kah) was a headmaster of the Minamo Academy on the plane of Kamigawa.

Ikra Shidiqi.name: Ikra Shidiqi
Ikra Shidiqi.description: '''Ikra Shidiqi''' was a naga from Tarkir's past. Shidiqi served as an advisor to the khan Tasigur for many years. However, after Tasigur offended the rakshasa Khudal, the naga quickly abandoned her master. She then joined Silumgar's forces as they overthrew Tasigur and took control of the Sultai Brood. Shidiqi took great pleasure in betraying Tasigur, and her cunning nature allowed her to be promoted to Silumgar's first dragonspeaker.

Ilvoro.name: Ilvoro
Ilvoro.description: '''Ilvoro''' was a merfolk lullmage mentor of Halimar with a Stonework Puma familiar who hired himself out as a guide across the Teeth of Akoum.

Ink-Eyes.name: Ink-Eyes
Ink-Eyes.description: '''Ink-Eyes''' (|Sumime She started as a lowly nezumi sneak, ostracized by the Okiba gang at a young age. She was the cruelest child in a cruel world, almost sociopathic in her desire to dominate her peers. As punishment, she was taken deep into the Takenuma swamp and left to fend for herself.

Isak Glen'Dard.name: Isak Glen'Dard
Isak Glen'Dard.description: '''Isak Glen'Dard''' was a shapeshifter messenger, diplomat and spy living in the Dark Age of Terisiare, on the plane of Dominaria.

Isamaru.name: Isamaru
Isamaru.description: '''Isamaru''' (ee-sah-MAH-roo; More than ten years old, Isamaru was present when Toshi Umezawa arrived to free Michiko from her room, where she was locked away by her father after her journey to Jukai. Later, when O-Kagachi approached Eiganjo, General Takeno released Isamaru from the gates of the castle to give the dog a chance to survive. Isamaru ran to Eiganjo's evacuated population and helped them fight the akki horde that assailed the Towabara plains.

Isao.name: Isao
Isao.description: '''Isao''' (EE-sow), ''Enlightened Bushi'', is a human samurai of Kamigawa during the time of the Kami War.

Ishi-Ishi.name: Ishi-Ishi
Ishi-Ishi.description: '''Ishi-Ishi''' (ee-shee-EE-shee; ) was an akki vigilante who lived in the Sokenzan Mountains of Kamigawa.

Ishikari Bindra.name: Ishikari Bindra
Ishikari Bindra.description: '''Ishikari Bindra''' was an inventor and aether specialist from Avishkar, and the creator of the Aetherspark.

Isperia.name: Isperia
Isperia.description: '''Isperia''' was the sphinx guildmaster to the Azorius Senate on ''Ravnica''.

Istvan.name: Istvan
Istvan.description: '''Uncle Istvan''' was a man from Terisiare during the Dark Age of Dominaria.

Ith.name: Ith
Ith.description: Lord '''Ith''' was a powerful wizard during the post-Brothers' War period on Terisiare (Dominaria). He was leader of the Conclave of Mages.

Iwamori.name: Iwamori
Iwamori.description: '''Iwamori''' (EE-wa-MOR-ee) ''of the Open Fist'' was a human monk of Kamigawa during the time of the Kami War.

Ixidor.name: Ixidor
Ixidor.description: '''Ixidor''' was a powerful wizard and well-known pit champion from Dominaria.

Izolda.name: Izolda
Izolda.description: '''Izolda''' was a Rakdos bloodwitch from Ravnica. She may have been the same character as '''Lyzolda'''.

Jacques le Vert.name: Jacques le Vert
Jacques le Vert.description: '''Jacques le Vert''' was a legendary human warrior who lived in ancient times on Dominaria, before the Brothers' War.

Jaeger Ojanen.name: Jaeger Ojanen
Jaeger Ojanen.description: '''Jaeger Ojanen''' was a tiger warrior and explorer from Efrava on Dominaria.

Jaeuhl Carthalion.name: Jaeuhl Carthalion
Jaeuhl Carthalion.description: '''Jaeuhl Carthalion''' (JAY-ull kar-THAL-ee-an) of the Carthalion lineage was a valiant Knight of Kjeldor in the latter part of Dominaria's Ice Age.
planes: Ice Age on the World of Magic: The Gathering

Janus.name: Janus
Janus.description: '''Janus''' ''of the Synod'' was one of the chief members of the vedalken Synod of Lumengrid on Mirrodin.

Jarad vod Savo.name: Jarad vod Savo
Jarad vod Savo.description: The Devkarin Elf Lich '''Jarad vod Savo''', or simply Jarad, was a former guild leader of the Golgari Swarm on Ravnica.

Jarin.name: Jarin
Jarin.description: '''Jarin''' was the war chief of the Ghestos tribe of the Fallaji Empire under Mishra.

Jarkeld.name: Jarkeld
Jarkeld.description: General '''Jarkeld''', known as the "Arctic Fox" for his tactical brilliance, was a military commander for Kjeldor during Dominaria's Ice Age.

Jarsyl.name: Jarsyl
Jarsyl.description: '''Jarsyl''' was a powerful wizard from Dominaria at the outset of the Dark Age.

Jasmine Boreal.name: Jasmine Boreal
Jasmine Boreal.description: '''Jasmine Boreal''' was a legendary human druid. She was, for a short time, a member of the Robaran Circle of Seven of Adira Strongheart in Jamuraa, four centuries after the Ice Age.

Jason Carthalion.name: Jason Carthalion
Jason Carthalion.description: '''Jason Carthalion''' (JAY-sun kar-THAL-ee-un), of the renowned Carthalion lineage, was a mighty hero from the Ice Age of Dominaria. He was a ward to Oriel Kjeldos, the champion of Clan Emerald of Storgard and a user of green mana.
planes: Ice Age on the World of Magic: The Gathering|Ice Age

biographical_info.lifetime: Ice Ice Age. Last seen alive in 2434 AR.

Javin.name: Javin
Javin.description: '''Javin''' was an archaeologist from Argivia who worked on excavating old Sumifa.

Jazal Goldmane.name: Jazal Goldmane
Jazal Goldmane.description: '''Jazal Goldmane''' was the elder brother of Ajani Goldmane and the kha of their Naya leonin tribe.

Jedhian.name: Jedhian
Jedhian.description: '''Jedhian''' was an inhabitant of Inys Haen, and direct descendant of Haen. He was also cousin of Aylith.

Jedit Ojanen.name: Jedit Ojanen
Jedit Ojanen.description: '''Jedit Ojanen''' was a tiger warrior and mercenary from Efrava on Dominaria.

Jek.name: Jek
Jek.description: '''Jek''' was an Azorius hieromancer in-training on the plane of Ravnica, and Lavinia's brother. After obtaining a Dimir key, he was killed by a band of Rakdos who were hunting for him.

Jekelth.name: Jekelth
Jekelth.description: '''Jekelth Blackeye''', also known as '''Dream''', was an Anaba minotaur from Ulgrotha, whose life became legend among his people.

Jenrik.name: Jenrik
Jenrik.description: '''Jenrik''' was a mysterious astronomancer living in a tall tower on the Silver Beach of Innistrad's province of Nephalia.

Jerren.name: Jerren
Jerren.description: Bishop '''Jerren''' was a Human cleric from Innistrad.

Jeska.name: Jeska
Jeska.description: '''Jeska''' was an Otarian barbarian from Dominaria who became a planeswalker. She was the sister of Kamahl. Before becoming a planeswalker, she briefly became an avatar named '''Phage''' ''the Untouchable'' due to a curse.

biographical_info.birthplace: Auror Village, Pardic Mountains|Pardia, Otaria, Dominaria

Jherana Rure.name: Jherana Rure
Jherana Rure.description: '''Jherana Rure''' was a commander of the Order of the Ebon Hand on the Dominarian continent of Sarpadia.

Jimak Ravelth.name: Jimak Ravelth
Jimak Ravelth.description: '''Jimak Ravelth''' was the Master of the Purple House of Ingkara, in the city of Estark on Dominaria. He participated in the Night of Fire, the destruction of the House of Oor-tael.

Jin-Gitaxias.name: Jin-Gitaxias
Jin-Gitaxias.description: '''Jin-Gitaxias''' (Phyrexian: aEDn,Gyts, IPA: [ʤiʔn ɢytx]) was the blue-aligned praetor of New Phyrexia. His twisted sciences contributed massively to the power of New Phyrexia, both bolstering the potency of Phyrexia's infectious oil and discovering the revolutionary method by which Planeswalkers could be compleated.

Jinno Terimund.name: Jinno Terimund
Jinno Terimund.description: '''Jinno Terimund''' was a craftsman from the Kingdom of Shikar on Corondor (Dominaria). He fell in love with Chondaeh.

Jofridus.name: Jofridus
Jofridus.description: '''Jofridus''' was a Cathar, and secretly a Skirsdag cultist, on the plane of Innistrad.

Johan.name: Johan
Johan.description: '''Johan''', Tyrant of Tirras and Emperor of the Northern Realms, was a powerful but evil mage and shapeshifter who tried to conquer the Jamuraan western continent. While both ruthless and cruel, he saw himself as benevolent toward his people, having managed to unite the barbarian tribes of the northern mountains with his Tirrans in reclaiming more southern land for prosperity. He fashioned himself as being the only one capable and deserving of leading the Jamuraan people and saw his destiny as ...

biographical_info.title: The Emperor of the Northern Reaches

Jolav.name: Jolav
Jolav.description: '''Jolav''' was an aristocratic human from Urborg and the younger brother of Crovax. He had multiple sisters.

biographical_info.birthplace: Urborg, Burning Isles, the Domains, Dominaria

Joskun.name: Joskun
Joskun.description: '''Joskun''' was a Constable of An-Havva on Ulgrotha around the time of the Homelands (ca. 3800 AR).

Josu Vess.name: Josu Vess
Josu Vess.description: '''Josu''' was the brother of Liliana Vess. He was born in the Caligo Forest on Dominaria.

Joven.name: Joven
Joven.description: '''Joven''' was a human on Ulgrotha. Joven had a great reputation throughout the Homelands. A master thief and excellent cat burglar, he could talk his way out of tight situations. Joven earned a reputation of fear amongst merchants and respect amongst the other rogues and thieves of the Homelands. He was best known for stealing jewelry and other valuables and fencing it off to others for little profit. He was hunted by numerous public and private groups, though Joven was very careful to not off...

biographical_info.death: Betw. 3207 and 3227 ARResurrected betw. 3427 and 4127 ARReincarnated betw. 3477 and 4561 AR

Jurgen Garensun.name: Jurgen Garensun
Jurgen Garensun.description: '''Jurgen Garensun''' was the mayor of Hanweir on the plane of Innistrad.

Kaho.name: Kaho
Kaho.description: '''Kaho''' (KAH-hoh) was a human wizard from Kamigawa who was active during the Kami War. She was the jushi who served as Minamo's historian during the first half of the war.

Kailo.name: Kailo
Kailo.description: The one-eyed Lord '''Balo Kailo''' (KAY-loh) was the best tracker in the Order of the Knights of Kjeldor, during the Ice Age on Dominaria. He was the former lover of Zaraya.
planes: Ice Age on the World of Magic: The Gathering|Ice Age

Kalitas.name: Kalitas
Kalitas.description: '''Kalitas''' was the bloodchief of the Ghet, the poorest and least powerful of the vampire families of Malakir on Zendikar.

Kalyntri.name: Kalyntri
Kalyntri.description: '''Kalyntri''' was a vicious and arrogant dragon, large enough to swallow a baloth whole. Kalyntri terrorized the lands around the Kapsho Sea of Shandalar for over three hundred years until he was slain by Talrand the Sky Summoner and his drakes.

Kamahl.name: Kamahl
Kamahl.description: '''Kamahl''' was a powerful human barbarian from the Pardic Mountains of Otaria on Dominaria. He was the brother of Jeska and the pupil of Balthor.

biographical_info.birthplace: Auror Village, Pardic Mountains, Otaria, Dominaria

Kamat.name: Kamat
Kamat.description: '''Kamat''' was a Naga warrior from Naktamun on the plane of Amonkhet, and an initiate of Tah crop.

Kangee.name: Kangee
Kangee.description: '''Kangee''', was an aven wizard from Dominaria and a prominent member of The Order.

Karlov (Grandfather).name: Karlov (Grandfather)
Karlov (Grandfather).description: ''Grandfather'' '''Karlov''' was the greediest of the Orzhov Oligarchs in life. As a ghost he was a member of the Obzedat, the oligarchy that ruled the Orzhov Syndicate on Ravnica. His house sigil was a serpentine ouroboros.

Karona.name: Karona
Karona.description: '''Karona''' was the manifestation of all Dominarian mana, brought into being and defeated twice.

Karrak.name: Karrak
Karrak.description: '''Karrak''' was a Fallaji soldier who fought on the side of Mishra in the Brothers' War.

Kasimir.name: Kasimir
Kasimir.description: '''Kasimir''' (a.k.a. '''The Lone Wolf''') was a hermit living on the island of Kusho on Dominaria. His real name was '''Shasido Mayasi'''.

!Kath.name: !Kath
!Kath.description: '''!Kath''' of the Malpiri clan was one of the founders of the Third Path, the representative of Sardia, who came with knowledge of their mountain home.

Kawit.name: Kawit
Kawit.description: '''Kawit''' was an Amonkheti warrior, who became Oketra's avenger. She tried to kill God-Pharaoh during the Hours.

Kayla bin-Kroog.name: Kayla bin-Kroog
Kayla bin-Kroog.description: '''Kayla bin-Kroog''' was a princess of Yotia and the wife of Urza during the Brothers' War on Dominaria. Afterward, she became the Lady of Penregon and the last Queen of Argive. She was the daughter of the Warlord of Kroog, and the mother of Harbin.

Kaylen.name: Kaylen
Kaylen.description: '''Kaylen''' was a Dwarven hero of considerable skill and rank from Sarpadia on Dominaria.

Kedarick VI.name: Kedarick VI
Kedarick VI.description: '''King Kedarick VI of Iretis''' was a human king of th...

Kefnet.name: Kefnet
Kefnet.description: '''Kefnet''' was the ibis-headed Amonkhet god of knowledge.

Keiga.name: Keiga
Keiga.description: '''Keiga''', the Tide Star (KAY-gah; 河がCapital River

Keimi.name: Keimi
Keimi.description: '''Keimi''' was the Mukotai Reckoner Tatsunari's giant toad from Kamigawa.

Keimon.name: Keimon
Keimon.description: '''Keimon''' was a vedalken stormcaller from Esper, who discovered first-hand the powerful effects of the Maelstrom.

biographical_info.lifetime: Around the time of the Conflux

Kei Takahashi.name: Kei Takahashi
Kei Takahashi.description: '''Kei Takahashi''' was a Dominarian healer-in-training with the natural magical ability to sense danger and to prevent damage. He was the student of Ayesha Tanaka and the healer of Tetsuo Umezawa's entourage.

Kelse.name: Kelse
Kelse.description: '''Kelse''' was a human peasant mother, whose prayers were the last Avacyn heard in her pure form.

Kenshi Sakashima.name: Kenshi Sakashima
Kenshi Sakashima.description: '''Kenshi Sakashima''' (sah-kah-SHEE-mah) was a human rogue from Kamigawa.

Kentaro.name: Kentaro
Kentaro.description: '''Kentaro''' (ken-TAR-oh), ''the Smiling Cat'', was a human Samurai of Kamigawa from the time of the Kami War.

Kenzo.name: Kenzo
Kenzo.description: '''Kenzo''' (KEHN-zoh) ''the Hardhearted'' was a human samurai of Kamigawa.

Kessla.name: Kessla
Kessla.description: '''Kessla''' was a Sylvok shaman from Mirrodin. She originated from Temple Might in the Tangle. Due to the turmoil she experienced, she had a prejudice against elves but later changed her beliefs after she was rescued by one of them.

Kianne.name: Kianne
Kianne.description: Dean '''Kianne''' was an elf druid teacher and dean at the Quandrix College of Strixhaven University on Arcavios.

Kianon.name: Kianon
Kianon.description: '''Kianon''' was Freyalise's bonded wolverine during the Ice Age on on Dominaria.

Kibo.name: Kibo
Kibo.description: Prince '''Kibo''' was the monkey prince of the Uktabi Jungle of Jamuraa on Dominaria

Kiki-Jiki.name: Kiki-Jiki
Kiki-Jiki.description: '''Kiki-Jiki''' (kee-kee JEE-kee; ) was an akki of Sokenzan on Kamigawa, who could duplicate creatures with a special brand of illusionism.

Kiku.name: Kiku
Kiku.description: '''Kiku''' (KEE-koo; She mastered several weapons, most notably the ''fuetsu'' throwing axe and ''tessen'' fan. The most deadly, however, are her magic abilities. She used purple camellia blooms that, imbued with her magic, could dig their roots through any living tissue or produce a fragrant smell capable of paralyzing the victim. She was titled ''jushi'' or ''mahotsukai'', terms used for the spellcasters of Numai.

Kirtar.name: Kirtar
Kirtar.description: Lieutenant '''Kirtar''' was an Aven leader of the Order on Otaria (Dominaria). A proud and arrogant warrior, Kirtar died fighting off the advancing crystals he had created after using the Mirari in the Order's Citadel.

Klaus.name: Klaus
Klaus.description: '''Klaus''' was a Falkenrath vampire on Innistrad. Klaus, a vampire of the Falkenrath line, was both cunning and confident, embodying the predatory nature typical of his lineage. Physically, he was described with a slick chin and agile movements, characterized by his unnaturally sharp senses and speed. Klaus reveled in the hunt, showing a disregard for danger and a penchant for toying with his prey. His personality exuded arrogance and dark humor, relishing in the fear he instilled in his victim...

Kobo.name: Kobo
Kobo.description: '''Kobo''' was a young human apprentice of the ogre shaman Hidetsugu on Kamigawa.

Kokusho.name: Kokusho
Kokusho.description: '''Kokusho''', the Evening Star (KOH-koo-shoh; ), was the great ''ryuu'' (divine dragon) of Kamigawa's swamps. She guarded Takenuma and has since reincarnated as '''Junji''', who is male.

biographical_info.death: Betw. 3427 and 4127 ARReincarnated betw. 3477 and 4561 AR
biographical_info.lifetime: Pre-Mending - Died a few centuries after the Kami War. Mending Era, reborn in a new form.

Koll.name: Koll
Koll.description: '''Koll''' was a dwarf warrior from Kaldheim and the forger of the Sword of the Realms.

Kolman.name: Kolman
Kolman.description: '''Kolman''' was one of the twelve elders of Gatstaf, a village in the Ulvenwald of Kessig Province, on the plane of Innistrad.

Koma.name: Koma
Koma.description: '''Koma''' was the Cosmos Serpent of Kaldheim. He was one of the Cosmos Monsters, created at the birth of the world and dwelling in the void between the realms.

Kondo.name: Kondo
Kondo.description: Sidar '''Kondo''' was head of a Jamuraan warclan during the Mirage War.

Korlash.name: Korlash
Korlash.description: '''Korlash''' is a legendary zombie warrior from Dominaria's past.

Kothophed.name: Kothophed
Kothophed.description: '''Kothophed''' was one of the four demons who dealt with Liliana Vess following the Mending.

Kozilek.name: Kozilek
Kozilek.description: '''Kozilek''' (/koʊzɪlɛk/; ''KOH-zih-lek''), the "Butcher of Truth", is one of the three Eldrazi titans and the inspiration for the Zendikari merfolk god Cosi and the Kor god Talib.

biographical_info.lifetime: Active until the Time of Legends, released and killed in the Mending Era

Krark.name: Krark
Krark.description: '''Krark''' was a legendary goblin wizard on Mirrodin who traveled to the hollow center of the plane and cataloged his journeys in a book. The Krark-Clan is named after him.
planes: Mirrodin's Core|the hollow center of the plane

Kreig.name: Kreig
Kreig.description: '''Kreig''' was the Witch King of Keld on Dominaria. He was the most powerful Keldon of all time; the product of the Bloodline Project and Gatha's genetic splicing of Keldon and Phyrexian stock.

Kristina of the Woods.name: Kristina of the Woods
Kristina of the Woods.description: '''Kristina of the Woods''' was a planeswalker native to Corondor on Dominaria, whose planeswalker's spark manifested after the creation of the Shard of the Twelve Worlds.
planes: Ice Age on the World of Magic: The Gathering
Formation of the Shard of Twelve Worlds|its formation

biographical_info.lifetime: The Time of Legends-War with Phyrexia

K'rrik.name: K'rrik
K'rrik.description: '''K'rrik''' (Phyrexian: BFrrh, IPA: [kxʼərrk]), initially known as '''Kerrick''', was a Phyrexian sleeper agent on the Dominarian island of Tolaria.

Kuberr.name: Kuberr
Kuberr.description: '''Kuberr''', called ''"The Wealthy One"'', was one of the Numena, ancient beings on the plane of Dominaria.

Kudro.name: Kudro
Kudro.description: General '''Kudro''' was the stern Commander of the Coppercoats and the military leader of Drannith on Ikoria. He was the father of Jirina Kudro. His wife had died long ago.

Kuon.name: Kuon
Kuon.description: '''Kuon''' (KOO-ohn), ''Ogre Ascendant'' was an enlightened Ogre Monk from Kamigawa who was active during the Kami War.

Kylox.name: Kylox
Kylox.description: '''Kylox''' was a viashino artificer from Ravnica, belonging to the Izzet League. He was involved in the ''Murders at Karlov Manor'' and ultimately became one of their victims.

Kynaios and Tiro.name: Kynaios and Tiro
Kynaios and Tiro.description: '''Kynaios''' and '''Tiro''' were two legendary human soldiers from Theros.

biographical_info.lifetime: Many centuries before the Mending Era

Kzzy'n.name: Kzzy'n
Kzzy'n.description: '''Kzzy'n, the Dragon Lord''' was a warrior on Shandalar, who took command of the Red Guild until its downfall.

Lady Verdenth.name: Lady Verdenth
Lady Verdenth.description: Lady '''Verdenth''' (ver-DENTH) was a green mana sorceress and mistress of House Verdenth in Arathoxia and lady of the forest of Krysalthus on Corondor

Lakil.name: Lakil
Lakil.description: '''Lakil''' was a shepherdess from the small village of Lambholt on the plane of Innistrad. She was one of the victims of Old Stickfingers.

Lannos Nodov.name: Lannos Nodov
Lannos Nodov.description: Commander-General '''Lannos Nodov''' was a Commander-General of the Wojek League on Ravnica in 10012 ZC.

Laquatus.name: Laquatus
Laquatus.description: Ambassador '''Laquatus''' represented the cephalid's Empire on Dominaria's continent of Otaria, though he was a merfolk.{{WebRef|url=https://magic.wizards.com/en/articles/archive/feature/caught-miraris-wake-part-3-2002-06-03author=Will McDermottwork=magicthegathering.com|publisher=Wizards of the Coast|archiveurl=https://web.archive.org/web/20210429180632/https://magic.wizards.com/en/articles/archive/feature/caught-miraris-wake-part-3-2002-06-03|...

Laria.name: Laria
Laria.description: '''Laria''' was an Argivian soldier who fought on the side of Mishra in the Brothers' War.

Latulla.name: Latulla
Latulla.description: '''Latulla''' was the Doyenne in charge of the Keldon Invasion of Jamuraa on Dominaria.

Leaf.name: Leaf
Leaf.description: '''Leaf''' was an elf from Savaea. Leaf was named ''Whisper'' when she was a child, ''Brookcharm'' as a mother, and ''Leaf'' as an Elder. Around 4180 AR, the elves of Savaea were disturbed by a series of single goblins from the Red Mountains entering their woods, each carrying a single rock glyph. When Leaf interrogated one of these goblins, a groveling male named Busjaw, it turned out that each of the goblins had been sent as messengers asking for help from the elves on behalf of their chieftes...

Leori.name: Leori
Leori.description: '''Leori''' was a female patagia tiger bonded to Lukka.

Liberator.name: Liberator
Liberator.description: '''Liberator''' was the planeswalker Urza's legendary battlethopter during the Brothers' War on Dominaria.

Lily Emberseed.name: Lily Emberseed
Lily Emberseed.description: '''Lily Emberseed''', commonly called '''Lily of Valley''', was a legendary mousefolk from Bloomburrow.

Linden Kenrith.name: Linden Kenrith
Linden Kenrith.description: Will Kenrith (stepson) Erec Kenrith (son) Hazel Kenrith (daughter) '''Linden Kenrith''' was the queen of Ardenvale on Eldraine. She was the wife of High King Algenus Kenrith, the mother of Hazel and Erec, and the adoptive mother of Rowan and Will Kenrith. She was killed in the Phyrexian Invasion of Eldraine.

Liont.name: Liont
Liont.description: '''Liont''' was a human smith and former werewolf in the province of Kessig on Innistrad.

Lividus.name: Lividus
Lividus.description: '''Lividus''' was an aggressive Elder Dragon, with the characteristic fierce crest that was shared by his siblings Vaevictis Asmadi, Rubra and Ravus. They were cousins of Palladia-Mors, Merrevia Sal Chromium Rhuell, Nicol Bolas, Ugin and Arcades Sabboth. Lividus was as big as Vaevictis, strong in body but weak in mind.

Llawan.name: Llawan
Llawan.description: '''Empress Llawan''' was a Cephalid leader of the Mer Empire on Dominaria.

Llora.name: Llora
Llora.description: '''Llora''' was a human soldier during the time of the Brothers' War, originally from the Suwwardi tribe of the Fallaji Empire but defected to Kroog to become one of its defenders against Mishra.

Logan.name: Logan
Logan.description: '''Logan''' was the Keeper of Inys Haen, descendant of Haen himself, and father of Aylith.

Loran.name: Loran
Loran.description: '''Loran''' (sometimes spelt '''Loren''') was a scholar from Penregon, capital of Argive on Dominaria. She learned from Tocasia and knew both Urza and Mishra as children.

Lord of Tresserhorn.name: Lord of Tresserhorn
Lord of Tresserhorn.description: The '''Lord of Tresserhorn''', was an undead replacement for Lim-Dûl, created by Chaeska after Lim-Dûl's Battle.

Loren.name: Loren
Loren.description: '''Loren''' (lor-EN), son of Thelon, was an Elven Scout from Havenwood on the Sarpadian continent of Dominaria.

Lorris.name: Lorris
Lorris.description: '''Lorris''' was a soldier of Inys Nohr, and daughter of the commander, RoNal.

Lorthos.name: Lorthos
Lorthos.description: '''Lorthos''' was a monstrous octopus who lived in the oceans of Zendikar.

Lorthun.name: Lorthun
Lorthun.description: '''Lorthun''' was the dwarven leader of Clan Sapphire of Storgard during the onset of the Ice Age of Dominaria.

Lothar.name: Lothar
Lothar.description: '''Lothar''' was the ''Guardian of Thraben'', and Thalia's mentor on the plane of Innistrad.
