Lothar Lovisason.name: Lothar Lovisason
Lothar Lovisason.description: '''Lothar Lovisason''' was the son of the Balduvian chieftain Lovisa Coldeyes, born in the first year of the Thaw of Dominaria.

Lovisa Coldeyes.name: Lovisa Coldeyes
Lovisa Coldeyes.description: '''Lovisa Coldeyes''' was the Balduvian chieftain near the end of the Ice Age of Dominaria.

Lowallyn.name: Lowallyn
Lowallyn.description: '''Lowallyn''' was one of the Numena, ancient beings on the plane of Dominaria.

Lukka.name: Lukka
Lukka.description: '''Lukka''' (Phyrexian: cyhYD, IPA: [lykuʔ]) was a red-aligned human Phyrexian Planeswalker from the plane of Ikoria. He was compleated during the events of ''Phyrexia: All Will Be One'', and later killed by Vadrok and Vivien Reid during the siege of Ikoria as part of New Phyrexia's Invasion of the Multiverse.

Maeveen O'Donagh.name: Maeveen O'Donagh
Maeveen O'Donagh.description: '''Maeveen O'Donagh''' was a soldier and member of the hidden Council of Mages during The Dark Age of Dominaria. She was a captain serving under Vervamon the Elder, and she later became the author of ''Memoirs of a Soldier''.

Maga.name: Maga
Maga.description: '''Maga''' (MAH-gah; Calamitous Self Maga bent his studies toward the oni, until the dark nature of his studies cast a shadow on his mind. He began using the Minamo facilities for foul rites and communions with the demons until he was caught and expelled by the academy. However, his passion grew stronger.

Magfire.name: Magfire
Magfire.description: '''Magfire''' was the leader of the Folk of the Pines living in Arboria around 3334 AR on Jamuraa, Dominaria.

Maigoyume.name: Maigoyume
Maigoyume.description: '''Maigoyuma''' was a kitten of the Nekoru Wasitora on Dominaria. He died as a baby.

Mairsil.name: Mairsil
Mairsil.description: '''Mairsil''', known as '''the Pretender''', was a power-hungry wizard, who was a member of the Conclave of Mages during the post-Brothers' War Dark Age of Dominaria.

Makare.name: Makare
Makare.description: '''Makare''' was an Amonkheti human who fell during the Hour of Devastation, and became an Eternal.

Malach of the Anvil.name: Malach of the Anvil
Malach of the Anvil.description: '''Malach of the Anvil''' was a Vulshok warrior and Warchief of the Anvil tribe on Mirrodin. He was also a friend of Koth.

Malanai.name: Malanai
Malanai.description: '''Malanai''' was a human from northern Aerona, born among the Hurloon.

Malfegor.name: Malfegor
Malfegor.description: '''Malfegor''' was a rare hybrid beast, a dragon with a demonic soul, from the shard of Alara known as Grixis.

Malil.name: Malil
Malil.description: '''Malil''' was a golem made by Memnarch on Mirrodin, as his personal assistant.

Malvos.name: Malvos
Malvos.description: '''Malvos''' was a Sangrazul, brought to the plane Cridhe by the planeswalker Tempé.

Mandek Ironfist.name: Mandek Ironfist
Mandek Ironfist.description: Warlord '''Mandek Ironfist''' was a warlord of the Darkling Plains of Golthonor on Corondor.

Maralen.name: Maralen
Maralen.description: '''Maralen''' was a Mornsong elf from the plane of Lorwyn. As opposed to the ram-like horns of the Gilt-Leaf, her horns were sleeker and sharper, like an antelope's.

Maraxus.name: Maraxus
Maraxus.description: '''Maraxus''' was a human warrior from Keld, Dominaria.

Marcois Jean-Jaquent.name: Marcois Jean-Jaquent
Marcois Jean-Jaquent.description: '''Marcois Jean-Jaquent''' was the vampire baron of Vernot, living on the island of Luneau on the plane of Ixalan.

Marek.name: Marek
Marek.description: '''Marek''' was a Vedalken soldier and the commander of Lord Pontifex's elite guard on Mirrodin.

Marhault Elsdragon.name: Marhault Elsdragon
Marhault Elsdragon.description: '''Marhault Elsdragon''' was the half-elven general of the kentsu during the time of Lady Caleria's uprising against the Empire of Madara on Dominaria.

Marisi.name: Marisi
Marisi.description: '''Marisi''' was a revolutionary Nacatl from Naya, a shard of Alara.

Mariska.name: Mariska
Mariska.description: The pregnant Mariska believed that Oriel Kjeldos was correct, and that Storgard must be abandoned in search of a safer home. She took the Fyndhorn Bow and the Shield of the Ages from the hidden places in Storgard and gave them to Kjeldos and Jason Carthalion. After Carthalion's victory over Freyalise, Mariska left the city with Kjeldos before the Fall of Storgard.

Markos.name: Markos
Markos.description: '''Markos''' was a human soldier from Kroog during the time of the Brothers' War.

Markus.name: Markus
Markus.description: '''Markus''' was a human from Kenlefia in Jamuraa, who was executed in Vacar Slab.

Marrow-Gnawer.name: Marrow-Gnawer
Marrow-Gnawer.description: '''Marrow-Gnawer''' (り|Honekajiri Marrow-Gnawer had been a mediocre warrior of the okiba gang, the nezumi warrior caste. For an unknown reason - some claimed he was possessed by a kami of ambition Marrow-Gnawer left his den one night and assassinated three nezumi makiba, members of the leader caste, including his brother. From that day forward, Marrow-Gnawer was a makiba himself and commanded the largest group of nezumi warriors in the Takenuma Swamp. He became a more proficient leader than he w...

Márton Stromgald.name: Márton Stromgald
Márton Stromgald.description: '''Márton Stromgald''' was a legendary Kjeldoran general during the Ice Age on Dominaria.

Martyrs of Korlis.name: Martyrs of Korlis
Martyrs of Korlis.description: The '''Martyrs of Korlis''' was a group of young idealists from Korlis who were slaughtered by the Fallaji during the Brothers' War.

Marycz.name: Marycz
Marycz.description: '''Marycz''' was an Angel from Innistrad who fell foul of Shilgengar's Ritual.

Masako.name: Masako
Masako.description: '''Masako''' (MAH-sah-koh), ''the Humorless'', was a Human Advisor of Kamigawa during the time of the Kami War.

Matoc.name: Matoc
Matoc.description: '''Matoc''' was a human barbarian and lavamancer from the village of Auror in the Pardic Mountains of Otaria on Dominaria, and Kamahl and Jeska's grandfather. He was also a friend of Balthor Rockfist.

Mattak.name: Mattak
Mattak.description: '''Mattak''' was a human member of Yasova Dragonclaw's hunting party, two generations after the Khanfall on Tarkir.

Mazirek.name: Mazirek
Mazirek.description: '''Mazirek''' was a Golgari death priest from Ravnica. He was a large, dark green (almost black), Kraul, and the effective leader of that race.

Melira.name: Melira
Melira.description: '''Melira''' was a sylvok scout outcast destined to be an important figure in the Mirrans fight for Mirrodin against the Phyrexians. She died at the end of New Phyrexia's Invasion of the Multiverse, succumbing to her injuries to help un-compleat Ajani Goldmane and Nissa Revane.

biographical_info.lifetime: Mending Era - New Phyrexia's Invasion of the Multiverse

Melisk.name: Melisk
Melisk.description: '''Melisk''' was a member of the Orzhov guild, and an attendant to Teysa Karlov on Ravnica.

Meloku.name: Meloku
Meloku.description: '''Meloku''' (MEHL-oh-koo; ) was a soratami ambassador to the human world at daimyo Konda's court in Eiganjo, and especially to the human students of the arcane at the Minamo School on Kamigawa.

Memnarch.name: Memnarch
Memnarch.description: '''Memnarch''' was the sentient incarnation of the Mirari who was driven mad by a mysterious oil. For most of the history of Mirrodin, he was the secret lord of the plane, plotting and manipulating the very structure of the world to realize his insane goals.

Merieke Ri Berit.name: Merieke Ri Berit
Merieke Ri Berit.description: '''Merieke Ri Berit''' was a mysterious figure who lived during the Ice Age in Terisiare on Dominaria.

Meris.name: Meris
Meris.description: '''Meris''' was a human from Naktamun on the plane of Amonkhet, and an initiate of Tah crop. He was in love with Imi.

Merrevia Sal.name: Merrevia Sal
Merrevia Sal.description: '''Merrevia Sal''' was the sister of Arcades Sabboth, Chromium Rhuell, Palladia-Mors, Nicol Bolas, and Ugin. She was the cousin of Vaevictis Asmadi. After being spawned by The Ur-Dragon during the Birth of the Elder Dragons, she was killed by human hunters and their dogs. This act was witnessed by Ugin and Nicol Bolas, although their reactions to it differed. Merrevia Sal's death would later lead Bolas to start the Dragon-killers' War.

Methos.name: Methos
Methos.description: '''Methos''' was a human from Kenlefia in Jamuraa, who survived a journey to Vacar Slab.

Mevra.name: Mevra
Mevra.description: '''Mevra''' was a human whose visage was used by Nicol Bolas in duplicity, two generations after the Khanfall on Tarkir, likely after he killed her.

Miko.name: Miko
Miko.description: '''Miko''' (MEE-koh) was the King of Storgard, on the Dominarian continent of Terisiare at the onset of the Ice Age.

Millena.name: Millena
Millena.description: '''Millena''' was a Dimir agent who ran afoul of Nicol Bolas and broke into the Aerie of the Firemind.

Mindosz.name: Mindosz
Mindosz.description: '''Mindosz''' was an unlucky Izzet magelord who dared to oppose Niv-Mizzet's opinion, claiming that the metal mizzium was not so impervious as was said and that it was possible to create temperatures that could melt it. Niv-Mizzet strongly disagreed, and Mindosz, earning the title Heretic, was immolated by the Firemind's breath in 3203 Z.C. Ironically, Mindosz’s death resulted from one of the few things that could actually melt mizzium, dragon fire.

Mira and Tau.name: Mira and Tau
Mira and Tau.description: '''Mira and Tau''' were a pair of Kor hookslingers from Ondu who hired themselves out as guides across the Teeth of Akoum.

Mishra.name: Mishra
Mishra.description: '''Mishra''' was the brother of Urza. A cruel and ruthless Argivian artificer, he had the same humble origins as his brother, eventually coming to control the western half of Terisiare (i.e. Zegon). Mishra was able to confederate various Fallaji tribes of the Western Desert under his command. Eventually, he and Urza fought a long and bloody war that came to be known as the Brothers' War. Unlike his brother, he did not become a planeswalker.

Mochi.name: Mochi
Mochi.description: '''Mochi''', the Smiling Kami of the Crescent Moon, was a powerful yet diminutive kami who attempted to manipulate Toshiro Umezawa, while secretly working with the Soratami to make them the dominant species in the plane Kamigawa.

Modar Bejiri.name: Modar Bejiri
Modar Bejiri.description: '''Modar Bejiri''' was a Vedalken court hussar, promoted to field hussar, in the last days of the fraying Guildpact. On his first day in the field, astride his faithful mount, '''Ashmane''', Modar encountered a doppelganger who had just committed murder. Due to physical conflict, he was unable to arrest the criminal at the scene. Afraid that the murderer would escape and unable to pursue the matter via legal means, Modar was forced to come up with another solution.

Moira.name: Moira
Moira.description: '''Moira''' is a Phyrexian spirit wizard from Dominaria.

Momir Vig.name: Momir Vig
Momir Vig.description: '''Momir Vig''' was the elven guild leader of the Simic Combine on Ravnica.

biographical_info.lifetime: War with Phyrexia or before - Rift Era
biographical_info.title: Progenitor Momir Vig

Mons.name: Mons
Mons.description: '''Mons''' was a goblin Pashalik, a renowned warrior who lived in Modern Times in Rundvelt, part of southern Aerona in the Domains of Dominaria.

Morgane.name: Morgane
Morgane.description: '''Morgane, the Great Druid''' was a druid on Shandalar, who took command of the Green Guild until its downfall.

Morinfen and Gallowbraid.name: Morinfen and Gallowbraid
Morinfen and Gallowbraid.description: '''Morinfen''' and '''Gallowbraid''' were two Phyrexian Horrors which were the bane of Crovax. The partners were the first Phyrexians to show up in Dominaria after the Brothers' War. They were distorted humanoids with fangs and skins like stone. Morinfen had wings while his partner, Gallowbraid, did not.

Morven.name: Morven
Morven.description: '''Morven''' was one of the bodyguards of the wizard Towser. He lived on Aerona, part of the Domains of Dominaria.

Muggtoth.name: Muggtoth
Muggtoth.description: '''Muggtoth''' was a zombie cyclops from Dominaria that was killed by Ugin.

Muni.name: Muni
Muni.description: '''Muni''' was a digsite forman in Almaaz. Muni was a foreman at the old Sumifa excavation and a colleague of Javin and Cheyne. He had dark eyes, spoke every modern language in Almaaz, and always told the truth.

Murat.name: Murat
Murat.description: '''Murat''' was a member of the Death speakers on Ulgrotha around the time of the Homelands (ca. 3800 AR).

Musata.name: Musata
Musata.description: '''Musata''' was a tiger warrior and shaman of her tribe in Efrava on Dominaria.

Mwigo.name: Mwigo
Mwigo.description: Sidar '''Mwigo''' of Tefemburu was one of the first leaders of the Zhalfirin army to directly fight Kaervek during the Mirage Wars on Dominaria.

Myrel.name: Myrel
Myrel.description: '''Myrel''' was a non-binary soldier from the city of Penregon in the nation of Argive on the continent of Terisiare on the plane of Dominaria. They became scout-captain and Kayla bin-Kroog's right hand, staying by her side until the fall of the city.

Mytaru.name: Mytaru
Mytaru.description: '''Mytaru''' was a minotaur of the Urhaalan clan in the Dark Age of Terisiare, on the plane of Dominaria.

Naiva.name: Naiva
Naiva.description: '''Naiva''' (or '''Nai''' for short) was a human Atarka-clan warrior and experienced hunter in the past of Tarkir. She was the granddaughter of Yasova Dragonclaw, and the twin sister of Baishya. The sisters had been born holding hands, when the midwife had cut open the belly of their dead mother. Atarka had killed their mother Kiarka because she was a Temur Whisperer.

Nakht.name: Nakht
Nakht.description: '''Nakht''' was a young aven wizard from Naktamun on the plane of Amonkhet, and a potential initiate of Tah crop. He was friends with Samut and Djeru

Narok.name: Narok
Narok.description: '''Narok''' (nah-ROK) was the Battlemage Ravidel's orc-like lieutenant on Dominaria.

Nath.name: Nath
Nath.description: '''Nath''' was a ''taercenn'' (superior commander) of the Gilt-Leaf hunters. He was one of the most seasoned warriors of the Gilt-Leaf tribe and despised everything that was considered ugly by elvish standards. Nath was a ruthless commander, knowing no mercy and never hesitating to kill any of his subordinates when they failed.

Nazir.name: Nazir
Nazir.description: '''Nazir''' was the Felonarch of Inys Nohr, and direct descendant of Nohr.

Nebuchadnezzar.name: Nebuchadnezzar
Nebuchadnezzar.description: '''Nebuchadnezzar''' was a Dominarian seeker of truth and a speaker of wisdom. As a wanderer, he traveled through the Domains for centuries, dispensing a personal form of strict justice.

Neheb.name: Neheb
Neheb.description: '''Neheb''', known as "the worthy" was a famous minotaur warrior initiate of the Ahn crop on Amonkhet.

Neit.name: Neit
Neit.description: '''Neit''' was a human from Naktamun on the plane of Amonkhet, and an initiate of Tah crop.

Nekusar.name: Nekusar
Nekusar.description: '''Nekusar''' ''the Mindrazer'' is a legendary zombie wizard from an unknown plane.

Nellick.name: Nellick
Nellick.description: '''Lord Nellick''' was a human noble from Innistrad.

Nevar.name: Nevar
Nevar.description: '''Nevar''' was a powerful wizard on an unknown plane, and archenemy to the wizard Jamil.

Nevinyrral.name: Nevinyrral
Nevinyrral.description: '''Nevinyrral''' was a lich and necromancer from Urborg on Dominaria. He also was the author of the ''Necromancer's Handbook'', the bible of necromancy.

Ngabo.name: Ngabo
Ngabo.description: '''Elder Ngabo''' was an elder in Jigme Village, belonging to the Jeskai Clan in Tarkir's original timeline. It is unknown if she exists in Tarkir's current timeline.

Nighteyes.name: Nighteyes
Nighteyes.description: '''Nighteyes''' ''the Desecrator'' was a Nezumi Wizard from Kamigawa who was active during the Kami War.

Nikko.name: Nikko
Nikko.description: '''Nikko''' was one of Yorgo's ruffians in Arathoxia on Dominaria.

Nira.name: Nira
Nira.description: '''Nira''' was a Nacatl scout and Sunstriker from on Alara. Although she was born and raised on Naya, she came to Bant following the destruction wrought by followers of the Grixis demon Nefarox.

Nivea.name: Nivea
Nivea.description: '''Nivea''' was a mage from Otaria, on the plane of Dominaria.

Nohr.name: Nohr
Nohr.description: '''Nohr''' was a weatherworker on Cridhe and responsible for the Parting.

Nylah.name: Nylah
Nylah.description: '''Nylah''' was an Amonkheti mage, who became a fervent believer in the God-Pharaoh during the Hours.

Ogwater Rifkin.name: Ogwater Rifkin
Ogwater Rifkin.description: '''Ogwater Rifkin''' was a songmage in Sumifa. Ogwater was a man of small stature, but his most prominent feature was his enormous, sunburnt nose, a veritable colossus he could not hide even when wearing a hood. He was a destitute drunk, begging and picking pockets to make a meager living, but spending most of it on alcohol.

Ohabi Caleria.name: Ohabi Caleria
Ohabi Caleria.description: '''Lady Caleria''' was one or several individuals during a few hundred years of the War with Phyrexia.

Oiyan.name: Oiyan
Oiyan.description: '''Oiyan''' was a human member of Yasova Dragonclaw's hunting party, two generations after the Khanfall on Tarkir.

Oketra.name: Oketra
Oketra.description: The cat-headed '''Oketra''' was the Amonkhet god of stability, order, and protection.

Olexo.name: Olexo
Olexo.description: "Little" '''Olexo''' was one of Kytheon Iora's Akroan irregulars on the plane of Theros. He was the youngest of the irregulars.

Oliver Farrel.name: Oliver Farrel
Oliver Farrel.description: '''Oliver Farrel''' was a former Icatian Priest from Sarpadia, on Dominaria, that broke ties with the Order of Leitbur and the Icatia government as a whole.

Olutio.name: Olutio
Olutio.description: '''Olutio''' was a man from Innistrad who was partially responsible for the return of the angel Liesa.

Onala Kjeld.name: Onala Kjeld
Onala Kjeld.description: Sir '''Onala Kjeld''' was a female descendant of Oriel Kjeldos, living on Terisiare, Dominaria, at the time of the Ice Age.

Opal-Eye.name: Opal-Eye
Opal-Eye.description: '''Opal-Eye''', ''Konda's Yojimbo'' was a Kitsune Samurai from Kamigawa who was active during the Kami War.

Ophelia.name: Ophelia
Ophelia.description: '''Ophelia''' was a human from Kenlefia in Jamuraa, who survived a journey to Vacar Slab.

Oracle en-Vec.name: Oracle en-Vec
Oracle en-Vec.description: The '''Oracle en-Vec''' was a prophet on Rath and the spiritual leader of the Vec tribe. While traveling to meet with Eladamri, she encountered Gerrard Capashen, whom she believed to be the prophesied Korvecdal. Along with Eladamri and his elves, she rallied the Rathi Tribes in an attempt to overthrow Volrath while Gerrard and the ''Weatherlight'' crew infiltrated the Stronghold. However, the uprising was unsuccessful and was called off when ''Weatherlight'' fled.

Orai Daiyeta.name: Orai Daiyeta
Orai Daiyeta.description: '''Orai Daiyeta''' was a commander of the Kentsu on Dominaria.

Orca.name: Orca
Orca.description: '''Lady Orca''' was a mysterious and very powerful minion of Ramses Overdark on Dominaria.

Oriel Kjeldos.name: Oriel Kjeldos
Oriel Kjeldos.description: '''Oriel Kjeldos''' (or-ee-EL KYEL-dohss) was a shaman, the leader of Clan Emerald of Storgard, in the Ice Age of Dominaria.
planes: Ice Age on the World of Magic: The Gathering|Ice Age

Orwell.name: Orwell
Orwell.description: '''Orwell''' was a village bell-ringer from Gatstaf in Kessig on Innistrad. He was ritualistically murdered by Bes Palter and his body parts were arranged in a pattern to help her summon the demon Ormendahl. Orwell's body parts were arranged deliberately and ceremonially, intended to serve as part of a dark ritual. His corpse was discovered by Halana and Alena, who until then had suspected that werewolves were killing the villagers. But as Orwell had not been eaten, they realized a different typ...

Palla.name: Palla
Palla.description: '''Palla''' was a human leader of a Rakdos thrill-killer gang that operated in Agrus Kos' section in 9943 Z.C. on the plane of Ravnica.

Palladia-Mors.name: Palladia-Mors
Palladia-Mors.description: '''Palladia-Mors''' is a vicious, reddish green, elder dragon with curling horns. She was spawned by the Ur-Dragon, along with her brothers Arcades Sabboth, Nicol Bolas, Ugin, and Chromium Rhuell, her sister Merrevia Sal, and their cousins Vaevictis Asmadi and Piru. She is the mother of the Primeval Rith.

Pavios and Thanasis.name: Pavios and Thanasis
Pavios and Thanasis.description: '''Pavios''' from Meletis and '''Thanasis''' from Akros were star-crossed lovers from Theros, whose destinies were so intertwined that Adrasteia the Fate accidentally cut herself when she was severing the tangle of threads they had created together, leaving a small drop of her blood on the weave.

Pearl-Ear.name: Pearl-Ear
Pearl-Ear.description: '''Pearl-Ear''' was a kitsune diplomat, and a long-time ambassador at daimyo Konda's court in Eiganjo.

Peemel.name: Peemel
Peemel.description: '''Peemel''' was the ruler of the city-state of Iwset in the Dark Age of Terisiare, on the plane of Dominaria.

Penthikos.name: Penthikos
Penthikos.description: '''Penthikos''' was a human hero on the plane of Theros, whose life ended in a tragedy.

Pianna.name: Pianna
Pianna.description: '''Pianna''' was a human leader of the Northern branch of the Order on Otaria, Dominaria.

Pikepierce.name: Pikepierce
Pikepierce.description: '''Pikepierce''' was a renegade goblin from Ulgrotha, whose death became legend among the Anaba minotaurs.

Piru.name: Piru
Piru.description: '''Piru''' was an Elder Dragon and the life-partner of Chromium Rhuell and mother of Crosis.

Pitre.name: Pitre
Pitre.description: '''Pitre''' was a thatcher and a would-be vampire slayer from Hanweir on the plane of Innistrad.

Pizoondertanx.name: Pizoondertanx
Pizoondertanx.description: '''Pizoondertanx''' was a white dragon, eldest of the dragon chiefs and a slave lord, who shared the rule of the Obsidian Well with Varuna, Macumba, Heptane, and Siliq.

Polukranos.name: Polukranos
Polukranos.description: '''Polukranos''' (''Poh-LOO-krahn-ohs''), also known as '''World Eater''', is a gigantic legendary Hydra from Theros. As the mortal manifestation of the eternal ideal of a hydra, it emerges when the magic that holds the pillars of the world is shaken. It is a herald of terrible times when the fate of the poleis and civilization are in the balance.

Pontifex.name: Pontifex
Pontifex.description: Lord '''Pontifex''' was the Vedalken's most respected researcher on the plane of Mirrodin.

Porros.name: Porros
Porros.description: '''Porros''' was the prince of Sumifa and a powerful songmage from Almaaz during the Brothers' War.

Princess Lucrezia.name: Princess Lucrezia
Princess Lucrezia.description: Princess '''Lucrezia''' was a legendary human wizard, who ruled a city-state of the same name in south-western Jamuraa, four centuries after the Ice Age.

Project Kraj.name: Project Kraj
Project Kraj.description: '''Project Kraj''' was a secret project of the Simic guildmaster Momir Vig on Ravnica.

Qadir.name: Qadir
Qadir.description: The '''Qadirs''' ("the all-powerful") were a pair of leaders of the Fallaji Empire, a father and his son who inherited the title, until the time of the Brothers' War.

Qhattib.name: Qhattib
Qhattib.description: Vizier '''Qhattib''' (qhaht-teeb) of Amiqat was the ruler of Suq'Ata during the Mirage Wars of Dominaria.

Quopomma.name: Quopomma
Quopomma.description: '''Quopomma''' was a soldier during the Dark Age of Dominaria.

Raddic.name: Raddic
Raddic.description: '''Raddic''' of Kroog was a Yotian soldier during the Brothers' War and a leader of the Church of Tal in the Dark Age of Dominaria.

Radiant.name: Radiant
Radiant.description: '''Radiant''' was the archangel in charge of the planeswalker Serra's armies on Serra's Realm. Under Phyrexian influence, she took command of the Realm after the planeswalker had left. She had a sharp tongue and was quick to enact judgment.

Rael Gar.name: Rael Gar
Rael Gar.description: '''Rael''' was a Garan Elf living in Tamingazin, part of Otaria on the plane of Dominaria. After he was promoted to rank ''gar'', his name was changed from '''Rael Tak''' to '''Rael Gar'''.

Ragnar.name: Ragnar
Ragnar.description: '''Ragnar''' was a gifted healer from Kusho on Dominaria.

Rakhan.name: Rakhan
Rakhan.description: '''Rakhan''' was an ainok member of Yasova Dragonclaw's hunting party, two generations after the Khanfall on Tarkir.

Rakka Mar.name: Rakka Mar
Rakka Mar.description: '''Rakka Mar''' was a female human shaman from Jund, Alara who specialized in summoning elementals.

Raklan.name: Raklan
Raklan.description: '''Raklan''' was Garruk's father, a taskmage and farmer. The name of their homeplane is unknown.

Raksha Golden Cub.name: Raksha Golden Cub
Raksha Golden Cub.description: '''Raksha Golden Cub''' was the ''kha'', or leader, of the leonin tribe of Mirrodin.

Ramses Overdark.name: Ramses Overdark
Ramses Overdark.description: '''Ramses Overdark''' was the imperial assassin, and later the imperial regent, in Madara on Dominaria.

Rarp.name: Rarp
Rarp.description: '''Rarp''' was a goblin of Squee's kingdom, who became Phyrexianized.

Rashka.name: Rashka
Rashka.description: '''Rashka''' the Slayer was a formidable archer who swore revenge against Baron Sengir. Her family members were, in fact, on the ship that the Baron hijacked to populate his Dark Barony and became prisoners and slaves of the Baron. She knew that the only way to free them was to slay Sengir, and she was in training for most of her life, fighting and killing the vampires in Aysen and An-Havva.

Rasputin Dreamweaver.name: Rasputin Dreamweaver
Rasputin Dreamweaver.description: '''Rasputin Dreamweaver''' was a human wizard and ally of the Knights of Thorn on Terisiare, Dominara.

Ratepe.name: Ratepe
Ratepe.description: '''Ratepe''', son of Mideah (or '''Rat''' for short) was a human slave from Efuan Pincar on Dominaria who physically resembled Mishra. He was recruited by Xantcha to free Urza from his madness.

biographical_info.birthplace: Pincar City, Efuan Pincar, Gulmany, Terisian Isles, Dominaria
biographical_info.death: 3245 AR, a week shy of 19 years old

Ravus.name: Ravus
Ravus.description: '''Ravus''' was an aggressive Elder Dragon, with the characteristic fierce crest that was shared by his siblings Vaevictis Asmadi, Rubra, and Lividus. They were cousins of Palladia-Mors, Merrevia Sal Chromium Rhuell, Nicol Bolas, Ugin and Arcades Sabboth.

Rayami.name: Rayami
Rayami.description: '''Rayami''', ''First of the Fallen'' was a vampire bloodchief from Zendikar. Like all original vampires of that plane, he was created by the Eldrazi Ulamog. In Rayami, insatiable bloodlust and Eldrazi madness combined into a singular drive for destruction.

Rayne.name: Rayne
Rayne.description: '''Rayne''' of the Tolarian Academy on Dominaria was chancellor of the Tolarian Academy, the wife of Barrin, and mother of Hanna. She was killed by Greel during the Keldon invasion of Jamuraa.

Razaketh.name: Razaketh
Razaketh.description: '''Razaketh''' was one of the four demons who dealt with Liliana Vess following the Mending. From him, Liliana gained sway over the living.

Razia.name: Razia
Razia.description: '''Razia''' was an archangel and the parun of the Boros Legion on Ravnica.

biographical_info.lifetime: Time of the Thran or before - Rift Era

Rebbec.name: Rebbec
Rebbec.description: '''Rebbec''' was the chief architect of the Thran Empire's capital of Halcyon on the plane of Dominaria. She was the wife of master artificer Glacian. Both were part of the ''28 leaders'', a group of people who had proven their worth to the empire and would decide on matters if the council of elders could not agree.

biographical_info.lifetime: The Time of the Thran, about -5000 AR

Red Donald.name: Red Donald
Red Donald.description: '''Red Donald''' was a warlord who had fought with his troops across the Domains of Dominaria.

Reika Eberhardt.name: Reika Eberhardt
Reika Eberhardt.description: '''Reika Eberhardt''' was a former Cathar from Kessig, on the plane of Innistrad.

Reki.name: Reki
Reki.description: '''Reki''' (REH-kee), ''the History of Kamigawa'', was a Human Shaman of Kamigawa during the time of the Kami War.

Relio Voldaren.name: Relio Voldaren
Relio Voldaren.description: '''Relio Voldaren''' was a brash vampire of the Voldaren clan of Stensia on the plane of Innistrad.

Relov.name: Relov
Relov.description: '''Relov''' was a corrupt Azorius arbiter from Ravnica, who signed fraudulent orders in exchange for bribes.

Renata.name: Renata
Renata.description: '''Renata''' of Setessa was a legendary human hunter and Nylea's favorite champion. Now, she is Nylea's chosen demigod.

biographical_info.lifetime: Born centuries ago, reborn as a demigod in the Mending Era

Rendall.name: Rendall
Rendall.description: '''Rendall''' was a human ornithopter pilot from Penregon during the time of the Brothers' War.

Reya Dawnbringer.name: Reya Dawnbringer
Reya Dawnbringer.description: '''Reya Dawnbringer''' was one of the first Serra Angels created by Serra and their leader in the time of the Phyrexian Invasion.

Reyhan.name: Reyhan
Reyhan.description: '''Reyhan''', ''Last of the Abzan'' was a legendary human warrior from Tarkir.

Reyhan (Ulgrotha).name: Reyhan (Ulgrotha)
Reyhan (Ulgrotha).description: '''Reyhan''' was a Samite alchemist on Ulgrotha around the time of the Homelands (ca. 3800 AR).

Rhonas.name: Rhonas
Rhonas.description: Cobra-headed '''Rhonas''' was the Amonkhet god of strength, both in physical superiority and mental aspects of willpower.

Rhys.name: Rhys
Rhys.description: '''Rhys''' was an elven hunter of the Gilt-Leaf tribe. He held the rank of daen, commander of the Hemlock pack of hunters.
planes: Great Aurora|world that is going to change

biographical_info.title: Taer RhysDaen Rhys of the Fourth Gilt Leaf Pack

Rica.name: Rica
Rica.description: '''Rica''' was a human avenger pilot from Kroog during the time of the Brothers' War, who survived the Fall of Kroog.

Richlau.name: Richlau
Richlau.description: '''Richlau''' was a student of Tocasia, who later would become an advisor and spend time as a headmaster at the Argivian University before and during the Brothers' War on Dominaria.

Riko.name: Riko
Riko.description: '''Riko''' was a student of Minamo on Kamigawa, a mage and an excellent archer.

Rinni.name: Rinni
Rinni.description: '''Rinni''' was a Rakdos ring member on the plane of Ravnica. His final performance was a Showstopper which was so elaborate it made the demon Rakdos himself laugh out loud.

Riolla Hifrata.name: Riolla Hifrata
Riolla Hifrata.description: '''Riolla Hifrata''' was a woman with the title of the Mercanto Schreefa, living in Almaaz in 3050 AR.

Rograkh.name: Rograkh
Rograkh.description: '''Rograkh''', ''Son of Rohgahh'' was a Kobold from Dominaria.

Rohgahh.name: Rohgahh
Rohgahh.description: '''Rohgahh''', ''of Kher Keep'' is a legendary Kobold warrior and the leader of the kobolds of the Kher Ridges.

Rotapan.name: Rotapan
Rotapan.description: '''Rotapan''' was an overking of Wyrvil in 3050 AR.

Rothga.name: Rothga
Rothga.description: '''Rothga''' was a Phyrexian Beast native to New Phyrexia, and was the partner to the planeswalker Lukka on the plane.

Rubra.name: Rubra
Rubra.description: '''Rubra''' was an aggressive Elder Dragon, with the characteristic fierce crest that was shared by his siblings Vaevictis Asmadi, Ravus and Lividus. They were cousins of Palladia-Mors, Merrevia Sal Chromium Rhuell, Nicol Bolas, Ugin and Arcades Sabboth.

Rukarumel.name: Rukarumel
Rukarumel.description: '''Rukarumel''' was a Rift Era human biologist and wizard who made it her life's work to study the slivers that had come to Dominaria from Rath and their evolution's many forms.

Ruko.name: Ruko
Ruko.description: '''Ruko''' was a tiger warrior and chief of scouts from Efrava on Dominaria.

Rune-Tail.name: Rune-Tail
Rune-Tail.description: '''Rune-Tail''', ''Kitsune Ascendant'' was a Kitsune Monk from Kamigawa who was active during the Kami War.

Rusko.name: Rusko
Rusko.description: '''Rusko''' was a clockmaker before and during the Brothers' War on Dominaria.

Ryusaki Kumano.name: Ryusaki Kumano
Ryusaki Kumano.description: '''Ryusaki Kumano''' (KOO-mah-noh) was a powerful old yamabushi on Kamigawa.

Sachem Karelon Frie.name: Sachem Karelon Frie
Sachem Karelon Frie.description: '''Sachem Karelon Frie''', commonly called ''Karelon'', of Valiton Hold was the female general and advisor for Tagard Tarngold's army in the Valley of Tamingazin, part of the Otarian contient on Dominaria .

biographical_info.birthplace: Valiton Hold, the Human Holds, Valley of Tamingazin, Tamingazin, Otaria, Dominaria

Sachi.name: Sachi
Sachi.description: '''Sachi''' (SAH-chee) was an orochi shaman on Kamigawa. Daughter of Seshiro, granddaughter of Suzue, and sister of Sosuke, she became leader of the Kashi Tribe.

Sacumon.name: Sacumon
Sacumon.description: '''Sacumon''' was a sorceress in the Dark Age of Terisiare, on the plane of Dominaria.

Saffi Eriksdotter.name: Saffi Eriksdotter
Saffi Eriksdotter.description: '''Saffi Eriksdotter''' was a Balduvian scout who lived in the Ice Age on Dominaria. She was killed by a Lhurgoyf.

Sakiko.name: Sakiko
Sakiko.description: '''Sakiko''' (SAH-kee-koh) ''Mother of Summer'' was an Orochi Shaman from Kamigawa who was active during the Kami War.

Samiks.name: Samiks
Samiks.description: '''Samiks''' was one of the Marked Ones in the Ice Age of Dominaria.

Samor.name: Samor
Samor.description: '''Samor''' was a the leader of the Sumifan songmages during the Brothers' War.

Sanwell.name: Sanwell
Sanwell.description: '''Sanwell''', the ''Avenger Ace'', was a human pilot from Dominaria during the time of the Brothers' War.

Sapling of Colfenor.name: Sapling of Colfenor
Sapling of Colfenor.description: The '''"Sapling of Colfenor"''', was a young "female" treefolk (though treefolk do not truly have genders) born from the seed cone of Colfenor the Red Yew, the last yew treefolk sage on Lorwyn. It was a part of Colfenor's master plan focused on freeing Lorwyn from Oona's control.

Saryth.name: Saryth
Saryth.description: '''Saryth''' was a human witch from Kessig, Innistrad.

Sasaya.name: Sasaya
Sasaya.description: '''Sasaya''' (SAH-sah-yah), ''Orochi Ascendant'' was an enlightened Orochi Monk from Kamigawa who was active during the Kami War.

Savra vod Savo.name: Savra vod Savo
Savra vod Savo.description: '''Savra vod Savo''' was the matka (high priestess) of the Golgari Devkarin elves, to whom she was the leader for two hundred years. Savra was born in the Ravnican Undercity to elves and was the sister of Golgari guild leader Jarad.

Scarlet Vizier.name: Scarlet Vizier
Scarlet Vizier.description: The '''Scarlet Vizier''' was a war hero and the second in command to Lord Adam Carthalion in House Scarlet, one of the five powerful houses of Arathoxia on Dominaria.

Scorpion God.name: Scorpion God
Scorpion God.description: The '''Scorpion God''' was one of the three gods who were arrested and distorted by Nicol Bolas to serve his interests during the Hour of Revelation. The original functions and appearances and even the names of these gods have been lost.

biographical_info.lifetime: Before and during the Kami War (The Thaw)

Sek'Kuar.name: Sek'Kuar
Sek'Kuar.description: '''Sek'Kuar''' was an orc shaman native to the Karplusan Mountains in Terisiare during the last days of the Dominarian Ice Age.

Seklistis.name: Seklistis
Seklistis.description: '''Seklistis''' was Jason Carthalion's bonded spider during the Ice Age on on Dominaria.

Selena Mistencharmer.name: Selena Mistencharmer
Selena Mistencharmer.description: '''Selena Mistencharmer''' was an artifice mage. During the Great Magus War on Antausia, Selena and Slides Stardust assembled small hordes at Mt. Margalus. They defeated the evil Mandrake Nightshade with his dragons and pit lords. The mountain has since become known as Mandrake's Mountain.

Selenia.name: Selenia
Selenia.description: '''Selenia''' was a guardian angel on Dominaria, and the unrequited love of Crovax of the Weatherlight crew.

Sentos.name: Sentos
Sentos.description: '''Sentos''' was a war veteran of Thune, and later, a hermit. He hailed from the city of An Karras, located in the kingdom of Thune on the plane of Shandalar. To his people, he was known as ''Sentos the Righteous'' for his role in ending the war. He was also known as ''Sentos the Merciful'' in the east, blessed by its people for sparing their Elder Sun King's life.

biographical_info.lifetime: Before the fall of An Karras

Serenok.name: Serenok
Serenok.description: '''Serenok''' was the abbot of Keral Keep on the plane of Regatha.

Serra.name: Serra
Serra.description: '''Serra''' was a human female planeswalker from the ancient days of the planes, with an affinity for angels, born on an undisclosed plane. She was immensely powerful, enough to create her plane - Serra's Realm, which she populated with her Serra Angels. The Church of Serra was founded on Dominaria in her honor, worshipping the planeswalker as a goddess.
planes: File:Crucible of Worlds Serra.jpg|thumb|353x353px|Creation of [[Serra's Realm

Seshiro.name: Seshiro
Seshiro.description: '''Seshiro''' (SAY-shee-roh or SEHSH-ee-roh) called the Anointed, was a snake monk, and Broodmaster of the Orochi colonies of Kamigawa during the Kami War.

Setha and Basetha.name: Setha and Basetha
Setha and Basetha.description: '''Setha and Basetha''' were Khenra twins from Naktamun on the plane of Amonkhet, and initiates of Tah crop. Setha was the brother, and Basetha was the sister.

Seton.name: Seton
Seton.description: '''Seton''' was a Centaur druid from the Krosan forest on Dominaria. A master healer and competent warrior, he was the Krosan centaurs' emissary to the outside world, as well as an accomplished pit fighter.

Severo Jr..name: Severo Jr.
Severo Jr..description: '''Severo Jr.''' was a vengeful man in New Capenna, whose own schemes led to his demise.

Shadress.name: Shadress
Shadress.description: '''Shadress''' was a human from New Capenna, part of Yuma's and Elnor's gang, and Elnor's girlfriend.

Shandlar.name: Shandlar
Shandlar.description: '''Sir Shandlar of Eberyn''' was a knight and a heroic figure among the people of Eberyn on Dominaria. He appears to have been left-handed.

Sharaman.name: Sharaman
Sharaman.description: '''Sharaman''' was a human general, leading Urza's Argivian armies during the time of the Brothers' War.

Sharp-Ear.name: Sharp-Ear
Sharp-Ear.description: '''Sharp-Ear''' was a kitsune ranger from the Sugi Hayashi village on Kamigawa, and a brother to Pearl-Ear.

Sheoldred.name: Sheoldred
Sheoldred.description: '''Sheoldred''' (Phyrexian: gOcdrd, IPA: [ʃøldrd]), known as the '''Whispering One''' was the Praetor of the Black Faction of New Phyrexia. In the year 4562 AR, she led an invasion of the plane of Dominaria, where she attained several important military objectives in preparation for New Phyrexia's Invasion of the Multiverse. After her return to New Phyrexia, however, she lost a power struggle against the Mother of Machines, Elesh Norn. Sheoldred was subsequently captured by Norn's forces and beh...

Shidako.name: Shidako
Shidako.description: '''Shidako''' (shee-DAH-koh) ''the Broodmistress'' was an Orochi Shaman from Kamigawa who was active during the Kami War.

Shisato.name: Shisato
Shisato.description: '''Shisato''' (SHEE-sah-toh) Her venom was so strong that a few drops could kill another orochi.

Shu Yun.name: Shu Yun
Shu Yun.description: '''Shu Yun''' () was a khan of the Jeskai Way in the past of Tarkir.

Siani.name: Siani
Siani.description: Siani is a djinn from Tarkir's original timeline associated with the Jeskai Way.

Sianna.name: Sianna
Sianna.description: '''Sianna''' (see-AHN-a) was a member of the Farrelite Cult on Dominaria. She resided in Montford.

Silas Brotten.name: Silas Brotten
Silas Brotten.description: '''Silas Brotten''' was a human docent at the Tolarian Academy of Lat-Nam, and secretly a Phyrexian agent.

Silk-Eyes.name: Silk-Eyes
Silk-Eyes.description: '''Silk-Eyes''' was the elder of the Sugi Hayashi village of the kitsune on Kamigawa.

Silver-Foot.name: Silver-Foot
Silver-Foot.description: '''Silver-Foot''' was the captain of the kitsune samurai from Sugi Hayashi village on Kamigawa.

Sima.name: Sima
Sima.description: '''Sima''' was a mage during the Dark Age and the beginning of the Ice Age of Dominaria. She was the archmage Jodah’s first wife.

biographical_info.birthplace: City of Shadows, Lat-Nam, Terisiare, Dominaria

Sirimiti.name: Sirimiti
Sirimiti.description: '''Sirimiti''' was a legendary sorceress, that lived during the Ice Age of Dominaria.

Sisters of Stone Death.name: Sisters of Stone Death
Sisters of Stone Death.description: The '''Sisters of Stone Death''' were usurper guildmasters of the Golgari Swarm on Ravnica.

Sivvi en-Vec.name: Sivvi en-Vec
Sivvi en-Vec.description: '''Lin Sivvi en-Vec''' (also spelled '''"Liin Sivi"''') was the granddaughter of Tant Jova, the elderly leader of the Vec tribe on Rath in the time leading up to the Phyrexian Invasion. Sivvi was her given name, while Lin was an earned title meaning "striking viper" for her proficiency in battle.

Skavius Slan.name: Skavius Slan
Skavius Slan.description: '''Skavius Slan''' was a lich on Shandalar, who used the empty body of Azar after the Wizard's War. The lichlord took command of the Black Guild and ruled for ages, even after the passing of the other Guildlords of Shandalar.

Skellum.name: Skellum
Skellum.description: '''Skellum''' was an old dementia master in the employ of the Cabal on Dominaria. His secret name was '''Cybariss'''.

Skrikkle.name: Skrikkle
Skrikkle.description: '''Skrikkle''' was a brave and careless goblin on Shandalar. He went into danger-danger land with his great grandpap's stick and never returned.

Skule.name: Skule
Skule.description: '''Skule''' was a wizard from Golthonor, part of the Dominarian continent of Corondor, during the Time of Legends.

Skullbriar.name: Skullbriar
Skullbriar.description: '''Skullbriar''' ''the Walking Grave'' is a legendary zombie elemental from an unspecified plane.

Sliver Queen.name: Sliver Queen
Sliver Queen.description: The '''Sliver Queen''' was the center of the sliver hive mind on Rath.

Sobeslav.name: Sobeslav
Sobeslav.description: '''Sobeslav''' was the assistant to Guildmaster Jarad vod Savo of the Golgari Swarm on the plane of Ravnica.

Soraya.name: Soraya
Soraya.description: '''Soraya''', named after the first falconer appointed by Serra herself, was the last known of Falconers of Aysen, on Ulgrotha.

Sorya.name: Sorya
Sorya.description: '''Sorya''' was a human member of Yasova Dragonclaw's hunting party, two generations after the Khanfall on Tarkir.

Sosuke.name: Sosuke
Sosuke.description: '''Sosuke''' (SOH-soo-kay or SOH-soo-keh) was an orochi warrior on Kamigawa. Son of Seshiro, grandson of Suzue, and brother of Sachi, he became leader of the Kashi Tribe.

Spirokai.name: Spirokai
Spirokai.description: '''Spirokai of the Split Skull''' was a human from Kenlefia in Jamuraa, who survived a journey to Vacar Slab.

Spurna.name: Spurna
Spurna.description: '''Spurna''' was a goblin embermage of Squee's kingdom, who became Phyrexianized.

Sruta.name: Sruta
Sruta.description: '''Sruta''' was a craftsperson from Innistrad who is partially responsible for the return of the angel Liesa.

Stabwhisker.name: Stabwhisker
Stabwhisker.description: '''Stabwhisker''' ''the Odious'' was a Nezumi Shaman from Kamigawa who was active during the Kami War.

Stangg.name: Stangg
Stangg.description: '''Stangg''', ''Echo Warrior'', is a human warrior of Dominaria.

Stanslov.name: Stanslov
Stanslov.description: '''Stanslov''' was a member of the Wojek League, and a lieutenant in the Tenth Section.

Starcryst.name: Starcryst
Starcryst.description: '''Starcryst, the Astral Visionary''' was a mysterious merfolk on Shandalar, who took command of the Blue Guild until its downfall.

Stenn.name: Stenn
Stenn.description: '''Stenn''' was a human wizard from New Argive on Dominaria.

Stonebrow.name: Stonebrow
Stonebrow.description: General '''Stonebrow''', previously known as '''Bron''', and '''Face of Stone''' according to Averru's Glyphs, was the leader of the ''Cailgreth'' centaurs from the Krosan forest of Otaria on Dominaria.

Subira.name: Subira
Subira.description: Mabutho (grandson) '''Subira''' was a caravan drover from Dominaria. She led the Tulzidi Caravan across Jamuraa. She was affectionally called '''Subi''' by her husband.

Sulli Valenco.name: Sulli Valenco
Sulli Valenco.description: '''Sulli Valenco''' was a wojek Section Commander of the Ninth Section in 9999 Z.C., present during Agrus Kos's retirement hearing. She was one of his ex-wives.

biographical_info.title: Commander General of the Wojek LeagueSection Commander of the Ninth District

Sunastian Falconer.name: Sunastian Falconer
Sunastian Falconer.description: '''Sunastian Falconer''' was a legendary shaman whose origins on Dominaria are unknown.

Sutina.name: Sutina
Sutina.description: '''Sutina''' was a legendary elf scout from Zendikar during the time of the Eldrazi awakening.

Suzue.name: Suzue
Suzue.description: '''Suzue''' (SOO-zoo-ay) was a female Orochi from Kamigawa. She was the mother of Seshiro.

Svogthir.name: Svogthir
Svogthir.description: '''Svogthir''', called the "'''god-zombie'''," was the parun of the Golgari Swarm on the plane of Ravnica.

Symond Halm.name: Symond Halm
Symond Halm.description: '''Symond Halm''' was a playwright on Ravnica who got into debt with the cartel kingpin Ilona and paid the price.

Szadek.name: Szadek
Szadek.description: The Moroii vampire known as '''Szadek''' was the parun (founder) of House Dimir, the blue-black aligned guild of Ravnica.

biographical_info.lifetime: Time of the Thran or before - Rift Era

Taaveti.name: Taaveti
Taaveti.description: '''Taaveti''' of Kelsinko in Fyndhorn was an elven hunter who lived in Terisiare during the Ice Age of Dominaria.

Tae Jin.name: Tae Jin
Tae Jin.description: '''Tae Jin''' was a young monk follower of Shu Yun, in the past of Tarkir. Officially, he was part of Ojutai's clan.

Tagard Tarngold.name: Tagard Tarngold
Tagard Tarngold.description: '''Bey Tagard Tarngold''' was the human leader of the Valley of Tamingazin on Dominaria.

biographical_info.birthplace: Farson Hold, the Human Holds, Valley of Tamingazin, Tamingazin, Otaria, Dominaria
biographical_info.title: Bey Tagard

Tail Brothers.name: Tail Brothers
Tail Brothers.description: The '''Tail Brothers''' were a trio of kitsune samurai from Kamigawa, who accompanied princess Michiko and lady Pearl-Ear during their journey to the orochi country, and later to the Minamo Academy.

Taivas.name: Taivas
Taivas.description: '''Taivas''' was the human founder of the town of Traublassen, on the plane of Innistrad.

Takeshi Konda.name: Takeshi Konda
Takeshi Konda.description: Daimyo '''Takeshi Konda''' (KOHN-dah) was one of the greatest human rulers of the plane of Kamigawa. He resided in the great castle of Eiganjo from which he established his reign over the majority of Kamigawa.

Talara Many-Tined.name: Talara Many-Tined
Talara Many-Tined.description: '''Talara Many-Tined''' was a Shadowmoor elf of the Wilt Leaf tribe. A young elf warrior and safewright of great renown. She guarded an elvish safehold built around a waterfall, one of the only relatively beautiful places on her world.

Tameshi.name: Tameshi
Tameshi.description: '''Tameshi''' was a Moonfolk futurist wizard from Kamigawa.

Tamiyo.name: Tamiyo
Tamiyo.description: '''Tamiyo''' (; Phyrexian: temDwooD, IPA: [tamʔjoʊʔ]) was a Phyrexian Moonfolk planeswalker from Kamigawa. She was the wife of Genku and the mother of Hiroku, Rumiyo, and Nashi. She was killed by The Wanderer while leading the attack on Kamigawa during New Phyrexia's Invasion of the Multiverse and returned as an animated story scroll.

Tamsyn Sweene.name: Tamsyn Sweene
Tamsyn Sweene.description: '''Tamsyn Sweene''' was a role taken by a shapeshifter agent of House Dimir, who infiltrated Leighbet's discovery of electrical immunity.

Tasigur.name: Tasigur
Tasigur.description: '''Tasigur''' (/tæsɪɡɜːr/ ''TASS-ih-gur'') was a human khan in the past of Tarkir. During his time, humans still ruled the Sultai Brood.

biographical_info.death: A short time after the Khanfall,

Tavver.name: Tavver
Tavver.description: '''Tavver''' was an Oriq cultist on Arcavios. Tavver was resourceful and loyal to Extus Narr. Tavver blended into the shadows, capable of navigating covertly through difficult situations. He was cautious and calculated, always weighing the risks in a world full of powerful mages and dangerous missions. Tavver was pragmatic and aware of his limitations. He knew the dangers of his missions and the potential consequences of failure. Despite his reservations, he remained loyal to Extus, even when fa...

Tawnos.name: Tawnos
Tawnos.description: '''Tawnos''' was Urza's apprentice during the Brothers' War on Dominaria, and a gifted artificer in his own right. Despite serving on opposite sides of the war, he developed a romantic interest in Ashnod and earned the nickname "Duck" from her. After the war, they founded a school of magic and artifice near Ronom Lake, where he was known as '''Headmaster Duck'''.

Taysir of Rabiah.name: Taysir of Rabiah
Taysir of Rabiah.description: '''Taysir of Rabiah''' (TAY-zeer of RA-bee-ah) was the most powerful of the early story planeswalkers, and where he stands compared to Urza is debatable. His life was long and complicated, going from victim to hero to villain and hero again.
planes: Ice Age on the World of Magic: The Gathering
Shard of the Twelve Worlds|twelve-plane nexus

Tayva and Loria.name: Tayva and Loria
Tayva and Loria.description: '''Tayva and Loria''' were cousins from Terisiare who lived during the transition from the Ice Age to the Thaw of Terisiare, on the plane of Dominaria.

Te Ju Ki.name: Te Ju Ki
Te Ju Ki.description: '''Te Ju Ki''' was an old holy elder human on Dominaria. She became Ugin's mentor.

Temken.name: Temken
Temken.description: '''Temken''' was an elven mage from Argoth, part of the continent of Terisiare on Dominaria.

Temmet.name: Temmet
Temmet.description: '''Temmet''' was a cleric to the Amonkhet gods, responsible for taking care of the Anointed. Not older than 16, he was a vizier of Oketra, but his duties brought him in contact with all the five gods. Other than the Anointed, he also supervised the viziers of the other gods.{{WebRef|url=https://www.reddit.com/r/mtg/com...

Tenihas.name: Tenihas
Tenihas.description: '''Tenihas''' was the Bloodchief of House Ghet in Malakir, who was betrayed and killed by his heir, Anowon.

Teroh.name: Teroh
Teroh.description: Major '''Teroh''' was an Aven leader of the Order on Otaria, Dominaria.

Tetsuo Umezawa.name: Tetsuo Umezawa
Tetsuo Umezawa.description: '''Tetsuo Umezawa''' (oo-meh-ZAH-wah) was the imperial champion of the Empire of Madara around the time of the Mirage War. He was trained in many martial arts and magical techniques and was arguably the most powerful human of his time. Raised with a strict honor code, he was oft torn between his honor and his master, the vicious emperor of Madara, Nicol Bolas.

Thabit.name: Thabit
Thabit.description: '''Thabit of Almaaz''' was a Dominarian human song-mage from Almaaz who organized the Uprising in Epityr, a successful rebellion against the Sheoltuns.

Thane Du-Moriss IV.name: Thane Du-Moriss IV
Thane Du-Moriss IV.description: '''Thane Du-Moriss IV''' was the ruling wizard of Kieve and husband of Bayende.

Thatu Reiniger.name: Thatu Reiniger
Thatu Reiniger.description: '''Thatu Reiniger''' was a vampire lord and wielder of ''the Bloodletter'' on the plane of Innistrad.

The Archimandrite.name: The Archimandrite
The Archimandrite.description: '''The Archimandrite''' was one of the leaders of the Third Path, who lived in the tallest Ivory Tower in Terisia City.

Thelon.name: Thelon
Thelon.description: '''Thelon''' (THAY-lahn) of Havenwood was an elven druid from Sarpadia during the ''Fallen Empires'' period of Dominaria's Dark Age.

Thexar.name: Thexar
Thexar.description: '''Thexar''' was an Anaba minotaur from Ulgrotha around the time of the Homelands (ca. 3800 AR), who died in a ritual scarring ceremony gone wrong.

Thranegeld.name: Thranegeld
Thranegeld.description: '''Thranegeld''' was a dwarven docent at the Tolarian Academy of Lat-Nam.

Thura.name: Thura
Thura.description: '''Thura Sail-Rend''' is a human hero who went to the halls of Starnheim after her death.

Tibalt.name: Tibalt
Tibalt.description: '''Tibalt''' was a red-aligned, secondary in black, half-devil human planeswalker from the dark world of Innistrad. On Kaldheim, Tibalt assumed the identity of '''Valki, God of Lies''' after imprisoning the real Valki in Karfell.

biographical_info.race: Devil|Half-devil Human Phyrexian PlaneswalkerFormerly Devil|Half-devil Human Planeswalker
biographical_info.lifetime: Mending Era; Compleation|Compleated between 4561 and 4562 AR

Titania.name: Titania
Titania.description: '''Titania''' was the Maro-Sorcerer for the lush forest of Argoth, which was attacked by both sides for supplies at the end of the Brothers' War.

Tivadar.name: Tivadar
Tivadar.description: '''Tivadar''' of Thorn was the leader of the Knights of Thorn during the Dark on Dominaria. He led Tivadar's Crusade, a major campaign against the goblins and orcs of Terisiare, alongside Rasputin Dreamweaver.

Tiyint.name: Tiyint
Tiyint.description: '''Tiyint''' was a minotaur hero in the Dark Age of Terisiare, on the plane of Dominaria.

Tobias Andrion.name: Tobias Andrion
Tobias Andrion.description: '''Tobias Andrion''' was the most famous military administrator of the Sheoltun Empire on Dominaria.

biographical_info.lifetime: Some point between Ice Ice Age and the Thaw

Tobias Kavrel.name: Tobias Kavrel
Tobias Kavrel.description: '''Tobias Kavrel''' was the human lord of House Kavrel in Arathoxia on Corondor.

Tobita.name: Tobita
Tobita.description: '''Tobita''' (TOH-bih-tah) ''Master of Elements'' was a human wizard from Kamigawa who was active during the Kami War.

Tocasia.name: Tocasia
Tocasia.description: '''Tocasia''' was an elderly archeologist from Argive on Dominaria to whom both Urza and Mishra were apprenticed as youths.

Toggo.name: Toggo
Toggo.description: '''Toggo''' is a goblin artificer from Dominaria and the self-proclaimed inventor of and lightning.

Tok-Tok.name: Tok-Tok
Tok-Tok.description: '''Tok-Tok''' (TOHK-tohk; ) was an old akki shaman on Kamigawa famous for his ability to survive almost anything.

Tolsimir Wolfblood.name: Tolsimir Wolfblood
Tolsimir Wolfblood.description: '''Tolsimir Wolfblood''' was a long-lived elven evangelist of the Selesnya Conclave on Ravnica and the leader of the Ledev Guardians. He was killed by Yarus while defending Trostani during the Ravnican crime wave of 10,080 ZC.

Tomoya.name: Tomoya
Tomoya.description: '''Tomoya''' (TOH-moh-yah) ''the Revealer'' was a human wizard from Kamigawa who was active during the Kami War.

Tormod.name: Tormod
Tormod.description: '''Tormod''', ''the Desecrator'', is a lich from the Dark Age on Dominaria.

Torsten Von Ursus.name: Torsten Von Ursus
Torsten Von Ursus.description: '''Torsten Von Ursus''' was a legendary Human Soldier from Dominaria. He guided the ancestors of Benalia out of the ruins of the once-great Sheoltun Empire.

Tor Wauki the Elder.name: Tor Wauki the Elder
Tor Wauki the Elder.description: '''Tor Wauki the Elder''' was as an archer in the company of the pirate Ramirez DePietro.

Tor Wauki the Younger.name: Tor Wauki the Younger
Tor Wauki the Younger.description: '''Tor Wauki''' "the Younger" was Tetsuo Umezawa's second in the Empire of Madara on Dominaria. Having lived in Umezawa Manor since he was a child, he followed his master to Kusho to seek help for Kei Takahashi. Later he was drafted into the kentsu, where he was taught red magic by Kolo Meha and helped kill Halfdane.

Torya Longshanks.name: Torya Longshanks
Torya Longshanks.description: '''Torya Longshanks''' was a farmer turned soldier during the Dark Age of Terisiare on the plane of Dominaria.

Tourach.name: Tourach
Tourach.description: '''Tourach''' (too-ROK) was the founder, and first high priest, of the Order of the Ebon Hand on Sarpadia (Dominaria).

Trine.name: Trine
Trine.description: '''Trine''' was a Serra Angel who had been summoned by Archmage Xarl Angel-Keeper.

Tsabo Tavoc.name: Tsabo Tavoc
Tsabo Tavoc.description: Originally, '''Tsabo Tavoc''' was a female of an unnamed anthropomorphic (monstrous humanoid) race. She was captured by Phyrexians and altered to become the Phyrexian general who led the opening stages of the Phyrexian Invasion. She was highly ambitious and confident and planned to eventually replace Crovax as evincar of Rath.

Tuktuk.name: Tuktuk
Tuktuk.description: '''Tuktuk''' the Explorer was an adventurous goblin, brave for his kind and curious, always willing to venture deep into the vaults and chasms where Zendikar kept its best shinies.

Tulan.name: Tulan
Tulan.description: '''Tulan''' was the Master of the Grey House of Kestha, in the city of Estark on Dominaria. He participated in the Night of Fire, the destruction of the House of Oor-tael. He was considered the least dangerous of the House Masters.

Turg.name: Turg
Turg.description: '''Turg''' was a massive anurid (frog beast) employed by Ambassador Laquatus on Dominaria.

Tuvasa.name: Tuvasa
Tuvasa.description: Shaper '''Tuvasa''', also known as ''the Sunlit'', was a Great Shaper of the River Heralds on Ixalan.

Tymaret.name: Tymaret
Tymaret.description: '''Tymaret''', known by the humans of Theros as '''The Murder King''', is an undead warrior and the ''de facto'' leader of Odunos, the polis inhabited by the more violent Returned who have escaped the clutches of the plane's Underworld and its God Erebos.

Tymolin Loneglade.name: Tymolin Loneglade
Tymolin Loneglade.description: '''Tymolin Loneglade''' was a woman from Sarpadia, Dominaria. She was the sister of Tev Loneglade.

biographical_info.lifetime: Time of Legends - The Dark Age

Ulamog.name: Ulamog
Ulamog.description: '''Ulamog''', the "Infinite Gyre" is one of the three Eldrazi titans and the monstrosity whose half-forgotten name came to be known as the Zendikari merfolk sea god Ula.

biographical_info.lifetime: Active until the Time of Legends, released and killed in the Mending Era

Urabrask.name: Urabrask
Urabrask.description: '''Urabrask''' (Phyrexian: DYrbreLh, IPA: [ʔurbrask]), "the Hidden," was the red-aligned praetor of New Phyrexia. The most mysterious praetor in the beginning, his continual defiance of the New Phyrexian leadership gave the Mirran resistance the chance they needed to eventually bring the fall of Elesh Norn. He is presumed dead following New Phyrexia's Invasion of the Multiverse.
planes: New Phyrexia (plane)#Spheres of New Phyrexia|Furnace Layer

Uramon.name: Uramon
Uramon.description: Boss '''Uramon''' was a criminal overlord in the Takenuma swamp on Kamigawa.

Urdom.name: Urdom
Urdom.description: '''Urdom''' was a warrior and alleged hydra-slayer of Tazeem who hired himself out as a guide across the Teeth of Akoum.

Ursal Daleel.name: Ursal Daleel
Ursal Daleel.description: '''Ursal Daleel''' was the ambassador of Suderbod, placed in the city of Berimish.

Usman.name: Usman
Usman.description: Sergeant '''Usman''' was a Fallaji soldier who fought on the side of Mishra in the Brothers' War.

Uyo.name: Uyo
Uyo.description: '''Uyo''' (OO-yoh; ) was the greatest of soratami seers and prophets, and one of the highest-ranked persona in the soratami hierarchy on Kamigawa.

Vaevictis Asmadi.name: Vaevictis Asmadi
Vaevictis Asmadi.description: '''Vaevictis Asmadi''' was a large, powerful, and aggressive Elder Dragon. He had a characteristic fierce crest.

Varchild.name: Varchild
Varchild.description: General '''Varchild''' was the leader of the Kjeldoran army during the last years of the Ice Age of Dominaria, but later went rogue and lead a private army against the Balduvian barbarians.

Varnel Buckara.name: Varnel Buckara
Varnel Buckara.description: '''Varnel Buckara''' was the Master of the Orange House of Fentesk, in the city of Estark on Dominaria. He participated in the Night of Fire, the destruction of the House of Oor-tael.

Varragoth.name: Varragoth
Varragoth.description: '''Varragoth''', ''Bloodsky Sire'' was a demon rogue from Kaldheim.

Vaylesh.name: Vaylesh
Vaylesh.description: '''Vaylesh''' (VAY-lesh), known as the '''Ebon Hand Priestess''', was a high priestess in the Order of the Ebon Hand on Sarpadia (Dominaria).

Veldrane.name: Veldrane
Veldrane.description: '''Veldrane''' of Sengir was one of the Baron Sengir's minions on Ulgrotha and his most loyal servant. He was a poacher, scout, and messenger.

Vendilion Clique.name: Vendilion Clique
Vendilion Clique.description: The '''Vendilion Clique''' consisted of the fae triplets '''V'''eesa, '''End'''ry and '''Ilion'''a. Iliona was slightly older than her siblings and, as such, their leader. She often had to calm down her brother Endry and sister Veesa, who were very light-hearted even for the fae.

Venser.name: Venser
Venser.description: '''Venser''' was an artificer from Urborg on Dominaria, and a planeswalker affected by the time rift overshadowing the Stronghold Volcano. His corpse was reanimated into a Phyrexian as of the Second Phyrexian Invasion of Dominaria and ''Phyrexia: All Will Be One''.

Verdeloth.name: Verdeloth
Verdeloth.description: '''Verdeloth''' was a legendary magnigoth treefolk from Yavimaya who fought in the Phyrexian Invasion of Dominaria around AR 4205.

Vervamon.name: Vervamon
Vervamon.description: '''Vervamon''' the Elder was a sage and scholar who lived during the Dark Age on Dominaria.

Vhati il-Dal.name: Vhati il-Dal
Vhati il-Dal.description: '''Vhati il-Dal''' was Greven ''il''-Vec's ambitious second-in-command on Rath.

Vict Gharti.name: Vict Gharti
Vict Gharti.description: Commander-General ''' Vict Gharti''', nicknamed "Iron Vict", was the leader of the Wojek League of Ravnica in 9999 ZC, before the Decamillennial.

Vígniút.name: Vígniút
Vígniút.description: '''Vígniút''' is a deceased non-binary Tuskeri warrior from Kaldheim, who is enjoying their afterlife in the great hall of Starnheim.

Vinack.name: Vinack
Vinack.description: '''Vinack''' was an Akroan hero on the plane of Theros, who sacrificed himself to save his people. He was also a violent, abusive man who terrorized his family and the farmhands on his land.

Virot Maglan.name: Virot Maglan
Virot Maglan.description: '''Virot Maglan''', the '''Cabal Patriarch''' (also known as '''The First of the Cabal''') was the leader and founder of Dominaria's Cabal.

Vis Svokunol.name: Vis Svokunol
Vis Svokunol.description: '''Vis Svokunol''' was a loxodon friend of Asterion on Arcavios, who was wrongfully executed centuries ago.

Vito Quijano de Pasamonte.name: Vito Quijano de Pasamonte
Vito Quijano de Pasamonte.description: '''Vito Quijano de Pasamonte''' was a heretical vampire hierophant of the Church of Dusk who worshipped Aclazotz on the plane of Ixalan. He was granted demonic power by his god before his death.

Volpaig.name: Volpaig
Volpaig.description: '''Volpaig''' was a bishop of the Church of Avacyn, and secretly the leader of the Skirsdag Cult on the plane of Innistrad.

Volrath.name: Volrath
Volrath.description: '''Volrath''', born as '''Vuel''', was a human from Dominaria, who later became the shapeshifting and phyrexianized leader of Rath. He was one of the main antagonists in the Weatherlight Saga.

Vorik.name: Vorik
Vorik.description: Commander '''Vorik''' was a human captain of the Sea Gate militia on Zendikar who became the commander-general of the Zendikari troops after the Rise of the Eldrazi.

Vorinclex.name: Vorinclex
Vorinclex.description: '''Vorinclex''' (Phyrexian: lornScs, IPA: [vornχlx]), called '''The Voice of Hunger''', was the Green-aligned praetor of New Phyrexia.

Voska.name: Voska
Voska.description: '''Voska''' was a red mage who lived during the Dark Age on Dominaria.

Vronos.name: Vronos
Vronos.description: '''Vronos''', nicknamed the '''Gray Fencer''', was a planeswalker from Innistrad, who was killed by Garruk Wildspeaker.

Vy Covalt.name: Vy Covalt
Vy Covalt.description: '''Vy Covalt''' was a neurok from Mirrodin. After the fall of Memnarch and The Vanishing, the Vedalken, and their brain trust known as the Synod, solidified their power over the Quicksilver Sea and its surrounding realms — leaving the Neurok as second-class citizens. As the blinkmoth populations plummeted and serum became more precious, the Synod laid claim to all the serum on the plane. Without access to serum, some Neurok saw themselves destined to become a class of slaves. They began to form ...

Vytas.name: Vytas
Vytas.description: '''Vytas''' was a noble and an Umbris cultist from Traublassen, Innistrad.

Warlord of Kroog.name: Warlord of Kroog
Warlord of Kroog.description: The '''Warlord of Kroog''' was king of the nation of Yotia and father of Kayla bin-Kroog.

Warree Tarcha.name: Warree Tarcha
Warree Tarcha.description: '''Warree Tarcha''' was a kithkin augur from the Shadowmoor. She was an old wizard capable of casting very potent protective spells based on white mana. She lived in the doun of Kinscaer.

Wasitora.name: Wasitora
Wasitora.description: '''Wasitora''' was the queen of the nekoru cat-dragons on Dominaria. She was one of only three nekoru who had natural green-mana healing abilities. Her name means "Eagle Tiger."

Weaver King.name: Weaver King
Weaver King.description: The '''Weaver King''' was a villain in the ''Planar Chaos'' and ''Future Sight'' novels.

Whisper.name: Whisper
Whisper.description: '''Whisper''' was a human cleric of The Cabal on Dominaria.

Whistledove Kithkin.name: Whistledove Kithkin
Whistledove Kithkin.description: '''Whistledove Kithkin''' was a kithkin rogue from Amrou Haven who lived around 3334 AR on Jamuraa, Dominaria.

Worrin Betzold.name: Worrin Betzold
Worrin Betzold.description: '''Worrin Betzold''' was a human bishop, and the father of Dennick Betzold. After his death he became a zombie, mindlessly still preaching his sermons to the undead hordes swarming Thraben. He was a native of Gavony, Innistrad.

Wrenn.name: Wrenn
Wrenn.description: '''Wrenn''' was a dryad planeswalker introduced in ''Modern Horizons''. Her homeplane is currently unknown. She bonded with eight trees during her life, each of which she assigned a number: One, Two, Three, Four, Five, Six, Seven, and Eight (Realmbreaker).

Wydwen.name: Wydwen
Wydwen.description: '''Wydwen''', ''the Biting Gale'', was a mysterious legendary faerie character from Lorwyn–Shadowmoor.

Xander.name: Xander
Xander.description: Lord '''Xander''' was the crime-lord and boss of the Maestros family in New Capenna. He was killed by Ob Nixilis during the events of ''Streets of New Capenna''.

Xantcha.name: Xantcha
Xantcha.description: '''Xantcha''' was a newt created in the Fourth of the Nine Spheres of Phyrexia. She was designed to live undetected among humans. She resisted Phyrexia's plans for her, instead developing a close relationship with Urza, and was responsible for taking in their companion Ratepe.
planes: File:Healing Salve 2.jpg|300px|thumb|Xantcha receiving healing in Serra's Realm
Formation of the Shard of Twelve Worlds

Xarl.name: Xarl
Xarl.description: '''Xarl Angel-Keeper''', originally known only as '''Xarl''' or '''Xarl Whoreson''', was a wizard from Golthonor, on the continent of Corondor, on the plane of Dominaria.

Xenagos.name: Xenagos
Xenagos.description: '''Xenagos''' was a satyr planeswalker from Theros. He was once the lord of Skola Valley and was known at large as '''King Stranger'''. He later became the '''God of Revels'''.

Xian.name: Xian
Xian.description: Sir '''Xian''' was a Knight of Kjeldor in the Ice Age of Dominaria.

Xira Arien.name: Xira Arien
Xira Arien.description: '''Xira Arien''' has appeared twice in the ''Magic'' storyline.

Xyrun-Jed.name: Xyrun-Jed
Xyrun-Jed.description: '''Xyrun-Jed''' was a loxodon during Asterion's on Arcavios. He was the last emperor of the loxodon.

Yahenni.name: Yahenni
Yahenni.description: '''Yahenni''' (Yuh-hen-nee) was a aetherborn vampire from Avishkar. Investor, philanthropist and socialite, knowing their life was near an end.

Yasova.name: Yasova
Yasova.description: '''Yasova Dragonclaw''' was a khan in the past of Tarkir who led the Temur Frontier. She was a powerful shaman, adept at calling upon the elemental forces of the mountains and turning her enemies' power against themselves. After the fall of the khans, Yasova lost her ''Dragonclaw'' title and was renamed '''Yasova First Mother'''. She had a sabertooth named '''Anchin''' who was her companion.

Yawgmoth.name: Yawgmoth
Yawgmoth.description: '''Yawgmoth''' (Phyrexian: wUDkmoDZ, IPA: [jɒʔgmoʔθ], lit. "Machine Father"), also known as '''The Ineffable''' to his servants and referred to as '''The Lord of the Wastes''' throughout Dominarian mythology, was the god and progenitor of the Phyrexian race. Originally human, in his early life he was a medical genius of the ancient Thran Empire known for his highly controversial solutions to medical ailments.

Yert.name: Yert
Yert.description: '''Yert''' was a Moriok from the Mephidross on Mirrodin, who later became a vampire.

Yolotzin.name: Yolotzin
Yolotzin.description: '''Yolotzin''' was a human warrior-poet from Ixalan.

Yorgo.name: Yorgo
Yorgo.description: '''Yorgo''' (YOR-go) was a ruffian in Arathoxia on Dominaria.

Yosei.name: Yosei
Yosei.description: '''Yosei''' (YO-say; |Yōsei|Yang Star Yosei was summoned by Konda during the Kami War to fight against O-Kagachi. Half of his body was torn off in a battle against the Great Serpent. Still, Yosei defended Eiganjo Castle when it was attacked by hordes of akki. Yosei dies after defending the Castle.

Yunnie.name: Yunnie
Yunnie.description: '''Yunnie''' was a man from Shingol in the Dark Age of Terisiare, on the plane of Dominaria.

Yzaak.name: Yzaak
Yzaak.description: '''Yzaak''' was an Izzet cyclops, attendant to the scientist and guildmage Madarrak on the plane of Ravnica.

Zagorka.name: Zagorka
Zagorka.description: '''Zagorka''', known as '''She Disputes''' among Averru's Glyphs, was a human woman living on Otaria, Dominaria, who came into conflict with Ixidor and Kamahl.

Zalgadib.name: Zalgadib
Zalgadib.description: '''Zalgadib''' was a Tempest Efreet from Suq'Ata on Dominaria.

Zangari.name: Zangari
Zangari.description: '''Lord Zangari''' was a human noble from the plane of Fiora, whose schemes and machinations caused his downfall.

Zaraya.name: Zaraya
Zaraya.description: Sir '''Zaraya''' (zair-EYE-uh) was the commander of the Knights of Kjeldor, during the Ice Age of Dominaria.
planes: Ice Age on the World of Magic: The Gathering
Ice Age on the World of Magic: The Gathering|Ice Age

biographical_info.lifetime: Ice Ice Age. Last seen alive in 2934.

Zarel Ewine.name: Zarel Ewine
Zarel Ewine.description: '''Zarel Ewine''' was the Grand Master of the Arena in the city of Estark on Dominaria, between the Night of Fire and the Time of Troubles.

Zareth San.name: Zareth San
Zareth San.description: '''Zareth San''', known as "The Trickster", was a young merfolk rogue from Zendikar and a member of the Sea Gate Expeditionary House.

Zegana.name: Zegana
Zegana.description: '''Zegana''' was a stately and reserved merfolk wizard from Ravnica. She used to be the Speaker for Zonot One and Prime Speaker for a time, fulfilling the role of guildmaster of the Simic Combine. She upheld the traditional way of the guild and its utopian philosophy. She was replaced by Vannifar as Guildmaster, and later murdered by Etrata while the assassin was under the influence of Trostani's mind control pollen.

Zeki.name: Zeki
Zeki.description: '''Zeki''' was a Reef pirate on Ulgrotha around the time of the Homelands (ca. 3800 AR).

Zenon.name: Zenon
Zenon.description: '''Zenon''' was one of Kytheon Iora's irregulars on the plane of Theros. He was a Setessan and wore a green cloak.

Zhulodok.name: Zhulodok
Zhulodok.description: '''Zhulodok''', ''Void Gorger'', was an Eldrazi of Ulamog’s lineage.

Zilgeth.name: Zilgeth
Zilgeth.description: '''Zilgeth''' was the leader of Clan Ruby in Storgard in the Ice Age of Dominaria.

Zivan.name: Zivan
Zivan.description: '''Zivan''' was once a renowned Arbiter and legislator within the Azorius Senate, known for his exceptional legal skills and the ability to debate for hours on end.

Zomaj Hauc.name: Zomaj Hauc
Zomaj Hauc.description: '''Zomaj Hauc''' was a demented Izzet magelord from Ravnica, who schemed for world domination.

Zo-Zu.name: Zo-Zu
Zo-Zu.description: '''Zo-Zu''', the Punisher (ZOH-zoo; ), was a reclusive akki of Kamigawa, who made his home wandering in the Sokenzan Mountains.

Zumaki.name: Zumaki
Zumaki.description: '''Zumaki of the Bottomless Pool''' was an old dragon engine from Dominaria.

Adeline.name: Adeline
Adeline.description: '''Adeline''' is a cathar from Innistrad who worked with the Dawnhart Coven to reverse the Eternal night.

Alena.name: Alena
Alena.description: '''Alena''' is a trapper from Kessig on Innistrad. She is the partner (in both work and life) of Halana.

Alharu.name: Alharu
Alharu.description: '''Alharu''', ''Solemn Ritualist'', is a monk from an unknown plane.

Alniul.name: Alniul
Alniul.description: '''Alniul''', the Twice Whisperer, is a human shaman from Tarkir and the head whisperer of the Temur Frontier.

Arima.name: Arima
Arima.description: '''Arima''' is a non-binary human scientist from Kamigawa.

Armont.name: Armont
Armont.description: Syr '''Armont''' is a Human woman and Knight from Ardenvale, Eldraine.

Baylen.name: Baylen
Baylen.description: '''Baylen''' is a legendary rabbitfolk warrior from Bloomburrow.

Chiye.name: Chiye
Chiye.description: '''Chiye''' is a non-binary human cook from Kamigawa who is a member of the Asari Uprisers.

Deidamia.name: Deidamia
Deidamia.description: '''Deidamia''' is a non-binary witch from Innistrad.

Delney.name: Delney
Delney.description: '''Delney''' is a human scout from Ravnica. They are part of the Guildless.

Dipo Wola.name: Dipo Wola
Dipo Wola.description: '''Dipo Wola''' is one of Zimone Wola's fathers on Arcavios.

Elnor.name: Elnor
Elnor.description: '''Elnor''' is a human from New Capenna who traveled through an Omenpath to Thunder Junction.

Errant.name: Errant
Errant.description: '''Errant''' is a human rogue woman, affiliated with the Maestros family in New Capenna. She is the daughter of Anhelo and Serena; and the wife of Parnesse.

Felothar.name: Felothar
Felothar.description: '''Felothar Zanhar''' is a human warrior from Tarkir. She is the head of House Zanhar, the current khan of the Abzan Houses, and bound to the spirit dragon Betor.

Gev.name: Gev
Gev.description: '''Gev''' is a lizardfolk from Goodhill on Bloomburrow, and a member of Mabel’s party.

Gonti.name: Gonti
Gonti.description: '''Gonti''' is an aetherborn former crime lord who presided over Ghirapur's Night Market, where Renegades flocked to obtain illicit goods and siphoned aether. Gonti provided aid to the Renegades in exchange for services rendered later. After New Phyrexia's Invasion of the Multiverse and the creation of the Avishkar Assembly, Gonti was legitimized as the night minister of Ghirapur.

Hailin.name: Hailin
Hailin.description: '''Hailin''' is a man from the small village of Lambholt on the plane of Innistrad. He is also the archmage Vadrik's husband.

Haktos.name: Haktos
Haktos.description: '''Haktos''' is a legendary warrior of Akros on Theros.

Halana.name: Halana
Halana.description: '''Halana''', or '''Hal''', is a ranger from Kessig on Innistrad. She is the partner (in both work and life) of Alena. They are trackers, hunters, and protectors who live in the depths of the dark Ulvenwald.

Hallar.name: Hallar
Hallar.description: '''Hallar''', ''the Firefletcher'' is a elf archer from Llanowar, Dominaria.

Heiko Yamazaki.name: Heiko Yamazaki
Heiko Yamazaki.description: '''Heiko Yamazaki''' (yah-mah-ZAH-kee) is a human samurai member of the Asari Uprisers in Kamigawa. She is a descendant of the Yamazaki clan.

Huatli.name: Huatli
Huatli.description: '''Huatli''' is a human and warrior-poet from Ixalan with an affinity for dinosaurs. She is the romantic partner of Saheeli Rai.
planes: File:Huatli Poet of Unity.jpg|thumb|262x262px|Desparked on Ixalan

Hugs.name: Hugs
Hugs.description: '''Hugs''' is a gruff old badgerfolk from Goodhill on Bloomburrow, and a member of Mabel’s party.

biographical_info.birthplace: Bloomburrow (plane)#Known locations|The Root Maze, Valley, Bloomburrow

Joshua and Saxon.name: Joshua and Saxon
Joshua and Saxon.description: Syr '''Joshua''', ''the Beast Tamer'', and Syr '''Saxon''' are a pair of human knights and lovers from Eldraine.

Malynn.name: Malynn
Malynn.description: '''Malynn''' is a crone in the small village of Lambholt on the plane of Innistrad.

Nassari.name: Nassari
Nassari.description: Dean '''Nassari''' is an efreet shaman teacher at the Prismari College of Strixhaven University on Arcavios. They were compleated during New Phyrexia's Invasion of the Multiverse.

Nnanyielugo.name: Nnanyielugo
Nnanyielugo.description: '''Nnanyielugo''' is a Silverquill student on Arcavios.

Orhaft Stoneback.name: Orhaft Stoneback
Orhaft Stoneback.description: '''Orhaft Stoneback''' is a human Vedrune from Kaldheim, and a member of the Omenseekers. Orhaft uses xe/xer pronouns.

Oviya Pashiri.name: Oviya Pashiri
Oviya Pashiri.description: '''Oviya Pashiri''' is a renegade lifecrafter from Avishkar. She is called a '''Grandmother''' by Ajani Goldmane.

Parnesse.name: Parnesse
Parnesse.description: '''Parnesse''', ''the Subtle Brush'', is a vampire wizard of the Maestros family in New Capenna.

Rocco.name: Rocco
Rocco.description: '''Rocco''', ''Cabaretti Caterer'', is an elf druid of the Cabaretti family in New Capenna.

Talion.name: Talion
Talion.description: '''Talion''', known as "the Kindly Lord, First and Greatest of the High Fae, Sovereign of the Court, the Liege of Laughter, Finder of the First Yew, and the One True Lord of Eldraine" is a faerie noble serving as the Fae Lord of the Wilds of Eldraine. The fae duelist Obyra is one of their daughters.

Tivit.name: Tivit
Tivit.description: '''Tivit''', the ''Seller of Secrets'', is a Sphinx rogue from Capenna. They are a seer for the Obscura.

Tomik Vrona.name: Tomik Vrona
Tomik Vrona.description: '''Tomik Vrona''' is a law and security mage from Ravnica. He is chief advokist of the Orzhov Syndicate, and the former apprentice of Teysa Karlov. He served as acting guildmaster after the War of the Spark, but has since become second to Teysa.

Vadrik.name: Vadrik
Vadrik.description: '''Vadrik''', Astral Archmage, is a human wizard from Innistrad.

Yenna.name: Yenna
Yenna.description: '''Yenna''' is a female Elf noble and the regent of Redtooth Keep.

Yuma.name: Yuma
Yuma.description: '''Yuma''' is a human ranger from New Capenna who traveled through an Omenpath to Thunder Junction.

Zihir Wola.name: Zihir Wola
Zihir Wola.description: '''Zihir Wola''' is Zimone Wola's father on Arcavios.

Zinnia.name: Zinnia
Zinnia.description: '''Zinnia''' is a birdfolk troubadour from Bloomburrow, and was introduced in the Family Matters commander deck.

Bruenna.name: Bruenna
