Bruenna.description: '''Bruenna''' was the leader of the Neurok humans of Medev on the plane of Mirrodin.

Cazur.name: Cazur
Cazur.description: '''Cazur''' is a human warrior from Ikoria. He is bonded with the monstrous whale wolf '''Ukkima'''.

Daretti.name: Daretti
Daretti.description: '''Daretti''' is a goblin planeswalker from the plane of Fiora. He was the master and suspected murder victim of the artificer Muzzio. He lost his spark in the Desparkening.

Fonn Zunich.name: Fonn Zunich
Fonn Zunich.description: '''Fonn Zunich''' was the half-elf daughter of wojek officer Myczil Zunich and a Silhana priestess on Ravnica. After her father's death, she joined the Selesnya Conclave.

Hazoret.name: Hazoret
Hazoret.description: '''Hazoret''' is the Jackal-headed Amonkheti god of zeal. She was responsible for the final trial and slaughtered the winner with her spear, rewarding them with the God-Pharaoh's presence. After the Hour of Devastation she became known as the '''God-Survivor'''.

Imodane.name: Imodane
Imodane.description: Syr '''Imodane''' is a Human woman and pyromancer from Eldraine. She briefly declared herself Queen.

Inga Rune-Eyes.name: Inga Rune-Eyes
Inga Rune-Eyes.description: '''Inga Rune-Eyes''' is the leader of the Omenseekers clan of humans from the realm of Bretagard on Kaldheim.

Kaalia.name: Kaalia
Kaalia.description: '''Kaalia''' is a powerful double-winged human cleric from Alara, tormented by her past and scarred by devastation. In addition to her powers of flight, she has stonebreaking magic and the ability to beckon angels, dragons and demons to battle.

Lathril.name: Lathril
Lathril.description: '''Lathril''' was the elf queen who became a blind Einir of Kaldheim.

Lyese (character).name: Lyese (character)
Lyese (character).description: '''Lyese''' was the elven sister of Glissa Sunseeker.

Mayael.name: Mayael
Mayael.description: '''Mayael''' is a female shaman and the ''de facto'' leader of the Cylian elves from Alara. On Naya, she is also known as the '''Anima'''.

Narset.name: Narset
Narset.description: '''Narset''' is a human monk and former planeswalker from Tarkir. She is the khan of the Jeskai Way and bound to the spirit dragon Shiko.
planes: Dungeons & Dragons: Adventures in the Forgotten Realms

Ramirez DePietro.name: Ramirez DePietro
Ramirez DePietro.description: '''Ramirez DePietro''' was a flamboyant pirate from Dominaria, who pillaged the seas surrounding Jamuraa around 3330 AR and later continued to do so as a ghost.

Ruhan.name: Ruhan
Ruhan.description: '''Ruhan''' ''of the Fomori'', is a legendary giant warrior from the plane of Ir.

Ruric Thar.name: Ruric Thar
Ruric Thar.description: '''Ruric Thar''' is a two-headed ogre warrior and the chieftain of the Ghor-Clan of the Gruul Clans on Ravnica. They are one of the few beings to challenge Borborygmos and live, though they did not escape unscathed. Because of their peculiarity, most consider them two individuals sharing the same body and treat them accordingly.

Tacenda Verlasen.name: Tacenda Verlasen
Tacenda Verlasen.description: '''Tacenda Verlasen''' is a songmage and possible planeswalker from Innistrad.
planes: Multiverse|worlds. Hundreds upon hundreds of them. So many people

Teysa Karlov.name: Teysa Karlov
Teysa Karlov.description: '''Teysa Karlov''' is the Matriarch of the Karlov family, current guildmaster of the Orzhov Syndicate, and the wealthiest individual on Ravnica. She was assassinated around 10,080 ZC as part of a Ravnican crime wave. She returned as a spirit after the case was resolved to once again lead the Orzhov.

Tommy.name: Tommy
Tommy.description: '''Tommy''' is a human, an Atiin from an unknown plane who has ended up on Thunder Junction.

Tori D'Avenant.name: Tori D'Avenant
Tori D'Avenant.description: '''Tori D'Avenant''' is a human knight from Dominaria.

Toski.name: Toski
Toski.description: '''Toski''' is a small Cosmos monster from Kaldheim and the messenger of the gods.

Tymna.name: Tymna
Tymna.description: '''Tymna''' ''the Weaver'' is a legendary human cleric from Theros.

Vikya.name: Vikya
Vikya.description: '''Vikya''', ''Scorching Stalwart'', is a legendary New Argivian human warrior from Dominaria.

Winota.name: Winota
Winota.description: '''Winota''', ''Heartbonder'' is a human warrior on the plane of Ikoria.

Yisan.name: Yisan
Yisan.description: '''Yisan''' is a human rogue from the plane of Shandalar.

Zara.name: Zara
Zara.description: '''Zara''', ''Renegade Recruiter'' is a pirate from Avishkar.

Adrix and Nev.name: Adrix and Nev
Adrix and Nev.description: Professors '''Adrix and Nev''' are merfolk teachers at the Quandrix College of Strixhaven University on Arcavios.

Agnate.name: Agnate
Agnate.description: '''Agnate''' was a Metathran general on Dominaria. He was the twin brother of Thaddeus, with whom he shared a semi-telepathic bond, which helped coordinate their armies on the battlefield.

Eiko Shizuki.name: Eiko Shizuki
Eiko Shizuki.description: '''Eiko Shizuki''' is the sister of the planeswalker Kaito Shizuki and native to the plane of Kamigawa.

Geralf Cecani.name: Geralf Cecani
Geralf Cecani.description: '''Geralf III Cecani''' is a blue-aligned necromancer from Innistrad. He has a rivalry with his twin sister Gisa Cecani.

Gisa Cecani.name: Gisa Cecani
Gisa Cecani.description: '''Gisa Cecani''' (Gee-sah Seh-sahn-nee) is a black-aligned necromancer from Innistrad. She has a rivalry with her twin brother Geralf Cecani.

Iroas.name: Iroas
Iroas.description: '''Iroas''' is the God of Victory on Theros. He is associated with white and red mana.

Kela and Dar Chensal.name: Kela and Dar Chensal
Kela and Dar Chensal.description: '''Kela and Dar Chensal''' are a pair of Arbiter Twins of the Jeskai Clan in Tarkir's original timeline. It is unknown if they exist in Tarkir's current timeline.

Khali.name: Khali
Khali.description: '''Khali''' is a Kor hookmaster from Zendikar. Khali and her twin brother Sha'heel joined Nissa Revane and the three humans Hamadi, Bahkut, and Alira in hunting Eldrazi. As an experienced hookmaster, Khali and her brother led the climb up the gravity fields, and through the maze of floating boulders. Nissa watched the brother and sister communicate with a series of intricate hand gestures as they made their way deeper into the gravity field. Dozens of massive boulders moved in apparent chaos as ...

Marunaten and Merinaten.name: Marunaten and Merinaten
Marunaten and Merinaten.description: '''Marunaten''' and '''Merinaten''' ('''Meru''' and '''Meri''') are a young pair of Human twins from Amonkhet.

Mina and Denn.name: Mina and Denn
Mina and Denn.description: '''Mina and Denn''' are a pair of twin elves of the Mul Daya tribe of Zendikar. Mina is what is known as a ''Greenweaver'', able to channel the essence of their ancestors and their bond with nature into raw magical power.

Mogis.name: Mogis
Mogis.description: '''Mogis''' is the God of Slaughter on Theros. He is associated with black and red mana.

Omo.name: Omo
Omo.description: '''Omo''' is the shared name of a pair of identical twin shapeshifter sisters who are queen of Vesuva on the plane of Dominaria.

Thaddeus.name: Thaddeus
Thaddeus.description: '''Thaddeus''' was one of a pair of Metathran commanders created by Urza as part of his Bloodline project to lead the Dominarian armies during the Phyrexian Invasion. He was the twin of Agnate and the two shared a semi-telepathic bond, which helped coordinate their armies on the battlefield.

Ugin.name: Ugin
Ugin.description: '''Ugin''' (/uːɡɪn/ ''OO-gin'') is an elder dragon planeswalker from Dominaria.

biographical_info.lifetime: Mythohistory (first life)Mythohistory - The Thaw (second life)Mending Era - present (third life)

Abuelo.name: Abuelo
Abuelo.description: '''"Abuelo"''' (lit. "grandfather") was a Komon Winaq human warrior from Ixalan.

biographical_info.lifetime: Died centuries before 5 Dawn EraEcho summoned 5 Dawn Era

Agrus Kos.name: Agrus Kos
Agrus Kos.description: '''Agrus Kos''' was an officer of the League of Wojek in the Boros Legion. From a young age, Kos believed in upholding the law. As an orphan, his only dream was to join the Boros and protect the citizenry of Ravnica. Kos epitomized the tough "street cop" archetype, complete with a drinking problem and a distaste for rookies. After his death, he became a spirit.

Amalia Benavides Aguirre.name: Amalia Benavides Aguirre
Amalia Benavides Aguirre.description: '''Amalia Benavides Aguirre''' is a young vampire scout from Torrezon on Ixalan.

Anafenza Mevak.name: Anafenza Mevak
Anafenza Mevak.description: Original timeline:Gvar Barzeel (adoptive brother)Oret (cousin, disowned)Numerous uncles

Ancient One.name: Ancient One
Ancient One.description: The '''Ancient One''' was one of the original Deep Gods of Ixalan's Core. Killed and usurped by Aclazotz before he could emerge, he is now a Spirit God.

Andres.name: Andres
Andres.description: Don '''Andres''', also known as ''the Renegade'', is a legendary vampire pirate from Ixalan.

Anowon.name: Anowon
Anowon.description: '''Anowon''' is the scion of a powerful vampire family from Malakir on Zendikar.

Asterion.name: Asterion
Asterion.description: '''Asterion''' is a statue spirit and mentor of Quintorius at Strixhaven on Arcavios.

Bertram Graywater.name: Bertram Graywater
Bertram Graywater.description: Baron '''Bertram Graywater''' is a vampire noble from an unknown plane.

Bozak.name: Bozak
Bozak.description: '''Bozak''' is an undead fungal kraul and servant of Mazirek, part of the Golgari Swarm on the plane of Ravnica.

Carmen.name: Carmen
Carmen.description: '''Carmen''', also known as the ''Cruel Skymarcher'', is a Legion of Dusk vampire soldier from Ixalan.

Cormela.name: Cormela
Cormela.description: '''Cormela''', ''Glamour Thief'' is a vampire rogue of the Maestros family in New Capenna.

Cyril Rav.name: Cyril Rav
Cyril Rav.description: '''Cyril Rav''' was a necro-alchemist from Innistrad whose use of a geist-bomb turned him into a geist that could possess people's bodies.

Dennick Betzold.name: Dennick Betzold
Dennick Betzold.description: '''Dennick Betzold''' was a human soldier, and a son of bishop Worrin Betzold. After his death he became a spirit soldier. He was a native of Gavony, Innistrad.

Dorothea.name: Dorothea
Dorothea.description: '''Dorothea''' is a geist from Innistrad. Dorothea is among the countless humans mercilessly slaughtered by Olivia Voldaren over the years, and is now one of the numerous souls trapped in Olivia's wedding train. A skilled sorcerer in life, Dorothea specialized in bloodline magic. If she were freed from Olivia's accoutrement, she could lend considerable strength to a blood relative in battle. Coincidentally, her great-grandson is among the cathars rallied to attack Olivia's wedding.

Elenda of Garrano.name: Elenda of Garrano
Elenda of Garrano.description: '''Elenda of Garrano''', also known as '''the first vampire,''' the '''Dusk Rose''' or '''Black Rose''', and '''Saint Elenda the Venerable''' is the legendary ancestor of the vampires of the Legion of Dusk on Ixalan.

Etrata.name: Etrata
Etrata.description: '''Etrata''' is a vampire assassin from Ravnica, and a former champion of House Dimir. She is currently employed as a detective at the Ravnican Agency of Magicological Investigations.

Evelyn.name: Evelyn
Evelyn.description: '''Evelyn''', ''the Covetous'', is a vampire rogue of the Maestros family in New Capenna.

Felisa Fang.name: Felisa Fang
Felisa Fang.description: '''Felisa Fang''' is a vampire wizard student at the Silverquill College of Strixhaven University on Arcavios. She is called ''Fang of the Silverquill'' which is a play on her last name. She is a Vainglory, a Silverquill mage that uses words to inspire or reproach their target.

Florian Voldaren.name: Florian Voldaren
Florian Voldaren.description: '''Florian Voldaren''' is a vampire noble from Innistrad. He is of the Voldaren bloodline.

Gorex.name: Gorex
Gorex.description: '''Gorex''' is a massive turtle zombie from Nephalia, Innistrad.

Haunt of Hightower.name: Haunt of Hightower
Haunt of Hightower.description: The '''Haunt of Hightower''' is a legendary Moroii vampire from Ravnica.

Henrika Domnathi.name: Henrika Domnathi
Henrika Domnathi.description: '''Henrika Domnathi''', known as the ''Infernal Seer'', is the progenitor of the minor Domnathi vampire bloodline on Innistrad. She is the rumored one-time lover of Griselbrand.

Ihsan.name: Ihsan
Ihsan.description: '''Ihsan''' is a servant of Baron Sengir, and was once a Serran Paladin on the plane of Ulgrotha.

Inti.name: Inti
Inti.description: '''Inti''', called the '''seneschal of the sun''', was an imperial officer of the Sun Empire on Ixalan, and a human knight. He was the cousin of Huatli, and brother to multiple sisters.

Irini Sengir.name: Irini Sengir
Irini Sengir.description: '''Irini Sengir''' is the "adopted daughter" of Baron Sengir.

Kamber.name: Kamber
Kamber.description: '''Kamber''' is a Vampire rogue from Innistrad. Kamber and Laurine had their next heist all figured out. Laurine would scout the location and serve as a distraction while Kamber grabbed the goods. However, they failed to account for the thousand-year-old vampire that slept inside the tomb. While Laurine can't shake the intrusive thought that her longtime partner might be tempted to eat her, it will take more than a little vampirism to break up Innistrad's premiere grave-robbing duo.

Karador.name: Karador
Karador.description: '''Karador''' ''Ghost Chieftain'' is a legendary centaur spirit from an unspecified plane.

Kazarov.name: Kazarov
Kazarov.description: '''Kazarov''' is a Sengir vampire from Dominaria. Stemming from the undead curse of a single progenitor, Baron Sengir, the line of Sengir vampires extends across multiple planes. Sengir vampires are the living dead, sustained in undeath by feeding on the blood of the living. Many of them can pass on the vampiric condition by biting but not killing other people, but the further removed they get from their vampire progenitor, the more degenerate and aberrant they become. Kazarov, though, is an ari...

Kraum.name: Kraum
Kraum.description: '''Kraum''', ''Ludevic's Opus'', is a legendary zombie horror from Innistrad.

Kurkesh.name: Kurkesh
Kurkesh.description: '''Kurkesh''' is an ogre spirit, infesting ancient ruins on Shandalar.

Laelia.name: Laelia
Laelia.description: '''Laelia''', ''the Blade Reforged'', is a spirit warrior of Strixhaven University on Arcavios.

Lim-Dûl.name: Lim-Dûl
Lim-Dûl.description: Postrevisionist: The Eternal Ice, The Shattered Alliance
planes: Ice Age on the World of Magic: The Gathering

Lucard.name: Lucard
Lucard.description: '''Lucard''' is the vampire king of the island of Luneau on the plane of Ixalan. His current status is uncertain.

Mavren Fein.name: Mavren Fein
Mavren Fein.description: Pontifex '''Mavren Fein''', is the highest ranking member of the Church of Dusk, Torrezon's clergy on Ixalan.

Mikaeus Cecani.name: Mikaeus Cecani
Mikaeus Cecani.description: '''Mikaeus Cecani''' (Seh-sahn-nee) was the highest-ranking member of the Church of Avacyn, under Avacyn herself. He held the title of Lunarch, the highest rank within the church of Avacyn a human can attain. Mikaeus and his entourage of bishops lead the people of Thraben as well as preserving the faith of Avacyn in the townsfolk all across the plane of Innistrad, using it to empower the Inquisitors and Cathars who fight against the darkness and monsters.

Millicent.name: Millicent
Millicent.description: '''Millicent''' is a geist soldier from Innistrad. She has wild hair, round eyes, strong shoulders, and a furious mouth.

Mirko Vosk.name: Mirko Vosk
Mirko Vosk.description: '''Mirko Vosk''' is a high-ranking member of the House Dimir and a Moroii vampire detective on Ravnica.

Narfi.name: Narfi
Narfi.description: King '''Narfi''' is a zombie wizard from Karfell on Kaldheim.

Obuun.name: Obuun
Obuun.description: In life, centuries ago, the elf '''Obuun''' was the leader of the Mul Daya rebellion against the Bala Ged Skyclave on Zendikar. He now lives on as a spirit.

Obzedat.name: Obzedat
Obzedat.description: The '''Obzedat''' (also known as the '''Ghost Council of Orzhova''') is the ruling body of the Orzhov Syndicate on Ravnica.

Olag.name: Olag
Olag.description: '''Olag''', Ludevic's Hubris, is a zombie from Innistrad.

Ranar.name: Ranar
Ranar.description: '''Ranar''' the ''Ever-Watchful'' is a spirit warrior from Kaldheim. He is also known as '''Ranar of Istfell'''.

Ratadrabik.name: Ratadrabik
Ratadrabik.description: '''Ratadrabik''' of Urborg is a lich from Dominaria.

Reezug.name: Reezug
Reezug.description: '''Reezug''', also known as ''the Bonecobbler'', is a legendary spirit on the plane of Dominaria.

Rodolf Duskbringer.name: Rodolf Duskbringer
Rodolf Duskbringer.description: '''Rodolf Duskbringer''' is a legendary vampire angel from Dominaria introduced in ''Jumpstart 2022''.

Rorix Bladewing.name: Rorix Bladewing
Rorix Bladewing.description: '''Rorix Bladewing''' is the originator of the Bladewing brood. The skeletal dragon still haunts the skies of Dominaria, to the chagrin of his descendants.

Runo Stromkirk.name: Runo Stromkirk
Runo Stromkirk.description: '''Runo Stromkirk''' is the progenitor of the Stromkirk line of vampires and high priest of the cult of an ancient god of the sea and storms on Innistrad.

Sedris.name: Sedris
Sedris.description: '''Sedris''', a.k.a. '''The Traitor King''' is the most powerful lich on the former Shard of Alara known as Grixis.

Sengir.name: Sengir
Sengir.description: The infamous Baron '''Sengir''' is a vampire lord, ruling the Dark Barony on Ulgrotha from Castle Sengir. He is the progenitor of the Sengir vampires that can be found on multiple planes. Notable Sengir vampires include Irini Sengir on Ulgrotha, and Arvad, Kazarov, and Verrak on Dominaria.

Sidisi.name: Sidisi
Sidisi.description: '''Sidisi''' is a treacherous naga from Tarkir. She epitomizes the decadent and merciless nature of the Sultai Brood as it once was.

Skaal Kesh.name: Skaal Kesh
Skaal Kesh.description: '''Skaal Kesh''' is a zombie dragon from Jund, Alara, raised into undeath by the necromancy of Meren of Clan Nel Toth.

Skeleton Ship.name: Skeleton Ship
Skeleton Ship.description: '''The Skeleton Ship''' is a legendary skeletal vessel sailing the waters of Dominaria during the The Ice Age.

biographical_info.lifetime: Ice The Ice Age of Dominaria

Storrev.name: Storrev
Storrev.description: '''Storrev''' is a Devkarin elven lich and leader of the Erstwhile, a zombie faction within the Golgari Swarm of Ravnica.

The Fallen.name: The Fallen
The Fallen.description: '''The Fallen''' were mages from Dominaria, who were turned into almost brainless monsters by mana burn.

Thraximundar.name: Thraximundar
Thraximundar.description: '''Thraximundar''' is a brutal undead warrior from Alaran Grixis who lives to slay. He is fully seven feet tall and rippling with dead muscle, clad in dreadful spiked armor and wielding a greatsword. Astride his massive dreg reaver mount like some dark parody of a knight, Thraximundar - whose name means "he who paints the earth red" - is drawn to the sounds and emotions of mass violence. He never takes sides - he slays anyone, taking grim pleasure in the pure act of war itself.

Timin.name: Timin
Timin.description: '''Timin''' is a geist from Innistrad. Spirits do not typically cooperate with humans, and cathars rarely tolerate the presence of geists. In various battles during The Travails, Rhoda and Timin coincidentally (and repeatedly) saved each other's life and unlife, respectively. They eventually came to the conclusion that they were stronger together than on their own, resulting in one of Innistrad's strangest team-ups. Although Emrakul has been sealed away, their partnership remains. Together they ...

Tinybones.name: Tinybones
Tinybones.description: Tinybones is a skeleton rogue from Urborg, Dominaria.

Traft.name: Traft
Traft.description: ''Saint'' '''Traft''' was a young priest in the Church of Avacyn on Innistrad. He is now a geist.

Uchbenbak.name: Uchbenbak
Uchbenbak.description: '''Uchbenbak''', also known as the ''Great Mistake'', is a skeleton horror in the caverns of Ixalan.

Urgoros.name: Urgoros
Urgoros.description: '''Urgoros''' is a specter from Vhelnish on Dominaria, who serves Belzenlok.

Vadmir.name: Vadmir
Vadmir.description: '''Vadmir''', also known as ''New Blood'', is a vampire rogue from an unknown plane.

Varina.name: Varina
Varina.description: '''Varina''' is a lich wizard monarch from Amonkhet.

Vega.name: Vega
Vega.description: '''Vega''' the ''Watcher'' is a three-eyed spirit bird from Kaldheim.

Verrak.name: Verrak
Verrak.description: '''Verrak''' is a vampire from Dominaria. While the Baron Sengir has not set foot on Dominaria for millennia, his vile offspring remain. Verrak was sired many generations after the Baron, so he is twisted and monstrous as a result. Normally a being of pure instinct and hunger, Verrak is occasionally visited by bouts of clarity. In those moments, he could atone for his actions - but instead uses this lucidity to plan his next kill.

Vona de Iedo.name: Vona de Iedo
Vona de Iedo.description: '''Vona de Iedo''', also known as the '''Butcher of Magan''' and the '''Antifex''', is an infamous vampire conquistador of the Legion of Dusk, a pretender to the papacy of the Church of Dusk, and a noble of Torrezon on Ixalan.

Wilhelt.name: Wilhelt
Wilhelt.description: '''Wilhelt''' is a zombie warrior from Innistrad. In life, Wilhelt the Breathtaking was an average lumberjack, known for his above-average looks. His looks were matched only by his vanity, and he declared he would only pledge himself to a suitor as impressive as he. No one reached this standard until he first laid eyes on the ghoulcaller Gisa Cecani.

Windgrace.name: Windgrace
Windgrace.description: Lord '''Windgrace''' was a panther warrior planeswalker from Urborg on Dominaria. He was one of the Nine Titans that Urza gathered to fight Phyrexia. After his death, he became a protective Avatar of Urborg.
planes: Gutting of Phyrexia|gutting the plane completely

Yargle.name: Yargle
Yargle.description: '''Yargle''' is a gluttonous Frog Spirit that haunts Dominarian Urborg.

Zagras.name: Zagras
Zagras.description: '''Zagra''' is an infamous vampire rogue from Zendikar.

Aerophin.name: Aerophin
Aerophin.description: |image=Aerophin.jpg |aka = Aerophuis |origin=Lumengrid, Mirrodin |creator=Vedalken |scryart=Aerophin '''Aerophin''' (sometimes referred to as '''aerophuis''') were artificial creatures created as servants of the Vedalken of Lumengrid prior to the plane becoming New Phyrexia.

Assembly-Worker.name: Assembly-Worker
Assembly-Worker.description: as of ''Jumpstart 2022'' '''Assembly-Worker''' is a seldom used creature type used for artifact creatures. It was first featured in ''Antiquities''.

Avenger.name: Avenger
Avenger.description: |image=Argivian Avenger.jpg |origin=Yotia, Terisiare, Dominaria Artifacts known as '''avengers''' were artificial creatures created by Urza during the time of the Brothers' War. The very first model was based on a schematic Urza drew when he wanted to gain access to the Jalum Tome from the dowry of Kayla bin-Kroog. His avenger lifted the statue in the square, thus winning the Warlord of Kroog's contest and earning Urza Kayla's hand by marriage.

Blinkmoth.name: Blinkmoth
Blinkmoth.description: '''Blinkmoth''' is an artifact creature type used for cards depicting the odd, tiny flying creatures that are the very essence of Mirrodin, and one of the plane’s original species.

Breya.name: Breya
Breya.description: '''Breya''', ''Etherium Shaper'', is a legendary artifact human from Alara.

Brudiclad.name: Brudiclad
Brudiclad.description: '''Brudiclad''' is a Myr-like compleated artifact creature who is able to meld flesh and metal in glorious harmony.

Draco.name: Draco
Draco.description: '''Draco''' was a powerful artifact dragon that appeared on Dominaria during the first Phyrexian invasion. It is not known what Draco is or originally was, but the artwork suggests that it might have been a natural dragon (instead of a pure artificial construct) that was later modified by the Phyrexians with certain metallic parts,. Despite this, it is not itself defined as a Phyrexian creature, and neither is Scion of Draco.

Dreadnought.name: Dreadnought
Dreadnought.description: as of ''The Brothers' War'' '''Dreadnought''' is a seldom used creature type. A dreadnought originally is a type of battleship armed with heavy-caliber guns in turrets. The term is also used to describe something that is among the largest or most powerful of its kind.

Juggernaut.name: Juggernaut
Juggernaut.description: as of ''Phyrexia: All Will Be One'' '''Juggernaut''' is a creature type used for large, mercilessly destructive, and unstoppable forces or objects. All Juggernauts are artifact creatures.

Lita.name: Lita
Lita.description: '''Lita''', ''Mechanical Engineer'' is a legendary artifact creature artificer from Avishkar.

Masticore.name: Masticore
Masticore.description: as of ''Phyrexia: All Will Be One'' '''Masticore''' is a creature type used for artifact creatures, which is to be distinguished from manticores. While a manticore is a flying, ferocious, red-aligned, lion-like beast, a masticore is a non-flying, still-ferocious, ''metallic'' lion-like beast. Manticores are fleshy and flying; masticores are galvanized and grounded.

Myr.name: Myr
Myr.description: as of ''Phyrexia: All Will Be One'' '''Myr''' (rhymes with "deer") is a creature type describing the metal automatons created by Memnarch that are found all over Mirrodin.

Ota.name: Ota
Ota.description: The '''Ota''' are creatures currently depicted only in Lumithread Field. They are flying metallic humanoids without legs or wings.

Pentavite.name: Pentavite
Pentavite.description: '''Pentavite''' is a unique creature subtype for a type of artifact creature which only appears on tokens.

Phyrexian War Beast.name: Phyrexian War Beast
Phyrexian War Beast.description: |image=Phyrexian War Beast.jpg |origin=Phyrexia |creator=Phyrexia |status=Destroyed Artifacts known as '''Phyrexian War Beasts''' were artificial creatures created for battle by Phyrexia. They were discovered by Soldevi diggers during the earliest part of the Thaw on Dominaria.

Prism.name: Prism
Prism.description: '''Prism''' is a unique artifact creature subtype which only appears on tokens representing magical creatures created from transparent glass that refracts light.

Ramos.name: Ramos
Ramos.description: '''Ramos''' is a mysterious dragon engine on Mercadia that is important to many of that world's religions, particularly that of the Cho-Arrim.

Sable.name: Sable
Sable.description: as of ''Theros'' '''Sable''' is a creature type used for cards that depict small carnivorous mammals. Sable is a species of marten valued for its fur.

Sculpture.name: Sculpture
Sculpture.description: '''Sculpture''' is a unique artifact creature subtype that represent carved stone statues animated by magic.

Sen Triplets.name: Sen Triplets
Sen Triplets.description: The '''Sen Triplets''' are a group of legendary female artifact human wizards on Alara.

Servo.name: Servo
Servo.description: '''Servo''' is a creature subtype introduced in ''Kaladesh''. All Servos are 1/1 artifact creatures.

Sharuum.name: Sharuum
Sharuum.description: '''Sharuum''' is a female sphinx and ''the Hegemon'' of Esper, Alara.

biographical_info.birthplace: The Sea of Unknowing, Esper, Alara

Silas Renn.name: Silas Renn
Silas Renn.description: '''Silas Renn''' is a human, born on the shard of Esper (Alara). He is the heir of the House of Renn, one of the most influential families among the elite of Esper. He was also a member of the Seekers of Carmot and an enemy of Tezzeret. Silas is a clockworking adept.

Soldevi Steam Beast.name: Soldevi Steam Beast
Soldevi Steam Beast.description: |image=Soldevi Steam Beast.jpg |origin=Soldev, Kjeldor, Terisiare, Dominaria |creator=Arcum Dagsson Artifacts known as '''Soldevi steam beasts''' were artificial creatures created for defense and utility by the Soldevi machinist Arcum Dagsson during the earliest part of the Thaw on Dominaria.

Tawny.name: Tawny
Tawny.description: '''Tawny''' is a artifact creature cat ally from Zendikar.

Tetravite.name: Tetravite
Tetravite.description: '''Tetravite''' is a unique creature subtype for a type of artifact creature created by Tetravus that only appear on tokens.

Tetzin.name: Tetzin
Tetzin.description: '''Tetzin''' is a legendary gnome from Ixalan. Tetzin is a character that debuted in ''The Lost Caverns of Ixalan Commander'' as an additional card within set and collector boosters but not from any of the commander decks. They are a gnome from Ixalan's Core and can combine with other artifacts to become the '''Golden-Gear Colossus''', which Tetzin serves as the head of.

Tezzeret.name: Tezzeret
Tezzeret.description: '''Tezzeret''' (/tɛzɜrɛt/) is a male human planeswalker, born in Tidehollow on the shard of Esper (Alara). He was a henchman of Nicol Bolas but despised his master.
planes: Path of the Planeswalker|The Seeker's Fall

Triskelavite.name: Triskelavite
Triskelavite.description: '''Triskelavite''' is a unique creature subtype for a type of artifact creature which only appears on tokens.

Yotian soldier.name: Yotian soldier
Yotian soldier.description: |image=Yotian soldier.jpg |origin=Urza's Tower, Kher Ridges, Dominaria Artifacts known as '''Yotian soldiers''' were artificial creatures created for defense by Urza during the Brothers' War on Dominaria.

Zabaz.name: Zabaz
Zabaz.description: '''Zabaz''' the ''Glimmerwasp'' is an artifact Insect from Mirrodin.

Arvinox.name: Arvinox
Arvinox.description: '''Arvinox''', ''the Mind Flail'', is a legendary enchantment creature horror from Innistrad.
planes: Dungeons & Dragons: Adventures in the Forgotten Realms

Enchantment creature.name: Enchantment creature
Enchantment creature.description: '''Enchantment creatures''' are both enchantments and creatures and therefore the rules for both apply to them.

Go-Shintai of Ancient Wars.name: Go-Shintai of Ancient Wars
Go-Shintai of Ancient Wars.description: The '''Go-Shintai of Ancient Wars''' is a legendary shrine housing a Kami of Ancient Wars.

Go-Shintai of Hidden Cruelty.name: Go-Shintai of Hidden Cruelty
Go-Shintai of Hidden Cruelty.description: The '''Go-Shintai of Hidden Cruelty''' is a legendary shrine housing a Kami of Hidden Cruelty.

Go-Shintai of Life's Origin.name: Go-Shintai of Life's Origin
Go-Shintai of Life's Origin.description: The '''Go-Shintai of Life's Origin''' is a legendary shrine housing a Kami of Life's Origin.

Go-Shintai of Lost Wisdom.name: Go-Shintai of Lost Wisdom
Go-Shintai of Lost Wisdom.description: The '''Go-Shintai of Lost Wisdom''' is a legendary shrine housing a Kami of Lost Wisdom.

Go-Shintai of Shared Purpose.name: Go-Shintai of Shared Purpose
Go-Shintai of Shared Purpose.description: The '''Go-Shintai of Shared Purpose''' is a legendary shrine housing a Kami of Shared Purpose.

Shigeki.name: Shigeki
Shigeki.description: '''Shigeki''' is a orochi druid enchantment creature and leader of the Order of Jukai in Kamigawa.

Blorpityblorpboop.name: Blorpityblorpboop
Blorpityblorpboop.description: Ambassador '''Blorpityblorpboop''' is an alien advisor guest and resident of Myra the Magnificent's Intergalactic Astrotorium of Fun after the destruction of their homeworld Blorb-12 at the hands of Captain Rex Nebula.

Allav Hask.name: Allav Hask
Allav Hask.description: '''Captain Allav Hask''' was the leader of a group of four human soldiers from Dominaria, including Trooper Fost, and the golem Boom.

Brandis Thorn.name: Brandis Thorn
Brandis Thorn.description: Captain '''Brandis Thorn''' is a pirate commander of the ''Dire Fleet'' of the Brazen Coalition on Ixalan.

Eberhart.name: Eberhart
Eberhart.description: Captain '''Eberhart''' is a human soldier of Innistrad.

Howler.name: Howler
Howler.description: Captain '''Howler''' is the hulking Chordatan captain of the Keelhaulers racing team that participated in the Ghirapur Grand Prix. He originates from an unknown plane submerged in water and has taken up residence on Avishkar.

Lannery Storm.name: Lannery Storm
Lannery Storm.description: Captain '''Lannery Storm''' is a pirate commander of the ''Storm Fleet'' of the Brazen Coalition on Ixalan.

Orthion.name: Orthion
Orthion.description: Captain '''Orthion''', the ''Hero of Lavabrink'', is a human soldier from Ikoria.

Rex Nebula.name: Rex Nebula
Rex Nebula.description: Captain '''Rex Nebula''' is a human employee who pilots Myra the Magnificent's Intergalactic Astrotorium of Fun through the multiverse.

Ria Ivor.name: Ria Ivor
Ria Ivor.description: Captain '''Ria Ivor''' was an Auriok knight from the settlement of Bladehold in the Razor Fields on Mirrodin. She was Compleated as of the events of ''[[Phyrexia: All Wi...

Ripley Vance.name: Ripley Vance
Ripley Vance.description: '''Captain Ripley Vance''' is a pyromantic mage-pirate on Ixalan.

Sarya Haasendel.name: Sarya Haasendel
Sarya Haasendel.description: Captain '''Sarya Haasendel''' was a dwarven captain serving in Sarpadia at the time of the Great Sarpadian War of Dominaria.

Vargus Wrath.name: Vargus Wrath
Vargus Wrath.description: Captain '''Vargus Wrath''' is an Orc Pirate from Ixalan. He is perhaps the most brazen member of the Brazen Coalition.

Vraska.name: Vraska
Vraska.description: '''Vraska''' (Phyrexian: lreLhFD, IPA: [vraskəʔ]) is a black and green-aligned gorgon assassin and former planeswalker from Ravnica. She was part of a [[mer...

Wallis Parrish.name: Wallis Parrish
Wallis Parrish.description: Captain '''Wallis Parrish''' is a pirate commander of the former ''Deadeye Fleet'' of the Brazen Coalition on Ixalan. She presumably later became the leader of the Bluecoats.

Apatzec Intli IV.name: Apatzec Intli IV
Apatzec Intli IV.description: '''Apatzec Intli IV''' is the current boy-emperor of the Sun Empire on Ixalan. He has an older sister, Caztaca Huicintli, and an adopted older brother, Atlacan Huicintli.

Mihail Stovorod.name: Mihail Stovorod
Mihail Stovorod.description: '''Mihail Stovorod''', known as '''Emperor Mihail II''', is the current sovereign of Vodalia on Dominaria.

Jirina Kudro.name: Jirina Kudro
Jirina Kudro.description: General '''Jirina Kudro''' is a Coppercoat soldier from Ikoria.

Khurzog.name: Khurzog
Khurzog.description: '''General Khurzog''' was a Sarpadian Orc General during the Fallen Empires period on Dominaria.

Migellic.name: Migellic
Migellic.description: '''Migellic''' was a member of the Wojek League. She was short and somewhat scrappy-looking. In 9999 Z.C., she was a lieutenant in the Tenth Section, subordinate to Agrus Kos.

Sethron.name: Sethron
Sethron.description: '''Sethron''', ''Hurloon General'', is a leader among the Hurloon minotaurs, on the plane of Dominaria.

Brimaz.name: Brimaz
Brimaz.description: '''Brimaz''' is the current leonin "king" of Oreskos, on the plane of Theros.

Darien XLVIII.name: Darien XLVIII
Darien XLVIII.description: As of 4562, '''King Darien XLVIII''' rules New Argive. Given his title, he was the 48th of the Dariens of Terisiare to receive such a numeration.

Glarb.name: Glarb
Glarb.description: King '''Glarb''', also referred to as '''His Moistness''', is a frogfolk from Bloomburrow. He is king of the frogfolk and a powerful wizard.

Harald.name: Harald
Harald.description: King '''Harald the Elder''' is an elf warrior from Skemfar on Kaldheim. Harald managed to unite both of his plane's elf tribes, the wood elves and shadow elves. His younger brother is the planeswalker Tyvar Kell.

Korvold.name: Korvold
Korvold.description: '''Korvold''', ''Fae-Cursed King'', is a dragon noble from Eldraine.

Kudo.name: Kudo
Kudo.description: '''Kudo''', ''King Among Bears'', is a legendary Bear from an unknown plane introduced in ''Modern Horizons 3''. He is the consort of Ayula and not a king himself.

Macar.name: Macar
Macar.description: '''Macar''' is a legendary king of an unnamed city on Theros.

Okinec Ahau.name: Okinec Ahau
Okinec Ahau.description: Sovereign '''Okinec Ahau''', also called the '''Deep King''', is a Malamet noble on Ixalan, and the deified leader of his people.

Ozox.name: Ozox
Ozox.description: '''Ozox''', also known as the ''Clattering King'', is a skeleton noble from Innistrad.

Pedron.name: Pedron
Pedron.description: '''Pedron''' is a petty king and conqueror from Torrezon on the plane of Ixalan, and enemy of Elenda of Garrano and her followers.

Reaper King.name: Reaper King
Reaper King.description: The '''Reaper King''' is a legendary scarecrow from Shadowmoor.

Sea King.name: Sea King
Sea King.description: '''The Sea King''' is a deity worshipped in Jamuraa on the plane of Dominaria.

Skitter.name: Skitter
Skitter.description: Lord '''Skitter''' was a demonic Rat noble from Eldraine.

Suleiman.name: Suleiman
Suleiman.description: King '''Suleiman''' was an ancient king of Rabiah before the Thousandfold Refraction, esteemed for his wisdom and the many Djinni and Efreeti he had imprisoned.

Yorvo.name: Yorvo
Yorvo.description: King '''Yorvo''' is a giant noble and the former ruler of Garenbrig on Eldraine.

Erec Kenrith.name: Erec Kenrith
Erec Kenrith.description: '''Erec Kenrith''' is a human prince from Eldraine. He is a shy child, and a bit spoiled.{{WebRef|url=https://magic.wizards.com/en/articles/archive/feature/author=Wizards of the Coastwork=magicthegathering.com|publisher=Wizards of the Coast|archiveurl=https://web.archive.org/web/20191116180323/https://magic.wizards.com/en/articles/archive/feature/portrait...

Khrad.name: Khrad
Khrad.description: '''Khrad''' is the Prince of Mon'Telu and a mighty Telu-Set warrior from Muraganda.

Ormendahl.name: Ormendahl
Ormendahl.description: '''Ormendahl''', known as '''the Reaper''', is a demon prince from Innistrad.

Hazel Kenrith.name: Hazel Kenrith
Hazel Kenrith.description: '''Hazel Kenrith''' is a human princess from Eldraine. She is a mischievous tween and an absolute troublemaker.{{WebRef|url=https://magic.wizards.com/en/articles/archive/feature/author=Wizards of the Coastwork=magicthegathering.com|publisher=Wizards of the Coast|archiveurl=http...

Allenal.name: Allenal
Allenal.description: '''Allenal''' is the half-elven queen of the Llanowar elfhame Ruadach on Dominara.

Ayula.name: Ayula
Ayula.description: '''Ayula''', ''Queen Among Bears'', is a legendary Bear from an unknown plane introduced in ''Modern Horizons''.

Drufalden.name: Drufalden
Drufalden.description: '''Drufalden''' was the last of the Rigida, an ice queen ruling over a cold realm in the Borderlands in 3050 AR.

Garza Zol.name: Garza Zol
Garza Zol.description: '''Garza Zol''' was the vampire that ruled over Krov during the Ice Age of Dominaria. She allied with Heidar following the Thaw, but later had him murdered by one of her assassins.

Marchesa d'Amati.name: Marchesa d'Amati
Marchesa d'Amati.description: '''Marchesa d'Amati''' (/mɑːrtʃɛzə/ ''mar-CHEH-zuh''), also known as '''the Black Rose''', is the Queen of the High City of Paliano on the plane of Fiora.

Miralda.name: Miralda
Miralda.description: '''Queen Miralda the Pious''' is the iron-fisted ruler of Torrezon.

Oona.name: Oona
Oona.description: '''Oona''' is the queen and mother of the faeries on Lorwyn. She lives in Glen Elendra and sees the world through her children and the harvested dreamstuff they bring her. She is one of the few creatures that retained her memories after the Great Aurora, and was in fact the source of all previous Auroras. Her children refer to her as Mother of All Fae or Great Mother.

Wezna.name: Wezna
Wezna.description: '''Wezna''' is the queen of Zhalfir. Queen Wezna is the formidable and wise leader of Zhalfir, distinguished by her unwavering dedication to her people and their ancient traditions. As a ruler, she carries the weight of her nation’s history with a blend of regal composure and fierce resolve. Her presence commands great respect, reflecting both the strength and resilience of Zhalfir in the face of unprecedented threats. Wezna’s demeanor contains both stern authority and deep empathy, balanced by ...

Anep.name: Anep
Anep.description: '''Anep''' is a Khenra warrior and Vizier of Hazoret from Amonkhet.

Ebirri.name: Ebirri
Ebirri.description: '''Ebirri''' was a rakshasa vizier of the Sultai in Tarkir's original timeline. It is unknown if he exists in Tarkir's current timeline.

Eknet.name: Eknet
Eknet.description: '''Eknet''' was an aven warrior from Amonkhet. Eknet was a vizier of the Hekma guard, who was the first being to speak to the Gatewatch after they planeswalked to Amonkhet. Although Eknet started out accusing them of meddling with the Hekma and wearing strange clothes, Jace Beleren read his mind and convinced him to get Temmet to meet with them.

Hapatra.name: Hapatra
Hapatra.description: '''Hapatra''', a.k.a. '''Rhonas's broken fang''', was the vizier of the god Rhonas on Amonkhet.

Khudal.name: Khudal
Khudal.description: '''Khudal''' was a rakshasa vizier of the Sultai in Tarkir around the time of the Khanfall.

Samut.name: Samut
Samut.description: '''Samut''', ''the Swift'', is a former planeswalker from Amonkhet. She is a renowned warrior and specializes in speed-based magic. She is the current champion of Hazoret, Vizier of Naktamun, and spokesperson for the city's living.

Ur-Dragon.name: Ur-Dragon
Ur-Dragon.description: The '''Ur-Dragon''', Progenitor of Fire, is an enormous and immensely powerful Dragon Avatar. An entity from the dawn of time, it is the primordial essence of all Dragonkind in the Multiverse[https://twitter.com/kellydigges/status/895828640...
